Verse: Then thereafter there shall come upon you seven hard years, that shall devour what you have laid up for them, all but a little you keep in store.

Name: Joseph
Verse: Then thereafter there shall come a year wherein the people will be succoured and press in season.

Name: Joseph
Verse: The king said, ’Bring him to me!’ And when the messenger came to him, he said, ’Return unto thy lord, and ask of him, "What of the women who cut their hands?" Surely my Lord has knowledge of their guile.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: ’What was your business, women,’ he said, ’when you solicited Joseph?’ ’God save us!’ they said. ’We know no evil against him.’ The Governor’s wife said, ’Now the truth is at last discovered; I solicited him; he is a truthful man.

Name: Joseph
Verse: ’That, so that he may know I betrayed him not secretly, and that God guides not the guile of the treacherous.

Name: Joseph
Verse: Yet I claim not that my soul was innocent -- surely the soul of man incites to evil -- except inasmuch as my Lord had mercy; truly my Lord is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: The king said, ’Bring him to me! I would attach him to my person.’ Then, when he had spoken with him, he said, ’Today thou art established firmly in our favour and in our trust.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: He said, ’Set me over the land’s storehouses; I am a knowing guardian.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: So We established Joseph in the land, to make his dwelling there wherever he would. We visit with Our mercy whomsoever We will, and We leave not to waste the wage of the good-doers.

Name: Joseph
Verse: Yet is the wage of the world to come better for those who believe, and are godfearing.

Name: Joseph
Verse: And the brethren of Joseph came, and entered unto him, and he knew them, but they knew him not.

Name: Joseph
Verse: When he had equipped them with their equipment be said, ’Bring me a certain brother of yours from your father. Do you not see that I fill up the measure, and am the best of hosts?

Name: Joseph
Verse: But if you bring him not to me, there shall be no measure for you with me, neither shall you come nigh me.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: They said, ’We will solicit him of our father; that we will do.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: He said to his pages, ’Put their merchandise in their saddlebags; haply they will recognize it when they have turned to their people; haply they will return.

Name: Joseph
Verse: So, when they had returned to their father, they said, ’Father, the measure was denied to us; so send with us our brother, that we may obtain the measure; surely we shall be watching over him.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: He said, ’And shall I entrust him to you otherwise than as I entrusted before his brother to you? Why, God is the best guardian, and He is the most merciful of the merciful.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: And when they opened their things, they found their merchandise, restored to them. ’Father,’ they said, ’what more should we desire? See, our merchandise here is restored to us. We shall get provision for our family, and we shall be watching over our brother; we shall obtain an extra camel’s load -- that is an easy measure.

Name: Joseph
Verse: He said, ’Never will I send him with you until you bring me a solemn pledge by God that you will surely bring him back to me unless it be that you are encompassed.’ When they had brought him their solemn pledge he said, ’God shall be Guardian over what we say.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: He also said, ’O my sons, enter not by one door; enter by separate doors. Yet I cannot avail you anything against God; judgment belongs not to any but God. In Him I have put my trust; and in Him let all put their trust who put their trust.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: And when they entered after the manner their father commanded them, it availed them nothing against God; but it was a need in Jacob’s soul that he so satisfied. Verily he was possessed of a knowledge for that We had taught him; but most men know not.

Name: Joseph
Verse: And when they entered unto Joseph, he said, taking his brother into his arms, ’I am thy brother; so do not despair of that they have done.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: Then, when he had equipped them with their equipment, he put his drinking-cup into the saddlebag of his brother. Then a herald proclaimed, ’Ho, cameleers, you are robbers!’

Name: Joseph
Verse: They said, turning to them, ’What is it that you are missing?’

Name: Joseph
Verse: They said, ’We are missing the king’s goblet. Whoever brings it shall receive a camel’s load; that I guarantee.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: ’By God,’ they said, ’you know well that we came not to work corruption in the land. We are not robbers.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: They said, ’And what shall be its recompense if you are liars?’

Name: Joseph
Verse: They said, ’This shall be its recompense -- in whoever’s saddlebag the goblet is found, he shall be its recompense. So we recompense the evildoers.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: So he made beginning with their sacks, before his brother’s sack, then he pulled it out of his brother’s sack. So We contrived for Joseph’s sake; he could not have taken his brother, according to the king’s doom, except that God willed. Whomsoever We will, We raise in rank; over every man of knowledge is One who knows.

Name: Joseph
Verse: They said, ’If he is a thief, a brother of his was a thief before.’ But Joseph secreted it in his soul and disclosed it not to them, saying, ’You are in a worse case; God knows very well what you are describing.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: They said, ’Mighty prince, he has a father, aged and great with years; so take one of us in his place; we see that thou art one of the good-doers.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: He said, ’God forbid that we should take any other but him in whose possession we found the goods; for if we did so, we would be evildoers.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: When they despaired of moving him, they conferred privily apart. Said the eldest of them, ’Do you not know how your father has taken a solemn pledge from you by God, and aforetime you failed regarding Joseph? Never will I quit this land, until my father gives me leave, or God judges in my favour; He is the best of judges.

Name: Joseph
Verse: Return you all to your father, and say, "Father, thy son stole; we do not testify except that we know; we were no guardians of the Unseen.

Name: Joseph
Verse: Enquire of the city wherein we were, and the caravan in which we approached; surely we are truthful men".’

Name: Joseph
Verse: ’No!’ he said ’But your spirits tempted you to do somewhat. But come, sweet patience! Haply God will bring them all to me; He is the All-knowing, the All-wise.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: And he turned away from them, and said, ’Ah, woe is me for Joseph!’ And his eyes turned white because of the sorrow that he choked within him.

Name: Joseph
Verse: ’By God,’ they said, ’thou wilt never cease mentioning Joseph till thou art consumed, or among the perishing.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: He said, ’I make complaint of my anguish and my sorrow unto God; I know from God that you know not.

Name: Joseph
Verse: Depart, my sons, and search out tidings of Joseph and his brother. Do not despair of God’s comfort; of God’s comfort no man despairs, excepting the people of the unbelievers.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: So, when they entered unto him, they said, ’O mighty prince, affliction has visited us and our people. We come with merchandise of scant worth. Fill up to us the measure, and be charitable to us; surely God recompenses the charitable.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: He said, ’Are you aware of what you did with Joseph and his brother, when you were ignorant?’

Name: Joseph
Verse: They said, ’Why, art thou indeed Joseph?’ ’I am Joseph,’ he said. ’This is my brother. God has indeed been gracious unto us. Whosoever fears God, and is patient -- surely God leaves not to waste the wage of the good-doers.

Name: Joseph
Verse: ’By God,’ they said, ’God has indeed preferred thee above us, and certainly we have been sinful.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: He said, ’No reproach this day shall be on you; God will forgive you; He is the most merciful of the merciful.

Name: Joseph
Verse: Go, take this shirt, and do you cast it on my father’s face, and he shall recover his sight; then bring me your family all together.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: So, when the caravan set forth, their father said, ’Surely I perceive Joseph’s scent, unless you think me doting.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: They said, ’By God, thou art certainly in thy ancient error.

Name: Joseph
Verse: But when the bearer of good tidings came to him, and laid it on his face, forthwith he saw once again. He said, ’Did I not tell you I know from God that you know not?’

Name: Joseph
Verse: They said, ’Our father, ask forgiveness of our crimes for us; for certainly we have been sinful.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: He said, ’Assuredly I will ask my Lord to forgive you; He is the All-forgiving, the All-compassionate.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: So, when they entered unto Joseph, he took his father and mother into his arms saying, ’Enter you into Egypt, if God will, in security.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: And he lifted his father and mother upon the throne; and the others fell down prostrate before him. ’See, father,’ he said, ’this is the interpretation of my vision of long ago; my Lord has made it true. He was good to me when He brought me forth from the prison, and again when He brought you out of the desert, after that Satan set at variance me and my brethren. My Lord is gentle to what He will; He is the All-knowing, the All-wise.

Name: Joseph
Verse: O my Lord, Thou hast given me to rule, and Thou hast taught me the interpretation of tales. O Thou, the Originator of the heavens and earth, Thou art my Protector in this world and the next. O receive me to Thee in true submission, and join me with the righteous.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: That is of the tidings of the Unseen that We reveal to thee; thou wast not with them when they agreed upon their plan, devising.

Name: Joseph
Verse: Yet, be thou ever so eager, the most part of men believe not.

Name: Joseph
Verse: Thou askest of them no wage for it; it is nothing but a reminder unto all beings.

Name: Joseph
Verse: How many a sign there is in the heavens and in the earth that they pass by, turning away from it!

Name: Joseph
Verse: And the most part of them believe not in God, but they associate other gods with Him.

Name: Joseph
Verse: Do they feel secure that there shall come upon them no enveloping of the chastisement of God, or that the Hour shall not come upon them suddenly when they are unaware?

Name: Joseph
Verse: Say: ’This is my way. I call to God with sure knowledge, I and whoever follows after me. To God be glory! And I am not among the idolaters.’

Name: Joseph
Verse: We sent not forth any before thee, but men We revealed to of the people living in the cities. Have they not journeyed in the land? Have they not beheld how was the end of those before them?. Surely the abode of the world to come is better for those that are godfearing. What, do you not understand?

Name: Joseph
Verse: Till, when the Messengers despaired, deeming they were counted liars, Our help came to them and whosoever We willed was delivered. Our might will never be turned back from the people of the sinners.

Name: Joseph
Verse: In their stories is surely a lesson to men possessed of minds; it is not a tale forged, but a confirmation of what is before it, and a distinguishing of every thing, and a guidance, and a mercy to a people who believe.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: Alif Lam Mim Ra. Those are the signs of the Book; and that which has been sent down to thee from thy Lord is the truth, but most men do not believe.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: God is He who raised up the heavens without pillars you can see, then He sat Himself upon the Throne. He subjected the sun and the moon, each one running to a term stated. He directs the affair; He distinguishes the signs; haply you will have faith in the encounter with your Lord.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: It is He who stretched out the earth and set therein firm mountains and rivers, and of every fruit He placed there two kinds, covering the day with the night. Surely in that are signs for a people who reflect.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: And on the earth are tracts neighbouring each to each, and gardens of vines, and fields sown, and palms in pairs, and palms single, watered with one water; and some of them We prefer in produce above others. Surely in that are signs for a people who understand.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: If thou wouldst wonder, surely wonderful is their saying, ’What, when we are dust shall we indeed then be raised up again in new creation?’ Those are they that disbelieve in their Lord; those -- on their necks are fetters; those shall be the inhabitants of the Fire, therein dwelling forever.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: They would have thee hasten the evil ere the good; yet there have passed away before them examples. Thy Lord is forgiving to men, for all their evil-doing, and thy Lord is terrible in retribution.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: The unbelievers say, ’Why has a sign not been sent down upon him from his Lord?’ Thou art only a warner, and a guide to every people.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: God knows what every female bears, and the wombs’ shrinking and swelling; everything with Him has its measure --

Name: The Thunder
Verse: the Knower of the unseen and the visible, the All-great, the All-exalted:

Name: The Thunder
Verse: Alike of you is he who conceals his -- saying, and he who proclaims it, he who hides himself in the night, and he who sallies by day;

Name: The Thunder
Verse: he has attendant angels, before him and behind him, watching over him by God’s command. God changes not what is in a people, until they change what is in themselves. Whensover God desires evil for a people, there is no turning it back; apart from Him, they have no protector.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: It is He who shows you the lightning, for fear and hope, and produces the heavy clouds;

Name: The Thunder
Verse: the thunder proclaims. His praise, and the angels, in awe of Him. He looses the thunderbolts, and smites with them whomsoever He will; yet they dispute about God, who is mighty in power.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: To Him is the call of truth; and those upon whom they call, apart from Him, answer them nothing, but it is as a man who stretches out his hands to water that it may reach his mouth, and it reaches it not. The prayer of the unbelievers goes only astray.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: To God bow all who are in the heavens and the earth, willingly or unwillingly, as do their shadows also in the mornings and the evenings.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: Say: ’Who is the Lord of the heavens and of the earth?’ Say: ’God.’ Say: ’Then have you taken unto you others beside Him to be your protectors, even such as have no power to profit or hurt themselves?’ Say: ’Are the blind and the seeing man equal, or are the shadows and the light equal? Or have they ascribed to God associates who created as He created, so that creation is all alike to them?’ Say: ’God is the Creator of everything, and He is the One, the Omnipotent.’

Name: The Thunder
Verse: He sends down out of heaven water, and the wadis flow each in its measure, and the torrent carries a swelling scum; and out of that over which they kindle fire, being desirous of ornament or ware, out of that rises a scum the like of it. So God strikes both the true and the false. As for the scum, it vanishes as jetsam, and what profits men abides in the earth. Even so God strikes His similitudes.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: For those who answer their Lord, the reward most fair; and those who answer Him not -- if they possessed all that is in the earth and the like of it with it, they would offer it for their ransom. Those theirs shall be the evil reckoning, and their refuge shall be Gehenna -- an evil cradling!

Name: The Thunder
Verse: What, is he who knows what is sent down to thee from thy Lord is the truth, like him who is blind? Only men possessed of minds remember;

Name: The Thunder
Verse: who fulfil God’s covenant, and break not the compact,

Name: The Thunder
Verse: who join what God has commanded shall be joined, and fear their Lord, and dread the evil reckoning,

Name: The Thunder
Verse: patient men, desirous of the Face of their Lord, who perform the prayer, and expend of that We have provided them, secretly and in public, and who avert evil with good -- theirs shall be the Ultimate Abode,

Name: The Thunder
Verse: Gardens of Eden which they shall enter; and those who were righteous of their fathers, and their wives, and their seed, shall enter them, and the angels shall enter unto them from every gate:

Name: The Thunder
Verse: ’Peace be upon you, for that you were patient.’ Fair is the Ultimate Abode.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: And those who break the covenant of God after His compact, and who snap what God has commanded to be joined, and who work corruption in the earth -- theirs shall be the curse, and theirs the Evil Abode.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: God outspreads and straitens His provision unto whomsoever He will. They rejoice in this present life; and this present life, beside the world to come, is naught but passing enjoyment.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: The unbelievers say, ’Why has a sign not been sent down upon him from his Lord?’ Say: ’God leads astray whomsoever He will, and He guides to Him all who are penitent.’

Name: The Thunder
Verse: Those who believe, their hearts being at rest in God’s remembrance -- in God’s remembrance are at rest the hearts

Name: The Thunder
Verse: of those who believe and do righteous deeds; theirs is blessedness and a fair resort.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: Thus We have sent thee among a nation before which other nations have passed away, to recite to them that We have revealed to thee; and yet they disbelieve in the All-merciful. Say: ’He is my Lord -- there is no god but He. In Him I have put my trust, and to Him I turn.’

Name: The Thunder
Verse: If only a Koran whereby the mountains were set in motion, or the earth were cleft, or the dead were spoken to -- nay, but God’s is the affair altogether. Did not the believers know that, if God had willed, He would have guided men all together? And still the unbelievers are smitten by a shattering for what they wrought, or it alights nigh their habitation, until God’s promise comes; and God will not fail the tryst.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: Messengers indeed were scoffed at before thee, and I respited the unbelievers; then I seized them -- and how was my retribution?

Name: The Thunder
Verse: What, He who stands over every soul for what it has earned? -- And yet they ascribe to God associates. Say: ’Name them! Or will you tell Him what He knows not in the earth? Or in apparent words?’ Nay; but decked out fair to the unbelievers is their devising, and they are barred from the way; and whomsoever God leads astray, no guide has he.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: For them is chastisement in the present life; and the chastisement of the world to come is yet more grievous; they have none to defend them from God.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: The likeness of Paradise, that is promised to the godfearing: beneath it rivers flow, its produce is eternal, and its shade. That is the requital of the god-fearing; and the requital of the unbelievers is -- the Fire!

Name: The Thunder
Verse: And those to whom We have given the Book rejoice in what is sent down unto thee; and of the parties some reject some of it. Say: ’I have only been commanded to serve God, and not to associate aught with Him. To Him I call, and to Him I turn.’

Name: The Thunder
Verse: Even so We have sent it down as an Arabic judgment. And if thou dost follow their caprices, after the knowledge that has come to thee, thou shalt have no protector against God, and no defender.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: And We sent Messengers before thee, and We assigned to them wives, and seed; and it was not for any Messengers to bring a sign, but by God’s leave. Every term has a Book.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: God blots out, and He establishes whatsoever He will; and with Him is the Essence of the Book.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: Whether We show thee a part of that We promise them, or We call thee to Us, it is thine only to deliver the Message, and Ours the reckoning.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: Have they not seen how We come to the land diminishing it in its extremities? God judges; none repels His judgment; He is swift at the reckoning.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: Those that were before them devised; but God’s is the devising altogether. He knows what every soul earns. The unbelievers shall assuredly know whose will be the Ultimate Abode.

Name: The Thunder
Verse: The unbelievers say, ’Thou art not an Envoy.’ Say: ’God suffices as a witness between me and you, and whosoever possesses knowledge of the Book.’

Name: Abraham
Verse: Alif Lam Ra. A Book We have sent down to thee that thou mayest bring forth mankind from the shadows to the light by the leave of their Lord, to the path of the All-mighty, the All-laudable,

Name: Abraham
Verse: God, to whom belongs all that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth. And woe to the unbelievers for a terrible chastisement,

Name: Abraham
Verse: such as prefer the present life over the world to come, and bar from God’s way, desiring to make it crooked -- they are in far error.

Name: Abraham
Verse: And We have sent no Messenger save with the tongue of his people, that he might make all clear to them; then God leads astray whomsoever He will, and He guides whomsoever He will; and He is the All-mighty, the All-wise.

Name: Abraham
Verse: And We sent Moses with Our signs -- ’Bring forth thy people from the shadows to the light and remind thou them of the Days of God.’ Surely in that are signs for every man enduring, thankful!

Name: Abraham
Verse: And when Moses said to his people, ’Remember God’s blessing upon you when He delivered you from the folk of Pharaoh, who were visiting you with evil chastisement, slaughtering your sons, and sparing your women -- and in that was a grievous trial from your Lord.

Name: Abraham
Verse: And when your Lord proclaimed, "If you are thankful, surely I will increase you, but if you are thankless My chastisement is surely terrible."’

Name: Abraham
Verse: And Moses said, ’If you are thankless, you and whoso is on earth, all together, yet assuredly God is All-sufficient, All-laudable.’

Name: Abraham
Verse: Has there not come to you the tidings of those who were before you -- the people of Noah, Ad, Thamood, and of those after them whom none knows but God? Their Messengers came to them with the clear signs; but they thrust their hands into their mouths, saying, ’We certainly disbelieve in the Message you have been sent with, and we are in doubt, concerning that you call us unto, disquieting.’

Name: Abraham
Verse: Their Messengers said, ’Is there any doubt regarding God, the Originator of the heavens and the earth, who calls you so that He may forgive you your sins, and defer you to a term stated?’ They said, ’You are nothing but mortals, like us; you desire to bar us from that our fathers served; then bring us a manifest authority.’

Name: Abraham
Verse: Their Messengers said to them, ’We are nothing but mortals, like you; but God is gracious unto whomsoever He will of His servants. It is not for us to bring you an authority save by the leave of God; and in God let the believers put all their trust.

Name: Abraham
Verse: And why should we not put our trust in God, seeing that He has guided us in our ways? We will surely endure patiently, whatever you hurt us; and in God let all put their trust who put their trust.’

Name: Abraham
Verse: The unbelievers said to their Messengers, ’We will assuredly expel you from our land, or you will surely return into our creed.’ Then did their Lord reveal unto them: ’We will surely destroy the evildoers,

Name: Abraham
Verse: and We will surely make you to dwell in the land after them -- that, for him who fears My station and fears My threat.’

Name: Abraham
Verse: They sought a judgment; then was disappointed every froward tyrant --

Name: Abraham
Verse: beyond him Gehenna, and he is given to drink of oozing pus,

Name: Abraham
Verse: the which he gulps, and can scarce swallow, and death comes upon him from every side, yet he cannot die; and still beyond him is a harsh chastisement.

Name: Abraham
Verse: The likeness of those who disbelieve in their Lord: their works are as ashes, whereon the wind blows strong upon a tempestuous day; they have no power over that they have earned - that is the far error!

Name: Abraham
Verse: Hast thou not seen that God created the heavens and the earth in truth? If He will, He can put you away and bring a new creation;

Name: Abraham
Verse: that is surely no great matter for God.

Name: Abraham
Verse: They sally forth unto God, all together; then say the weak to those who waxed proud, ’We were your followers; will you avail us against the chastisement of God anything?’ They say, ’If God had guided us, we would have guided you. Alike it is for us whether we cannot endure, or whether we are patient; we have no asylum.’

Name: Abraham
Verse: And Satan says, when the issue is decided, ’God surely promised you a true promise; and I promised you, then I failed you, for I had no authority over you, but that I called you, and you answered me. So do not blame me, but blame yourselves; I cannot aid you, neither can you aid me. I disbelieved in your associating me with God aforetime.’ As for the evildoers, for them awaits a painful chastisement;

Name: Abraham
Verse: but as for those who believe, and do deeds of righteousness, they shall be admitted to gardens underneath which rivers flow, therein dwelling forever, by the leave of their Lord, their greeting therein: ’Peace!’

Name: Abraham
Verse: Hast thou not seen how God has struck a similitude? A good word is as a good tree -- its roots are firm, and its branches are in heaven;

Name: Abraham
Verse: it gives its produce every season by the leave of its Lord. So God strikes similitudes for men; haply they will remember.

Name: Abraham
Verse: And the likeness of a corrupt word is as a corrupt tree -- uprooted from the earth, having no stablishment.

Name: Abraham
Verse: God confirms those who believe with the firm word, in the present life and in the world to come; and God leads astray the evildoers; and God does what He will.

Name: Abraham
Verse: Hast thou not seen those who exchanged the bounty of God with unthankfulness, and caused their people to dwell in the abode of ruin? --

Name: Abraham
Verse: Gehenna, wherein they are roasted; an evil stablishment!

Name: Abraham
Verse: And they set up compeers to God, that they might lead astray from His way. Say: ’Take your joy! Your homecoming shall be -- the Fire!’

Name: Abraham
Verse: Say to My servants who believe, that they perform the prayer, and expend of that We have provided them, secretly and in public, before a day comes wherein shall be neither bargaining nor befriending.

Name: Abraham
Verse: It is God who created the heavens and the earth, and sent down out of heaven water wherewith He brought forth fruits to be your sustenance. And He subjected to you the ships to run upon the sea at His commandment; and He subjected to you the rivers

Name: Abraham
Verse: and He subjected to you the sun and moon constant upon their courses, and He subjected to you the night and day,

Name: Abraham
Verse: and gave you of all you asked Him. If you count God’s blessing, you will never number it; surely man is sinful, unthankful!

Name: Abraham
Verse: And when Abraham said, ’My Lord, make this land secure, and turn me and my sons away from serving idols;

Name: Abraham
Verse: my Lord, they have led astray many men. Then whoso follows me belongs to me; and whoso rebels against me, surely Thou art All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

Name: Abraham
Verse: Our Lord, I have made some of my seed to dwell in a valley where is no sown land by Thy Holy House; Our Lord, let them perform the prayer, and make hearts of men yearn towards them, and provide them with fruits; haply they will be thankful.

Name: Abraham
Verse: Our Lord, Thou knowest what we keep secret and what we publish; from God nothing whatever is hidden in earth and heaven.

Name: Abraham
Verse: Praise be to God, who has given me, though I am old, Ishmael and Isaac; surely my Lord hears the petition.

Name: Abraham
Verse: My Lord, make me a performer of the prayer, and of my seed. Our Lord, and receive my petition.

Name: Abraham
Verse: Our Lord, forgive Thou me and my parents, and the believers, upon the day when the reckoning shall come to pass.

Name: Abraham
Verse: Deem not that God is heedless of what the evildoers work; He is only deferring them to a day when eyes shall stare,

Name: Abraham
Verse: when they shall run with necks outstretched and heads erect, their glances never returned on themselves, their hearts void.

Name: Abraham
Verse: And warn mankind of the day when the chastisement comes on them, And those who did evil shall say, ’Our Lord, defer us to a near term, and we will answer Thy call, and follow the Messengers.’ ’Ah, but did you not swear aforetime there should be no removing for you?

Name: Abraham
Verse: And you dwelt in the dwelling-places of those who wronged themselves, and it became clear to you how We did with them, and how We struck similitudes for you.

Name: Abraham
Verse: They devised their devising, and their devising is known to God; though their devising were such as to remove mountains.’

Name: Abraham
Verse: So do not deem that God will fail in His promise to His Messengers; surely God is All-mighty, Vengeful.

Name: Abraham
Verse: Upon the day the earth shall be changed to other than the earth, and the heavens and they sally forth unto God, the One, the Omnipotent.

Name: Abraham
Verse: And thou shalt see the sinners that day coupled in fetters,

Name: Abraham
Verse: of pitch their shirts, their faces enveloped by the Fire,

Name: Abraham
Verse: that God may recompense every soul for its earnings; surely God is swift at the reckoning.

Name: Abraham
Verse: This is a Message to be delivered to mankind that they may be warned by it, and that they may know that He is One God, and that all possessed of minds may remember.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Alif Lam Ra. Those are the signs of the Book and of a manifest Koran.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Perchance the unbelievers will wish that they had surrendered:

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: leave them to eat, and to take their joy, and to be bemused by hope; certainly they will soon know!

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Never a city have We destroyed, but it had a known decree,

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: and no nation outstrips its term, nor do they put it back.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: They say: ’Thou, upon whom the Remembrance is sent down, thou art assuredly possessed!

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Why dost thou not bring the angels unto us, if thou speakest truly?’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: We send not down the angels, save with truth;

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: then they would not be respited. It is We who have sent down the Remembrance, and We watch over it.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Indeed, We sent Messengers before thee, among the factions of the ancients,

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: and not a single Messenger came to them, but they mocked at him;

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: even so We cause it to enter into the hearts of the sinners --

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: they believe not in it, though the wont of the ancients is already gone.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Though We opened to them a gate in heaven, and still they mounted through it,

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: yet would they say, ’Our eyes have been dazzled; nay, we are a people bewitched!’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: We have set in heaven constellations and decked them out fair to the beholders,

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: and guarded them from every accursed Satan

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: excepting such as listens by stealth -- and he is pursued by a manifest flame.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: And the earth -- We stretched it forth, and cast on it firm mountains, and We caused to grow therein of every thing justly weighed,

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: and there appointed for you livelihood, and for those you provide not for.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Naught is there, but its treasuries are with Us, and We send it not down but in a known measure.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: And We loose the winds fertilising, and We send down out of heaven water, then We give it to you to drink, and you are not its treasurers.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: It is We who give life, and make to die, and it is We who are the inheritors.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: We know the ones of you who press forward, and We know the laggards;

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: and it is thy Lord shall muster them, and He is All-wise, All-knowing.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Surely We created man of a clay of mud moulded,

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: and the jinn created We before of fire flaming.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: And when thy Lord said to the angels, ’See, I am creating a mortal of a clay of mud moulded.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: When I have shaped him, and breathed My spirit in him, fall you down, bowing before him!’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Then the angels bowed themselves all together,

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: save Iblis; he refused to be among those bowing.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Said He, ’What ails thee, Iblis, that thou art not among those bowing?’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Said he, ’I would never bow myself before a mortal whom Thou hast created of a clay of mud moulded.’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Said He, ’Then go thou forth hence; thou art accursed.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Upon thee shall rest the curse, till the Day of Doom.’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Said he, ’My Lord, respite me till the day they shall be raised.’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Said He, ’Thou art among the ones that are respited

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: unto the day of a known time.’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Said he, ’My Lord, for Thy perverting me I shall deck all fair to them in the earth, and I shall pervert them, all together,

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: excepting those Thy servants among them that are devoted.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Said He, ’This is for Me a straight path:

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: over My servants thou shalt have no authority, except those that follow thee,

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: being perverse; Gehenna shall be their promised land all together.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Seven gates it has, and unto each gate a set portion of them belongs.’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: But the godfearing shall be amidst gardens and fountains:

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: ’Enter you them, in peace and security!’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: We shall strip away all rancour that is in their breasts; as brothers they shall be upon couches set face to face;

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: no fatigue there shall smite them, neither shall they ever be driven forth from there.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Tell My servants I am the All-forgiving, the All-compassionate,

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: and that My chastisement is the painful chastisement.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: And tell them of the guests of Abraham,

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: when they entered unto him, saying, ’Peace!’ He said, ’Behold, we are afraid of you.’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: They said, ’Be not afraid; behold, we give thee good tidings of a cunning boy.’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: He said, ’What, do you give me good tidings, though old age has smitten me? Of what do you

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: give me good tidings?’ They said, ’We give thee good tidings of truth. Be not of those that despair.’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: He said, ’And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord, excepting those that are astray?’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: He said, ’And what is your business, envoys?’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: They said, ’We have been sent unto a people of sinners,

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: excepting the folk of Lot; them we shall deliver

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: all together, excepting his wife -- we have decreed, she shall surely be of those that tarry.’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: So, when the envoys came to the folk of Lot,

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: he said, ’Surely you are a people unknown to me!’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: They said, ’Nay, but we have brought thee that concerning which they were doubting.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: We have come to thee with the truth, and assuredly we speak truly.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: So set forth, thou with thy family, in a watch of the night, and follow after the backs of them, and let not any one of you turn round; and depart unto the place you are commanded.’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: And We decreed for him that commandment, that the last remnant of those should be cut off in the morning.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: And the people of the city came rejoicing.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: He said, ’These are my guests; put me not to shame,

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: and fear God, and do not degrade me.’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: They said, ’Have we not forbidden thee all beings?’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: He said, ’These are my daughters, if you would be doing.’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: By thy life, they wandered blindly in their dazzlement,

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: and the Cry seized them at the sunrise,

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: and We turned it uppermost nethermost and rained on it stones of baked clay.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Surely in that are signs for such as mark;

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: surely it is on a way yet remaining;

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: surely in that is a sign for believers.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Certainly the dwellers in the Thicket were evildoers,

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: and We took vengeance on them. The two of them were upon a roadway manifest.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: The dwellers in El-Hijr cried lies to the Envoys.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: We brought them. Our signs, and they turned away from them.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: They were hewing the mountains into houses, therein dwelling securely;

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: and the Cry seized them in the morning;

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: that they earned did not avail them.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: We created not the heavens and the earth, and all that is between them, save in truth. Surely the Hour is coming; so pardon thou, with a gracious pardoning.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Surely thy Lord, He is the All-creator, the All-knowing.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: We have given thee seven of the oft-repeated, and the mighty Koran.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Stretch not thine eyes to that We have given pairs of them to enjoy; and do not sorrow for them, and lower thy wing unto the believers,

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: and say, ’Surely, I am the manifest warner.’

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: So We sent it down to the partitioners,

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: who have broken the Koran into fragments.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Now by thy Lord, We shall surely question them all together

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: concerning that they were doing.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: So shout that thou art commanded and turn thou away from the idolaters.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: We suffice thee against the mockers,

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: even against those who set up with God another god. Certainly they will soon know!

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: We know indeed thy breast is straitened by the things they say.

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: Proclaim thy Lord’s praise, and be of those that bow,

Name: Al-Hijr
Verse: and serve thy Lord, until the Certain comes to thee.

Name: The Bee
Verse: God’s command comes; so seek not to hasten it. Glory be to Him! High be He exalted above that they associate with Him!

Name: The Bee
Verse: He sends down the angels with the Spirit of His command upon whomsoever He will among His servants, saying: Give you warning that there is no God hut I; so fear you Me!

Name: The Bee
Verse: He created the heavens and the earth in truth; high be He exalted above that they associate With Him!

Name: The Bee
Verse: He created man of a sperm-drop; and, behold, he is a manifest adversary.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And the cattle -- He created them for you; in them is warmth, and uses various, and of them you eat,

Name: The Bee
Verse: and there is beauty in them for you, when you bring them home to rest and when you drive them forth abroad to pasture;

Name: The Bee
Verse: and they bear your loads unto a land that you never would reach, excepting with great distress. Surely your Lord is All-clement, All-compassionate.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And horses, and mules, and asses, for you to ride, and as an adornment; and He creates what you know not.

Name: The Bee
Verse: God’s it is to show the way; and some do swerve from it. If He willed, He would have guided you all together.

Name: The Bee
Verse: It is He who sends down to you out of heaven water of which you have to drink, and of which trees, for you to pasture your herds,

Name: The Bee
Verse: and thereby He brings forth for you crops, and olives, and palms, and vines, and all manner of fruit. Surely in that is a sign for a people who reflect.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And He subjected to you the night and day, and the sun and moon; and the stars are subjected by His command. Surely in that are signs for a people who understand.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And that which He has multiplied for you in the earth of diverse hues. Surely in that is a sign for a people who remember.

Name: The Bee
Verse: It is He who subjected to you the sea, that you may eat of it fresh flesh, and bring forth out of it ornaments for you to wear; and thou mayest see the ships cleaving through it; and that you may seek of His bounty, and so haply you will be thankful.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And He cast on the earth firm mountains, lest it shake with you, and rivers and ways; so haply you will be guided;

Name: The Bee
Verse: and waymarks; and by the stars they are guided.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Is He who creates as he who does not create? Will you not remember?

Name: The Bee
Verse: If you count God’s blessing, you will never number it; surely God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And God knows what you keep secret and what you publish.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And those they call upon, apart from God, created nothing, and themselves are created,

Name: The Bee
Verse: dead, not alive; and are not aware when they shall be raised.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Your God is One God. And they who believe not in the world to come, their hearts deny, and they have waxed proud.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Without a doubt God knows what they keep secret and what they publish; He loves not those that wax proud.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And when it is said to them, ’What has your Lord sent down?’ they say, ’Fairy-tales of the ancients.’

Name: The Bee
Verse: That they may bear their loads complete on the Day of Resurrection, and some of the loads of those that they lead astray without any knowledge. O evil the load they bear!

Name: The Bee
Verse: Those that were before them contrived; then God came upon their building from the foundations, and the roof fell down on them from over them, and the chastisement came upon them from whence they were not aware.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Then on the Day of Resurrection He will degrade them, saying, ’Where are My associates concerning which you made a breach together?’ Those that were given the knowledge will say, ’Degradation today and evil are on the unbelievers,

Name: The Bee
Verse: whom the angels take while still they are wronging themselves.’ Then they will offer surrender: ’We were doing nothing evil. ’Nay; but surety God has knowledge of the things you did.

Name: The Bee
Verse: So enter the gates of Gehenna, there to dwell forever.’ Evil is the lodging of those that wax proud.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And it shall be said to the godfearing, ’What has your Lord sent down?’ They will say, ’Good! For those who do good in this world good; and surely the abode of the world to come is better; excellent is the abode of the godfearing --

Name: The Bee
Verse: Gardens of Eden they shall enter, underneath which rivers flow, wherein they shall have all they will. So God recompenses the godfearing,

Name: The Bee
Verse: whom the angels take while they are goodly, saying, ’Peace be on you! Enter Paradise for that you were doing.’

Name: The Bee
Verse: Do they look for aught but that the angels shall come to them, or thy Lord’s command shall come? So did those before them, and God wronged them not, but themselves they wronged.

Name: The Bee
Verse: So the evil things that they wrought. smote them, and they were encompassed by that they mocked at.

Name: The Bee
Verse: The idolators say, ’If God had willed we would not have served; apart from Him, anything, neither we nor our fathers, nor would we have forbidden, apart from Him, anything.’ So did those before them; yet is aught for the Messengers, but to deliver the manifest Message?

Name: The Bee
Verse: Indeed, We sent forth among every nation a Messenger,; saying: ’Serve you God, and eschew idols.’ Then some. of them God guided, and some were justly disposed to error. So journey in the land, and behold how was the end of them that cried lies.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Though thou art ever so eager to guide them, God guides not those whom He leads astray; they have no helpers.

Name: The Bee
Verse: have sworn by God the most earnest oaths God will never raise up him who dies; nay, it is a promise binding upon Him, but most men know not,

Name: The Bee
Verse: so that He may make clear to them that whereon they were at variance, and that the unbelievers may know that they were truly liars.

Name: The Bee
Verse: The only words We say to a thing, when We desire it, is that We say to it ’Be,’ and it is.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And those that emigrated in God’s cause after they were wronged -- We shall surely lodge them in this world in a goodly lodging, and the wage of the world to come is greater, did they but know;

Name: The Bee
Verse: even such men as are patient, and put their trust in their Lord.

Name: The Bee
Verse: We sent not any before thee, except men to whom We revealed: ’Question the people of the Remembrance, if it should be that you do not know --

Name: The Bee
Verse: with the clear signs, and the Psalms; and We have sent down to thee the Remembrance that thou mayest make clear to mankind what was sent down to them; and so haply they will reflect.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Do they feel secure, those who devise evil things, that God will not cause the earth to swallow them, or that the chastisement will not come upon them, from whence they are not aware?

Name: The Bee
Verse: Or that He will not seize them in their going to and fro, and they will not be able to frustrate Him?

Name: The Bee
Verse: Or that He will not seize them, little by little destroying them? Surely thy Lord is All-clement, All-compassionate.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Have they not regarded all things that God has created casting their shadows to the right and to the left, bowing themselves before God in all lowliness?

Name: The Bee
Verse: To God bows everything in the heavens, and every creature crawling on the earth, and the angels. They have not waxed proud;

Name: The Bee
Verse: they fear their Lord above them, and they do what they are commanded.

Name: The Bee
Verse: God says: ’Take not to you two gods. He is only One God; so have awe of Me.’

Name: The Bee
Verse: To Him belongs all that is in the heavens and earth; His is the religion for ever. Then will you fear other than God?

Name: The Bee
Verse: Whatsoever blessing you have, it comes from God; then when affliction visits you it is unto Him that you groan.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Then, when He removes the affliction from you, lo, a party of you assign associates to their Lord,

Name: The Bee
Verse: that they may show unthankfulness for that We have given them. So take your joy; certainly you will soon know!

Name: The Bee
Verse: And they appoint a share of that We have provided them to what they know not. By God, you shall be questioned as to that you forged.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And they assign to God daughters; glory be to Him! -- and they have their desire;

Name: The Bee
Verse: and when any of them is given the good tidings of a girl, his face is darkened and he chokes inwardly,

Name: The Bee
Verse: as he hides him from the people because of the evil of the good tidings that have been given unto him, whether he shall preserve it in humiliation, or trample it; into the dust. Ah, evil is that they judge!

Name: The Bee
Verse: Those who believe not in the world to come, theirs is the evil likeness; God’s is the loftiest likeness; He is the All-mighty, the All-wise.

Name: The Bee
Verse: If God should take men to task for their evildoing, He would not leave on the earth one creature that crawls; but He is deferring them to a term stated; and when their term is come they shall not put it back by a single hour nor put it forward.

Name: The Bee
Verse: They assign to God that they themselves dislike; and their tongues describe falsehood, that the reward most fair shall be theirs. Without any doubt theirs shall be the Fire, and they are hastened in.

Name: The Bee
Verse: By God, assuredly We sent Messengers to nations before thee, but Satan decked out fair to them their deeds; he is their protector today, and there yet awaits them a painful chastisement.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And We have not sent down upon thee the Book except that thou mayest make clear to them that whereon they were at variance, and as a guidance and as a mercy to a people who believe.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And it is God who sends down out of heaven water, and therewith revives the earth after it is dead. Surely in that is a sign for a people who have ears.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And surely in the cattle there is a lesson for you; We give you to drink of what is in their bellies, between filth and blood, pure milk, sweet to drinkers.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And of the fruits of the palms and the vines, you take therefrom an intoxicant and a provision fair. Surely in that is a sign for a people who understand.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And thy Lord revealed unto the bees, saying: ’Take unto yourselves, of the mountains, houses, and of the trees, and of what they are building.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Then eat of all manner of fruit, and follow the ways of your Lord easy to go upon.’ Then comes there forth out of their bellies a drink of diverse hues wherein is healing for men. Surely in that is a sign for a people who reflect.

Name: The Bee
Verse: God created you; then He will gather you to Him; and some of you will be kept back unto the vilest state of life, that after knowing somewhat, they may know nothing; God is All-knowing, All-powerful.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And God has preferred some of you over others in provision;, but those that were preferred shall not give over their provision to that their right hands possess, so that they may be equal therein. What, and do they deny God’s blessing?

Name: The Bee
Verse: God has appointed for you of yourselves wives, and He has appointed for you of your wives sons and grandsons, and He has provided you of the good things. What, do they believe in vanity, and do they disbelieve in God’s blessing?

Name: The Bee
Verse: And do they serve, apart from God, that which has no power to provide them anything from the heavens and the earth and can do nothing?

Name: The Bee
Verse: So strike not any similitudes for God; surely God knows, and you know not.

Name: The Bee
Verse: God has struck a similitude: a servant possessed by his master, having no power over anything, and one whom We have provided of Ourselves with a provision fair, and he expends of it secretly and openly. Are they equal? Praise belongs to God! Nay, most of them know not.

Name: The Bee
Verse: God has struck a similitude: two men, one of them dumb, having no power over anything, and he is a burden upon his master -- wherever he despatches him, he brings no good. Is he equal to him who bids to justice, and is on a straight path?

Name: The Bee
Verse: To God belongs the Unseen in the heavens and in the earth. And the matter of the Hour is as a twinkling of the eye, or nearer. Surely God is powerful over everything.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And it is God who brought you forth from your mothers’ wombs, and He appointed for you hearing, and sight, and hearts, that haply so you will be thankful.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Have they not regarded the birds, that are subjected in the air of heaven? Naught holds them but God; surely in that are signs for’ a people who believe.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And it is God who has appointed a place of rest for you of your houses, and He has appointed for you of the skins of the cattle houses you find light on the day that you journey, and on the day you abide, and of their wool, and of their fur, and of their hair furnishing and an enjoyment for a while.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And it is God who has appointed for you coverings of the things He created, and He has appointed for you of the mountains refuges, and He has appointed for you shirts to protect you from the heat, and shirts to protect you from your own violence. Even so He perfects His blessing upon you, that haply you will surrender.

Name: The Bee
Verse: So, if they turn their backs, thine it is only to deliver the manifest Message.

Name: The Bee
Verse: They recognize the blessing of God, then they deny it, and the most of them are the unthankful.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And the day We shall raise up from every nation a witness, then to the unbelievers no leave shall be given, nor shall they be suffered to make amends.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And when the evildoers behold the chastisement, it shall not be lightened for them, and no respite shall be given them.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And when the idolaters behold their associates, they shall say, ’Our Lord, these are our associates on whom we called apart from Thee.’ They will fling back at them the saying, ’Surely, you are truly liars.’

Name: The Bee
Verse: And they will offer God surrender that day, and there shall go astray from them that they were forging.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Those that disbelieve and bar from the way of God -- them We shall give increase of chastisement upon chastisement, for that they were doing corruption.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And the day We shall raise up from every nation a witness against them from amongst them, and We shall bring thee as a witness against those. And We have sent down on thee the Book making clear everything, and as a guidance and a mercy, and as good tidings to those who surrender.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Surely God bids to justice and good-doing and giving to kinsmen; and He forbids indecency, dishonour, and insolence, admonishing you, so that haply you will remember.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Fulfil God’s covenant, when you make covenant, and break not the oaths after they have been confirmed, and you have made God your surety; surely God knows the things you do.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And be not as a woman who breaks her thread, after it is firmly spun, into fibres, by taking your oaths as mere mutual deceit, one nation being more numerous than another nation. God only tries you thereby; and certainly He will make clear to you upon the Day of Resurrection that whereon you were at variance.

Name: The Bee
Verse: If God had willed, He would have made you one nation; but He leads astray whom He will, and guides whom He will; and you will surely be questioned about the things you wrought.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Take not your oaths as mere mutual deceit, lest any foot should slip after it has stood firm, and you should taste evil, for that you barred from the way of God, and lest there should await you a mighty chastisement.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And do not sell the covenant of God for a small price; surely what is with God -- that is better for you, did you but know.

Name: The Bee
Verse: What is with you comes to an end, but what is with God abides; and surely We shall recompense those who were patient their wage, according to the best of what they did.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And whosoever does a righteous deed, be it male or female, believing, We shall assuredly give him to live a goodly life; and We shall recompense them their wage, according to the best of what they did.

Name: The Bee
Verse: When thou recitest the Koran, seek refuge in God from the accursed Satan;

Name: The Bee
Verse: he has no authority over those who believe and trust in their Lord;

Name: The Bee
Verse: his authority is over those who take him for their friend and ascribe associates to God.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And when We exchange a verse in the place of another verse and God knows very well what He is sending down -- they say, ’Thou art a mere forger!’ Nay, but the most of them have no knowledge.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Say: ’The Holy Spirit sent it down from thy Lord in truth, and to confirm those who believe, and to be a guidance and good tidings to those who surrender.’

Name: The Bee
Verse: And We know very well that they say, ’Only a mortal is teaching him.’ The speech of him at whom they hint is barbarous; and this is speech Arabic, manifest.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Those that believe not in the signs of God, God will not guide; there awaits them a painful chastisement.

Name: The Bee
Verse: They only forge falsehood, who believe not in the signs of God, and those -- they are the liars.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Whoso disbelieves in God, after he has believed -- excepting him who has been compelled, and his heart is still at rest in his belief -- but whosoever’s breast is expanded in unbelief, upon them shall rest anger from God, and there awaits them a mighty chastisement;

Name: The Bee
Verse: that, because they have preferred the present life over the world to come, and that God guides not the people of the unbelievers.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Those -- God has set a seal on their hearts, and their hearing, and their eyes, and those -- they are the heedless ones;

Name: The Bee
Verse: without a doubt, in the world to come they will be the losers.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Then, surely thy Lord -- unto those who have emigrated after persecution, then struggled and were patient -- surely thy Lord thereafter is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

Name: The Bee
Verse: The day that every soul shall come disputing in its own behalf; and every soul shall be paid in full for what it wrought, and they shall not be wronged.

Name: The Bee
Verse: God has struck a similitude: a city that was secure, at rest, its provision coming to it easefully from every place, then it was unthankful for the blessings of God; so God let it taste the garment of hunger and of fear, for the things that they were working.

Name: The Bee
Verse: There came indeed to them a Messenger from amongst them, but they cried him lies; so they were seized by the chastisement while they were evildoers.

Name: The Bee
Verse: So eat of what God has provided you lawful and good; and be you thankful for the blessing of God, if it be Him that you serve.

Name: The Bee
Verse: These things only He has forbidden you: carrion, blood, the flesh of swine, what has been hallowed to other than God. Yet whoso is constrained, not desiring nor transgressing, God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And do not say, as to what your tongues falsely describe, ’This is lawful; and this is forbidden, so that you may forge against God falsehood; surely those who forge against God falsehood shall not prosper.

Name: The Bee
Verse: A little enjoyment, then for them awaits a painful chastisement.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And those of Jewry -- We have forbidden them what We related to thee before, and We wronged them not, but they wronged themselves.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Then, surely thy Lord -- unto those who did evil in ignorance, then repented after that and put things right -- surely thy Lord thereafter is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Surely, Abraham was a nation obedient unto God, a man of pure faith and no idolater,

Name: The Bee
Verse: showing thankfulness for His blessings; He chose him, and He guided him to a straight path.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And We gave him in this world good, and in the world to come he shall be among the righteous.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Then We revealed to thee: ’Follow thou the creed of Abraham, a man of pure faith and no idolater.’

Name: The Bee
Verse: The Sabbath was only appointed for those who were at variance thereon; surely thy Lord will decide between them on the Day of Resurrection, touching their differences.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Call thou to the way of thy Lord with wisdom and good admonition, and dispute with them in the better way. Surely thy Lord knows very well those who have gone astray from His way, and He knows very well those who are guided.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And if you chastise, chastise even as you have been chastised; and yet assuredly if you are patient, better it is for those patient.

Name: The Bee
Verse: And be patient; yet is thy patience only with the help of God. And do not sorrow for them, nor be thou straitened for what they devise.

Name: The Bee
Verse: Surely God is with those who are godfearing, and those who are good-doers.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Glory be to Him, who carried His servant by night from the Holy Mosque to the Further Mosque the precincts of which We have blessed, that We might show him some of Our signs. He is the All-hearing, the All-seeing.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And We gave Moses the Book, and made it a guidance to the Children of Israel: ’Take not unto yourselves any guardian apart from Me.’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: The seed of those We bore with Noah; he was a thankful servant.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And We decreed for the Children of Israel in the Book: ’You shall do corruption in the earth twice, and you shall ascend exceeding high.’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: So, when the promise of the first of these came to pass, We sent against you servants of Ours, men of great might, and they went through the habitations, and it was a promise performed.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Then We gave back to you the turn to prevail over them, and We succoured you with wealth and children, and We made you a greater host.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: ’If you do good, it is your own souls you do good to, and if you do evil it is to them likewise.’ Then, when the promise of the second came to pass, We sent against you Our servants to discountenance you, and to enter the Temple, as they entered it the first time, and to destroy utterly that which they ascended to.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Perchance your Lord will have mercy upon you; but if you return, We shall return; and We have made Gehenna a prison for the unbelievers.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Surely this Koran guides to the way that is straightest and gives good tidings to the believers who do deeds of righteousness, that theirs shall be a great wage,

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: and that those who do not believe in the world to come -- we have prepared for them a painful chastisement.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Man prays for evil, as he prays for good; man is ever hasty.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: We have appointed the night and the day as two signs; then We have blotted out the sign of the night, and made the sign of the day to see, and that you may seek bounty from your Lord, and that you may know the number of the years, and the reckoning; and everything We have distinguished very distinctly.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And every man -- We have fastened to him his bird of omen upon his neck; and We shall bring forth for him, on the Day of Resurrection, a book he shall find spread wide open.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: ’Read thy book! Thy soul suffices thee this day as a reckoner against thee.’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Whosoever is guided, is only guided to his own gain, and whosoever goes astray, it is only to his own loss; no soul laden bears the load of another. We never chastise, until We send forth a Messenger.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And when We desire to destroy a city, We command its men who live at ease, and they commit ungodliness therein, then the Word is realized against it, and We destroy it utterly.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: How many generations We have destroyed after Noah! Thy Lord suffices as one who is aware of and sees the sins of His servants.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Whosoever desires this hasty world, We hasten for him therein what We will unto whomsoever We desire; then We appoint for him Gehenna wherein he shall roast, condemned and rejected.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And whosoever desires the world to come and strives after it as he should, being a believer -- those, their striving shall be thanked.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Each We succour, these and those, from thy Lord’s gift; and thy Lord’s gift is not confined.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Behold, how We prefer some of them over others! And surely the world to come is greater in ranks, greater in preferment.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Set not up with God another god, or thou wilt sit condemned and forsaken.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Thy Lord has decreed you shall not serve any but Him, and to be good to parents, whether one or both of them attains old age with thee; say not to them ’Fie’ neither chide them, but speak unto them words respectful,

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: and lower to them the wing of humbleness out of mercy and say; ’My Lord, have mercy upon them, as they raised me up when I was little.’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Your Lord knows very well what is in your hearts if you are righteous, for He is All-forgiving to those who are penitent.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And give the kinsman his right, and the needy, and the traveller; and never squander;

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: the squanderers are brothers of Satan, and Satan is unthankful to his Lord.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: But if thou turnest from them, seeking mercy from thy Lord that thou hopest for, then speak unto them gentle words.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And keep not thy hand chained to thy neck, nor outspread it widespread altogether, or thou wilt sit reproached and denuded.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Surely thy Lord outspreads and straitens His provision unto whom He will; surely He is aware of and sees His servants.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And slay not your children for fear of poverty; We will provide for you and them; surely the slaying of them is a grievous sin.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And approach not fornication; surely it is an indecency, and evil as a way.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And slay not the soul God has forbidden, except by right. Whosoever is slain unjustly, We have appointed to his next-of-kin authority; but let him not exceed in slaying; he shall be helped.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And do not approach the property of the orphan save in the fairest manner, until he is of age. And fulfil the covenant; surely the covenant shall be questioned of.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And fill up the measure when you measure, and weigh with the straight balance; that is better and fairer in the issue.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And pursue not that thou hast no knowledge of; the hearing, the sight, the heart -- all of those shall be questioned of.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And walk not in the earth exultantly; certainly thou wilt never tear the earth open, nor attain the mountains in height.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: All of that -- the wickedness of it is hateful in the sight of thy Lord has revealed to thee:

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: That is of the wisdom thy Lord set not up with God another god, or thou wilt be cast into Gehenna, reproached and rejected.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: What, has your Lord favoured you with sons and taken to Himself from the angels females? Surely it is a monstrous thing you are saying!

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: We have turned about in this Koran, that they may remember; and it increases them only in aversion.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Say: ’If there had been other gods with Him, as they say, in that case assuredly they would have sought a way unto the Lord of the Throne.’ Glory be to Him!

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: High indeed be He exalted above that they say!

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: The seven heavens and the earth, and whosoever in them is, extol Him; nothing is, that does not proclaim His praise, but you do not understand their extolling. Surely He is All-clement, All-forgiving.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: When thou recitest the Koran, We place between thee, and those who do not believe in the world to come, a curtain obstructing,

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: and We lay veils upon their hearts lest they understand it, and in their ears heaviness. And when thou mentionest thy Lord only in the Koran, they turn in their traces in aversion.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: We know very well how they listen when they listen to thee, and when they conspire, when the evildoers say, ’You are only following a man bewitched!’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Behold, how they strike similitudes for thee, and go astray, and cannot find a way!

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: They say, ’What, when we are bones and broken bits, shall we really be raised up again in a new creation?’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Say: ’Let you be stones, or iron,

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: or some creation yet more monstrous in your minds!’ Then they will say, ’Who will bring us back?’ Say: ’He who originated you the first time.’ Then they will shake their heads at thee, and they will say, ’When will it be?’ Say: ’It is possible that it may be nigh,

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: on the day when He will call you, and you will answer praising Him, and you will think you have but tarried a little.’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And say to My servants, that they say words that are kindlier. For surely Satan provokes strife between them, and Satan is ever a manifest foe to man.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Your Lord knows you very well; if He will, He will have mercy on you, or, if He will, He will chastise you. We sent thee not to be a guardian over them.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And thy Lord knows very well all who are in the heavens and the earth; and We have preferred some Prophets over others; and We gave to David Psalms.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Say: ’Call on those you asserted apart from Him; they have no power to remove affliction from you, or to transfer it.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Those they call upon are themselves seeking the means to come to their Lord, which of them shall be nearer; they hope for His mercy, and fear His chastisement. Surely thy Lord’s chastisement is a thing to beware of.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: No city is there, but We shall destroy it before the Day of Resurrection, or We shall chastise it with a terrible chastisement; that is in the Book inscribed.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Naught prevented Us from sending the signs but that the ancients cried lies to them; and We brought Thamood the She-camel visible, but they did her wrong. And We do not send the signs, except to frighten.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And when We said to thee, ’Surely thy Lord encompasses men,’ and We made the vision that We showed thee and the tree cursed in the Koran to be only a trial for men; and We frighten them, but it only increases them in great insolence.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And when We said to the angels, ’Bow yourselves to Adam’; so they bowed themselves, save Iblis; he said,, ’Shall I bow myself unto one Thou hast created of clay?’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: He said, ’What thinkest Thou? This whom Thou hast honoured above me -- if Thou deferrest me to the Day of Resurrection I shall assuredly master his seed, save a few.’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Said He, ’Depart! Those of them that follow thee -- surely Gehenna shall be your recompense, an ample recompense!

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And startle whomsoever of them thou canst with thy voice; and rally against them thy horsemen and thy foot, and share with them in their wealth and their children, and promise them!’ But Satan promises them naught, except delusion.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: ’Surely over My servants thou shalt have no authority.’ Thy Lord suffices as a guardian.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Your Lord it is who drives for you the ships on the sea that you may seek His bounty; surely He is All-compassionate towards you.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And when affliction visits you upon the sea, then there go astray those on whom you call except Him; and when He delivers you to land, you turn away; man is ever unthankful.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Do you feel secure that He will not cause the shore to swallow you up, or loose against you a squall of pebbles, then you will find no guardian for you?

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Or do you feel secure that He will not send you back into it a second time, and loose against you a hurricane of wind and drown you for your thanklessness, then you will find no prosecutor for you against Us?

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: We have honoured the Children of Adam and carried them on land and sea, and provided them with good things, and preferred them greatly over many of those We created.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: On the day when We shall call all men with their record, and whoso is given his book in his right hand -- those shall read their book, and they shall not be wronged a single date-thread.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And whosoever is blind in this world shall be blind in the world to come, and he shall be even further astray from the way.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Indeed they were near to seducing thee from that We revealed to thee, that thou mightest forge against Us another, and then they would surely have taken thee as a friend;

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: and had We not confirmed thee, surely thou wert near to inclining unto them a very little;

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: then would We have let thee taste the double of life and the double of death; and then thou wouldst have found none to help thee against Us.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Indeed they were near to startling thee from the land, to expel thee from it, and then they would have tarried after thee only a little --

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: the wont of those We sent before thee of Our Messengers; thou wilt find no change to Our wont.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Perform the prayer at the sinking of the sun to the darkening of the night and the recital of dawn; surely the recital of dawn is witnessed.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And as for the night, keep vigil a part of it, as a work of supererogation for thee; it may be that thy Lord will raise thee up to a laudable station.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And say: ’My Lord, lead me in with a just ingoing, and lead me out with a just outgoing; grant me authority from Thee, to help me.’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And say: ’The truth has come, and falsehood has vanished away; surely falsehood is ever certain to vanish.’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And We send down, of the Koran, that which is a healing and a mercy to the believers; and the unbelievers it increases not, except in loss.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And when We bless man, he turns away, and withdraws aside; but when evil visits him, he is in despair.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Say: ’Every man works according to his own manner; but your Lord knows very well what man is best guided as to the way.’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: They will question thee concerning the Spirit. Say: ’The Spirit is of the bidding of my Lord. You have been given of knowledge nothing except a little.’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: If We willed, We could take away that We have revealed to thee, then thou wouldst find none thereover to guard thee against Us,

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: excepting by some mercy of thy Lord; surly His favour to thee is great.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Say: ’If men and jinn banded together to produce the like of this Koran, they would never produce its like, not though they backed one another.’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: We have indeed turned about for men in this Koran every manner of similitude; yet most men refuse all but unbelief.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: They say, ’We will not believe thee till thou makest a spring to gush forth from the earth for us,

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: or till thou possessest a garden of plants and vines, and thou makest rivers to gush forth abundantly all amongst it,

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: or till thou makest heaven to fall, as thou assertest, on us in fragments, or thou bringest God and the angels as a surety,

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: or till thou possessest a house of gold ornament, or till thou goest up into heaven; and we will not believe thy going up till thou bringest down on us a book that we may read. Say: ’Glory be to my Lord. Am I aught but a mortal, a Messenger?’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And naught prevented men from believing when the guidance came to them, but that they said, ’Has God sent forth a mortal as Messenger?’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Say: ’Had there been in the earth angels walking. at peace, We would have sent down upon them out of heaven an angel as Messenger.’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Say: ’God suffices as a witness between me and you; surely He is aware of and sees His servants.’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Whomsoever God guides, he is rightly guided; and whom He leads astray -- thou wilt not find for them protectors, apart from Him. And We shall muster them on the Resurrection Day upon their faces, blind, dumb, deaf; their refuge shall be Gehenna, and whensoever it abates We shall increase for them the Blaze.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: That is their recompense because they disbelieved in Our signs and said, ’What, when we are bones and broken bits, shall we really be raised up again in a new creation?’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Have they not seen that God, who created the heavens and earth, is powerful to create the like of them? He has appointed for them a term, no doubt of it; yet the unbelievers refuse all but unbelief.

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: Say: ’If you possessed the treasuries of my Lord’s mercy, yet would you hold back for fear of expending; and man is ever niggardly.’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: And We gave Moses nine signs, clear signs. Ask the Children of Israel when he came to them, and Pharaoh said to him, ’Moses, I think thou art bewitched.’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: He said, ’Indeed thou knowest that none sent these down, except the Lord of the heavens and earth, as clear proofs; and, Pharaoh, I think thou art accursed.’

Name: The Children of Israel
Verse: He desired to startle them from the land; and We drowned him and those with him, all together.

Name: The Children of Israel
