Verse: And what you give in usury, that it may increase upon the people’s wealth, increases not with God; but what you give in alms, desiring God’s Face, those -- they receive recompense manifold.

Name: The Romans
Verse: God is He that created you, then He provided for you, then He shall make you dead, then He shall give you life; is there any of your associates does aught of that? Glory be to Him! High be He exalted above that they associate!

Name: The Romans
Verse: Corruption has appeared in the land and sea, for that men’s own hands have earned, that He may let them taste some part of that which they have done, that haply so they may return.

Name: The Romans
Verse: Say: ’Journey in the land, then behold how was the end of those that were before; most of them were idolaters.’

Name: The Romans
Verse: So set thy face to the true religion before there comes a day from God that cannot be turned back; on that day they shall be sundered apart.

Name: The Romans
Verse: Whoso disbelieves, his unbelief shall be charged against him; and whosoever does righteousness for themselves they are making provision,

Name: The Romans
Verse: that He may recompense those who believe and do righteous deeds of His bounty; He loves not the unbelievers.

Name: The Romans
Verse: And of His signs is that He looses the winds, bearing good tidings and that He may let you taste of His mercy, and that the ships may run at His commandment, and that you may seek His bounty; haply so you will be thankful.

Name: The Romans
Verse: Indeed, We sent before thee Messengers unto their people, and they brought them the clear signs; then We took vengeance upon those who sinned; and it was ever a duty incumbent upon Us, to help the believers.

Name: The Romans
Verse: God is He that looses the winds, that stir up clouds; and He spreads them in heaven how He will, and shatters them; then thou seest the rain issuing out of the midst of them, and when He smites with it whomsoever of His servants He will, lo, they rejoice,

Name: The Romans
Verse: although before it was sent down on them before that they had been in despair.

Name: The Romans
Verse: So behold the marks of God’s mercy, how He quickens the earth after it was dead; surely He is the quickener of the dead, and He is powerful over everything.

Name: The Romans
Verse: But if We loose a wind, and they see it growing yellow, they remain after that unbelievers.

Name: The Romans
Verse: Thou shalt not make the dead to hear, neither shalt thou make the deaf to hear the call when they turn about, retreating.

Name: The Romans
Verse: Thou shalt not guide the blind out of their error neither shalt thou make any to hear except for such as believe in Our signs, and so surrender.

Name: The Romans
Verse: God is He that created you of weakness, then He appointed after weakness strength, then after strength He appointed weakness and grey hairs; He creates what He will, and He is the All-knowing, the All-powerful.

Name: The Romans
Verse: Upon the day when the Hour is come, the sinners shall swear they have not tarried above an hour; so they were perverted.

Name: The Romans
Verse: But those who have been given knowledge and faith shall say, ’You have tarried in God’s Book till the Day of the Upraising, This is the Day of the Upraising, but you did not know.’

Name: The Romans
Verse: So that day their excuses will not profit the evildoers, nor will they be suffered to make amends.

Name: The Romans
Verse: Indeed, We have struck for the people in this Koran every manner of similitude; and if thou bringest them a sign, those who are unbelievers will certainly say, ’You do nothing but follow falsehood.’

Name: The Romans
Verse: Even so God seals the hearts of those that know not.

Name: The Romans
Verse: So be thou patient; surely God’s promise is true; and let not those who have not sure faith make thee unsteady.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: Alif Lam Mim

Name: Luqmân
Verse: Those are the signs of the Wise Book

Name: Luqmân
Verse: for a guidance and a mercy to the good-doers

Name: Luqmân
Verse: who perform the prayer, and pay the alms, and have sure faith in the Hereafter.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: Those are upon guidance from their Lord; those are the prosperers.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: Some men there are who buy diverting talk to lead astray from the way of God without knowledge, and to take it in mockery; those -- there awaits them a humbling chastisement.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: And when Our signs are recited to such a man he turns away, waxing proud, as though he heard them not, and in his ears were heaviness; so give him good tidings of a painful chastisement.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: Surely those who believe, and do deeds of righteousness, there awaits them Gardens of Bliss

Name: Luqmân
Verse: therein to dwell forever -- God’s promise in truth; and He is the All-mighty, the All-wise.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: He created the heavens without pillars you can see, and He cast on the earth firm mountains, lest it shake with you, and He scattered abroad in it all manner of crawling thing. And We sent down out of heaven water, and caused to grow in it of every generous kind.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: This is God’s creation; now show me what those have created that are apart from Him! Nay, but the evildoers are in manifest error.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: Indeed, We gave Lokman wisdom: ’Give thanks to God. Whosoever gives thanks gives thanks only for his own soul’s good, and whosoever is ungrateful -- surely God is All-sufficient, All-laudable.’

Name: Luqmân
Verse: And when Lokman said to his son, admonishing him, ’O my son, do not associate others with God; to associate others with God is a mighty wrong.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: (And We have charged man concerning his parents -- his mother bore him in weakness upon weakness, and his weaning was in two years -- ’Be thankful to Me, and to thy parents; to Me is the homecoming.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: But if they strive with thee to make thee associate with Me that whereof thou hast no knowledge, then do not obey them. Keep them company honourable in this world; but follow the way of him who turns to Me. Then unto Me you shall return, and I shall tell you what you were doing.’)

Name: Luqmân
Verse: ’O my son, if it should be but the weight of one grain of mustard-seed, and though it be in a rock, or in the heavens, or in the earth, God shall bring it forth; surely God is All-subtle, All-aware.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: O my son, perform the prayer, and bid unto honour, and forbid dishonour. And bear patiently whatever may befall thee; surely that is true constancy.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: Turn not thy cheek away from men in scorn, and walk not in the earth exultantly; God loves not any man proud and boastful.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: Be modest in thy walk, and lower thy voice; the most hideous of voices is the ass’s.’

Name: Luqmân
Verse: Have you not seen how that God has subjected to you whatsoever is in the heavens and earth, and He has lavished on you His blessings, outward and inward? And among men there is such a one that disputes concerning God without knowledge or guidance, or an illuminating Book;

Name: Luqmân
Verse: and when it is said to them, ’Follow what God has sent down,’ they say, ’No; but we will follow such things as we found our fathers doing.’ What? Even though Satan were calling them to the chastisement of the burning?

Name: Luqmân
Verse: And whosoever submits his will to God, being a good-doer, has laid hold of the most firm handle; and unto God is the issue of all affairs.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: And whoso disbelieves, let not his disbelief grieve thee; unto Us they shall return, and We shall tell them what they did. Surely God knows all the thoughts within the breasts.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: To them We give enjoyment a little, then We compel them to a harsh chastisement.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: If thou askest them, ’Who created the heavens and the earth?’ they will say, ’God.’ Say: ’Praise belongs to God.’ Nay, but most of them have no knowledge.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: To God belongs all that is in the heavens and the earth; surely God -- He is the All-sufficient, the All-laudable.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: Though all the trees in the earth were pens, and the sea-seven seas after it to replenish it, yet would the Words of God not be spent. God is All-mighty, All-wise.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: Your creation and your upraising are as but as a single soul. God is All-hearing, All-seeing.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: Hast thou not seen how that God makes the night to enter into the day and makes the day to enter into the night. and He has subjected the sun and the moon, each of them running to a stated term, and that God is aware of what you do?

Name: Luqmân
Verse: That is because God -- He is the Truth, and that they call upon apart from Him -- that is the false; and for that God is the All-high, the All-great.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: Hast thou not seen how that the ships run upon the sea by the blessing of God, that He may show you some of His signs? Surely in that are signs for every man enduring, thankful.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: And when the waves cover them like shadows they call upon God, making their religion sincerely His; but when He has delivered them to the land, some of them are lukewarm. And none denies Our signs, except every ungrateful traitor.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: O men, fear your Lord, and dread a day when no father shall give satisfaction for his child, and no child shall give satisfaction for his father whatever. Surely God’s promise is true; so let not the present life delude you, and let not the Deluder delude you concerning God.

Name: Luqmân
Verse: Surely God -- He has knowledge of the Hour; He sends down the rain; He knows what is in the wombs. No soul knows what it shall earn tomorrow, and no soul knows in what land it shall die. Surely God is All-knowing, All-aware.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: Alif Lam Mim

Name: The Prostration
Verse: The sending down of the Book, wherein no doubt is, from the Lord of all Being.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: Or do they say, ’He has forged it’? Say: ’Not so; it is the truth from thy Lord that thou mayest warn a people to whom no warner came before thee, that haply so they may be guided.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: God is He that created the heavens and the earth, and what between them is, in six days, then seated Himself upon the Throne. Apart from Him, you have no protector neither mediator; will you not remember?

Name: The Prostration
Verse: He directs the affair from heaven to earth, then it goes up to Him in one day, whose measure is a thousand years of your counting.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: He is the knower of the Unseen and the Visible, the All-mighty, the All-compassionate,

Name: The Prostration
Verse: who has created all things well. And He originated the creation of man out of clay,

Name: The Prostration
Verse: then He fashioned his progeny of an extraction of mean water,

Name: The Prostration
Verse: then He shaped him, and breathed His spirit in him. And He appointed for you hearing, and sight, and hearts; little thanks you show.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: They say, ’What, when we have gone astray in the earth, shall we indeed be in a new creation?’ Nay, but they disbelieve in the encounter with their Lord.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: Say: ’Death’s angel, who has been charged with you, shall gather you, then to your Lord you shall be returned.’

Name: The Prostration
Verse: Ah, if thou couldst see the guilty hanging their heads before their Lord! ’Our Lord, we have seen and heard; now return us, that we may do righteousness, for we have sure faith.’

Name: The Prostration
Verse: ’If We had so willed, We could have given every soul its guidance; but now My Word is realized -- " Assuredly I shall fill Gehenna with jinn and men all together."

Name: The Prostration
Verse: So now taste, for that you forgot the encounter of this your day! We indeed have forgotten you. Taste the chastisement of eternity for that you were doing!’

Name: The Prostration
Verse: Only those believe in Our signs who, when they are reminded of them, fall down prostrate and proclaim the praise of their Lord, not waxing proud.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: Their sides shun their couches as they call on their Lord in fear and hope; and they expend of that We have provided them.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: No soul knows what comfort is laid up for them secretly, as a recompense for that they were doing.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: What? Is he who has been a believer like unto him who has been ungodly? They are not equal.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: As for those who believe, and do deeds of righteousness, there await them the Gardens of the Refuge, in hospitality for that they were doing.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: But as for the ungodly, their refuge shall be the Fire; as often as they desire to come forth from it, they shall be restored into it, and it shall be said to them, ’Taste the chastisement of the Fire, which you cried lies to.’

Name: The Prostration
Verse: And We shall surely let them taste the nearer chastisement, before the greater; haply so they will return.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: And who does greater evil than he who is reminded of the signs of his Lord, then turns away from them? We shall take vengeance upon the sinners.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: Indeed, We gave Moses the Book; so he not in doubt concerning the encounter with him; and We appointed it for a guidance to the Children of Israel.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: And We appointed from among them leaders guiding by Our command, when they endured patiently, and had sure faith in Our signs.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: Surely thy Lord will distinguish between them on the Resurrection Day, touching that whereon they were at variance.

Name: The Prostration
Verse: Is it not a guidance to them, how many generations We destroyed before them in whose dwelling-places they walk? Surely in that are signs; what, will they not hear?

Name: The Prostration
Verse: Have they not seen how We drive the water to the dry land and bring forth crops therewith whereof their cattle and themselves eat? What, will they not see?

Name: The Prostration
Verse: They also say, ’When shall be this Victory, if you speak truly?’

Name: The Prostration
Verse: Say: ’On the Day of Victory their faith shall not profit the unbelievers, nor shall they be respited.’

Name: The Prostration
Verse: So turn thou away from them, and wait; they too are waiting.

Name: The Clans
Verse: O Prophet, fear God, and obey not the unbelievers and the hypocrites. God is All-knowing, All-wise.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And follow what is revealed to thee from thy Lord; surely God is aware of the things you do.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And put thy trust in God; God suffices as a guardian.

Name: The Clans
Verse: God has not assigned to any man two hearts within his breast; nor has He made your wives, when you divorce, saying, ’Be as my mother’s back,’ truly your mothers, neither has He made your adopted sons your sons in fact. That is your own saying, the words of your mouths; but God speaks the truth, and guides on the way.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Call them after their true fathers; that is more equitable in the sight of God. If you know not who their fathers were, then they are your brothers in religion, and your clients. There is no fault in you if you make mistakes, but only in what your hearts premeditate. God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

Name: The Clans
Verse: The Prophet is nearer to the believers than their selves; his wives are their mothers. Those who are bound by blood are nearer to one another in the Book of God than the believers and the emigrants; nevertheless you should act towards your friends honourably; that stands inscribed in the Book.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And when We took compact from the Prophets, and from thee, and from Noah, and Abraham, Moses, and Jesus, Mary’s son; We took from them a solemn compact,

Name: The Clans
Verse: that He might question the truthful concerning their truthfulness; and He has prepared for the unbelievers a painful chastisement.

Name: The Clans
Verse: O believers, remember God’s blessing upon you when hosts came against you, and We loosed against them a wind, and hosts you saw not; and God sees the things you do.

Name: The Clans
Verse: When they came against you from above you and from below you, and when your eyes swerved and your hearts reached your throats, while you thought thoughts about God;

Name: The Clans
Verse: there it was that the believers were tried, and shaken most mightily.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And when tile hypocrites, and those in whose hearts is sickness, said, ’God and His Messenger promised us only delusion.’

Name: The Clans
Verse: And when a party of them said, ’O people of Yathrib, there is no abiding here for you, therefore return!’ And a part of them Were asking leave of the Prophet, saying, ’Our houses are exposed’; yet they were not exposed; they desired only to flee.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And if entrance had been forced against them from those quarters, and then they had been asked to apostatise, they would have done so, and but tarried about it briefly.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Yet they had made covenant with God before that, that they would not turn their backs; and covenants with God shall be questioned of

Name: The Clans
Verse: Say: ’Flight will not profit you, if you flee from death or slaying; you will be given enjoyment of days then but little.’

Name: The Clans
Verse: Say: ’Who is he that shall defend you from God, if lie desires evil for you, or desires mercy for you?’ They shall find for themselves, apart from God, neither protector nor helper.

Name: The Clans
Verse: God would surely know those of you who hinder, and those who say to their brothers, ’Come to us,’ and come to battle but little,

Name: The Clans
Verse: being niggardly towards you. When fear comes upon them, thou seest them looking at thee, their eyes rolling like one who swoons of death; but when the fear departs, they flay you with sharp tongues, being niggardly to possess the good things. Those have never believed; God has made their works to fail; and that is easy for God.

Name: The Clans
Verse: They think the Confederates have not departed; and if the Confederates come, they will wish that they were desert-dwellers among the Bedoums asking for news of you. If they were among you, they would fight but little.

Name: The Clans
Verse: You have had a good example in God’s Messenger for whosoever hopes for God and the Last Day, and remembers God oft.

Name: The Clans
Verse: When the believers saw the Confederates they said, ’This is what God and His Messenger promised us, and God and His Messenger have spoken truly.’ And it only increased them in faith and surrender.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Among the believers are men who were true to their covenant with God; some of them have fulfilled their vow by death, and some are still awaiting, and they have not changed in the least;

Name: The Clans
Verse: that God may recompense the truthful ones for their truthfulness, and chastise the hypocrites, if He will, or turn again unto them. Surely God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And God sent back those that were unbelievers in their rage, and they attained no good; God spared the believers of fighting. Surely God is All-strong, All-mighty.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And He brought down those of the People of the Book who supported them from their fortresses and cast terror in their hearts; some you slew, some you made captive.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And He bequeathed upon you their lands, their habitations, and their possessions, and a land you never trod. God is powerful over everything.

Name: The Clans
Verse: O Prophet, say to thy wives: ’If you desire the present life and its adornment, come now, I will make you provision, and set you free with kindliness.

Name: The Clans
Verse: But if you desire God and His Messenger and the Last Abode, surely God has prepared for those amongst you such as do good a mighty wage.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Wives of the Prophet, whosoever among you commits a flagrant indecency, for her the chastisement shall be doubled; that is easy for God.

Name: The Clans
Verse: But whosoever of you is obedient to God and His Messenger, and does righteousness, We shall pay her her wage twice over; We have prepared for her a generous provision.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Wives of the Prophet, you are not as other women. If you are godfearing, be not abject in your speech, so that he in whose heart is sickness may be lustful; but speak honourable words.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Remain in your houses; and display not your finery, as did the pagans of old. And perform the prayer, and pay the alms, and obey God and His Messenger. People of the House, God only desires to put away from you abomination and to cleanse you.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And remember that which is recited in your houses of the signs of God and the Wisdom; God is All-subtle, All-aware.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Men and women who have surrendered, believing men and believing women, obedient men and obedient women, truthful men and truthful women, enduring men and enduring women, humble men and humble women, men and women who give in charity, men who fast and women who fast, men and women who guard their private parts, men and women who remember God oft -- for them God has prepared forgiveness and a mighty wage.

Name: The Clans
Verse: It is not for any believer, man or woman, when God and His Messenger have decreed a matter, to have the choice in the affair. Whosoever disobeys God and His Messenger has gone astray into manifest error.

Name: The Clans
Verse: When thou saidst to him whom God had blessed and thou hadst favoured, ’Keep thy wife to thyself, and fear God,’ and thou wast concealing within thyself what God should reveal, fearing other men; and God has better right for thee to fear Him. So when Zaid had accomplished what he would of her, then We gave her in marriage to thee, so that there should not be any fault in the believers, touching the wives of their adopted sons, when they have accomplished what they would of them; and God’s commandment must be performed.

Name: The Clans
Verse: There is no fault in the Prophet, touching what God has ordained for him -- God’s wont with those who passed away before; and God’s commandment is doom decreed;

Name: The Clans
Verse: who were delivering the Messages of God, and were fearing Him, and fearing not any one except Him; and God suffices as a reckoner.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Muhammad is not the father of any one of your men, but the Messenger of God, and the Seal of the Prophets; God has knowledge of everything.

Name: The Clans
Verse: O believers, remember God oft,

Name: The Clans
Verse: and give Him glory at the dawn and in the evening.

Name: The Clans
Verse: It is He who blesses you, and His angels, to bring you forth from the shadows into the light. He is All-compassionate to the believers.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Their greeting, on the day when they shall meet Him, will be ’Peace!’ And He has prepared for them a generous wage.

Name: The Clans
Verse: O Prophet, We have sent thee as a witness, and good tidings to bear and warning,

Name: The Clans
Verse: calling unto God by His leave, and as a light-giving lamp.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Give good tidings to the believers that there awaits them with God great bounty.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And obey not the unbelievers and the hypocrites; heed not their hurt, but put thy trust in God; God suffices as a guardian.

Name: The Clans
Verse: O believers, when you marry believing women and then divorce them before you touch them, you have no period to reckon against them; so make provision for them, and set them free with kindliness.

Name: The Clans
Verse: O Prophet, We have made lawful for thee thy wives whom thou hast given their wages and what thy right hand owns, spoils of war that God has given thee, and the daughters of thy uncles paternal and aunts paternal, thy uncles maternal and aunts maternal, who have emigrated with thee, and any woman believer, if she give herself to the Prophet and if the Prophet desire to take her in marriage, for thee exclusively, apart from the believers -- We know what We have imposed upon them touching their wives and what their right hands own -- that there may be no fault in thee; God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Thou mayest put off whom thou wilt of them, and whom thou wilt thou mayest take to thee; and if thou seekest any thou hast set aside there is no fault in thee. So it is likelier they will be comforted, and not sorrow, and every one of them will be well-pleased with what thou givest her. God knows what is in your hearts; God is All-knowing, All-clement.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Thereafter women are not lawful to thee, neither for thee to take other wives in exchange for them, though their beauty please thee, except what thy right hand owns; God is watchful over everything.

Name: The Clans
Verse: O believers, enter not the houses of the Prophet, except leave is given you for a meal, without watching for its hour. But when you are invited, then enter; and when you have had the meal, disperse, neither lingering for idle talk; that is hurtful to the Prophet, and he is ashamed before you; but God is not ashamed before the truth. And when you ask his wives for any object, ask them from behind a curtain; that is cleaner for your hearts and theirs. It is not for you to hurt God’s Messenger, neither to marry his wives after him, ever; surely that would be, in God’s sight, a monstrous thing.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Whether you reveal anything, or whether you conceal it, surely God has knowledge of everything.

Name: The Clans
Verse: There is no fault in the Prophet’s wives touching their fathers, their sons, their brothers, their brothers’ sons, their sisters’ sons, their women, and what their right hands own. And fear you God; surely God is witness of everything.

Name: The Clans
Verse: God and His angels bless the Prophet. O believers, do you also bless him, and pray him peace.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Those who hurt God and His Messenger -- them God has cursed in the present world and the world to come, and has prepared for them a humbling chastisement.

Name: The Clans
Verse: And those who hurt believing men and believing women, without that they have earned it, have laid upon themselves calumny and manifest sin.

Name: The Clans
Verse: O Prophet, say to thy wives and daughters and the believing women, that they draw their veils close to them; so it is likelier they will be known, and not hurt. God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Now; if the hypocrites do not give over, and those in whose hearts there is sickness and they that make commotion in the city, We shall assuredly urge thee against them and then they will be thy neighbours there only a little;

Name: The Clans
Verse: cursed they shalt be, and wheresoever they are come upon they shall be seized and slaughtered all --

Name: The Clans
Verse: God’s wont with those who passed away before; and thou shall find no changing the wont of God.

Name: The Clans
Verse: The people will question thee concerning the Hour. Say: ’The knowledge of it is only with God; what shall make thee know? Haply the Hour is nigh.’

Name: The Clans
Verse: God has cursed the unbelievers, and prepared for them a Blaze,

Name: The Clans
Verse: therein to dwell for ever; they shall find neither protector nor helper.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Upon the day when their faces are turned about in the Fire they shall say, ’Ah, would we had obeyed God and the Messenger!

Name: The Clans
Verse: They shall say, ’Our Lord, we obeyed our chiefs and great ones, and they led us astray from the way.

Name: The Clans
Verse: Our Lord, give them chastisement twofold, and curse them with a mighty curse!’

Name: The Clans
Verse: O believers, be not as those who hurt Moses, but God declared him quit of what they said, and he was high honoured with God.

Name: The Clans
Verse: O believers, fear God, and speak words hitting the mark,

Name: The Clans
Verse: and He will set right your deeds for you and will forgive you your sins. Whosoever obeys God and His Messenger has won a mighty triumph.

Name: The Clans
Verse: We offered the trust to the heavens and the earth and the mountains, but they refused to carry it and were afraid of it; and man carried it. Surely he is sinful, very foolish.

Name: The Clans
Verse: That God may chastise the hypocrites, men and women alike, and the idolaters, men and women alike; and that God may turn again unto the believers, men and women alike. God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

Name: Saba
Verse: Praise belongs to God to whom belongs whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is in the earth. To Him belongs praise also in the Hereafter; He is the All-wise, the All-aware.

Name: Saba
Verse: He knows what penetrates into the earth, and what comes forth from it, what comes down from heaven, and what goes up to it; He is the All-compassionate, the All-forgiving.

Name: Saba
Verse: The unbelievers say, ’The Hour will never come to us.’ Say: ’Yes indeed, by my Lord, it shall come to you, by Him who knows the Unseen; not so much as the weight of an ant in heaven and earth escapes from Him, neither is aught smaller than that, or greater, but it is in a Manifest Book;

Name: Saba
Verse: that He may recompense those who believe, and do righteous deeds; theirs shall be forgiveness and generous provision.

Name: Saba
Verse: ’And those who strive against Our signs to void them -- theirs shall be a chastisement of painful wrath.’

Name: Saba
Verse: Those who have been given the knowledge see that what has been sent down to thee from thy Lord is the truth, and guides to the path of the All-mighty, the All-laudable.

Name: Saba
Verse: The unbelievers say, ’Shall we point you to a man who will tell you, when you have been utterly torn to pieces, then you shall be in a new creation?’

Name: Saba
Verse: What, has he forged against God a lie, or is he possessed? Not so; but those who believe not in the Hereafter are in chastisement and far error.

Name: Saba
Verse: Have they not regarded what lies before them and what lies behind them of heaven and earth? Did We will, We would make the earth to swallow them, or We would drop down on them lumps from heaven. Surely in that is a sign to every penitent servant.

Name: Saba
Verse: And We gave David bounty from Us: ’O you mountains, echo God’s praises with him, and you birds!’ And We softened for him iron:

Name: Saba
Verse: ’Fashion wide coats of mail, and measure well the links. ’ -- And do ye righteousness, for surely I see the things you do.

Name: Saba
Verse: And to Solomon the wind; its morning course was a month’s journey, and its evening course was a month’s journey. And We made the Fount of Molten Brass to flow for him. And of the jinn, some worked before him by the leave of his Lord; and such of them as swerved away from Our commandment, We would let them taste the chastisement of the Blaze;

Name: Saba
Verse: fashioning for him whatsoever he would -- places of worship, statues, porringers like water-troughs, and anchored cooking-pots. ’Labour, O House of David, in thankfulness; for few indeed are those that are thankful among My servants.’

Name: Saba
Verse: And when We decreed that he should die, naught indicated to them that he was dead but the Beast of the Earth devouring his staff; and when he fell down, the jinn saw clearly that, had they only known the Unseen, they would not have continued in the humbling chastisement.

Name: Saba
Verse: For Sheba also there was a sign in their dwelling-place -- two gardens, one on the right and one on the left: ’Eat of your Lord’s provision, and give thanks to Him; a good land, and a Lord All-forgiving.’

Name: Saba
Verse: But they turned away; so We loosed on them the Flood of Arim, and We gave them, in exchange for their two gardens, two gardens bearing bitter produce and tamarisk-bushes, and here and there a few lote-trees.

Name: Saba
Verse: Thus We recompensed them for their unbelief; and do ’We ever recompense any hut the unbeliever?

Name: Saba
Verse: And We set, between them and the cities that We have blessed, cities apparent and well We measured the journey between them: ’Journey among them by night and day in security!’

Name: Saba
Verse: But they said, ’Our Lord, prolong the stages of our travel’; and they wronged themselves, so We made them as but tales, and We tore them utterly to pieces. Surely in that are signs for every man enduring, thankful.

Name: Saba
Verse: Iblis proved true his opinion of them, and they followed him, except a party of the believers.

Name: Saba
Verse: Yet he had no authority over them, but that We might know him who believed in the Hereafter from him who was in doubt thereof Thy Lord is Guardian over everything.

Name: Saba
Verse: Say: ’Call on those you have asserted apart from God; they possess not so much as the weight of an ant in the heavens nor in the earth; they have no partnership in either of them, nor has He in them any supporter.’

Name: Saba
Verse: Intercession will not avail with Him save for him to whom He gives leave; till, when terror is lifted from their hearts, they will say, "What said your Lord?’ They will say, ’The truth; and He is the All-high; the All-great.’

Name: Saba
Verse: Say: ’Who provides for you out of the heavens and the earth?’ Say: ’God.’ Surely, either we or you are upon right guidance, or in manifest error.

Name: Saba
Verse: Say: ’You will not be questioned concerning our sins, neither shall we be questioned as to what you do.’

Name: Saba
Verse: Say: ’Our Lord will bring us together, then make deliverance between us by the truth. He is the Deliverer, the All-knowing.’

Name: Saba
Verse: Say: ’Show me those you have joined to Him as associates. No indeed; rather He is God, the All-mighty, the All-wise.’

Name: Saba
Verse: We have sent thee not, except to mankind entire, good tidings to bear, and warning; but most men do not know it.

Name: Saba
Verse: They say, ’When shall this promise come to pass, if you speak the truth?’

Name: Saba
Verse: Say: ’You have the tryst of a day that you shall not put back by a single hour nor put it forward.’

Name: Saba
Verse: The unbelievers say, ’We will not believe in this Koran, nor in that before it.’ Ah, if thou couldst see when the evildoers are stationed before their Lord, bandying argument the one against the other! Those that were abased will say to those that waxed proud, ’Had it not been for you, we would have been believers.

Name: Saba
Verse: Those that waxed proud will say to those that were abased, ’What, did we bar you from the guidance after it came to you? Nay, rather you were sinners.’

Name: Saba
Verse: And those that were abased will say to those that waxed proud, ’Nay, but devising night and day, when you were ordering us to disbelieve in God, and to set up compeers to Him.’ They will be secretly remorseful when they see the chastisement and We put fetters on the necks of the unbelievers; shall they be recompensed except for what they were doing?

Name: Saba
Verse: We sent no warner into any city except its men who lived at ease said, ’We disbelieve in the Message you have been sent with.’

Name: Saba
Verse: They also said, ’We are more abundant in wealth and children, and we shall not be chastised.’

Name: Saba
Verse: Say: ’My Lord outspreads and straitens His provision to whomsoever He will, but most men do not know it.’

Name: Saba
Verse: It is not your wealth nor your children that shall bring you nigh in nearness to Us, except for him who believes, and does righteousness; those -- there awaits them the double recompense for that they did, and they shall be in the lofty chambers in security.

Name: Saba
Verse: And those who strive against Our signs to void them -- those shall be arraigned into the chastisement.

Name: Saba
Verse: Say: ’My Lord outspreads and straitens His provision to whomsoever He will of His servants; and whatever thing you shall expend, He will replace it. He is the best of providers.’

Name: Saba
Verse: Upon the day when He shall muster them all together, then He shall say to the angels, ’Was it you these were serving?

Name: Saba
Verse: They shall say, ’Glory be to Thee’! Thou art our Protector, apart from them; nay rather, they were serving the jinn; most of them believed in them.’

Name: Saba
Verse: ’Therefore today none of you shall have power to profit or hurt another.’ And We shall say to the evildoers, ’Taste the chastisement of the Fire, which you cried lies to!’

Name: Saba
Verse: And when Our signs are recited to them, clear signs, they say, ’This is naught but a man who desires to bar you from that your fathers served’; and they say, ’This is nothing but a forged calumny.’ And the unbelievers say to the truth, when it has come to them, ’This is nothing but manifest sorcery.

Name: Saba
Verse: We have not given them any Books to study, nor have We sent them before thee any warner.

Name: Saba
Verse: Those that were before them also cried lies, yet they reached not a tenth of what We gave them; they cried lies to My Messengers, and how was My horror!

Name: Saba
Verse: Say: ’I give you but one admonition, that you stand unto God, two by two and one by one, and then reflect: no madness is in your comrade. He is naught but a warner unto you, before a terrible chastisement.’

Name: Saba
Verse: Say: ’I have asked no wage of you; that shall be yours. My wage falls only upon God; and He is witness over everything.’

Name: Saba
Verse: Say: ’My Lord hurls the truth -- the Knower of the Unseen.’

Name: Saba
Verse: Say. ’Truth has come; falsehood originates not, nor brings again.’

Name: Saba
Verse: Say: ’If I go astray, I go astray only to my own loss; if I am guided, it is by what my Lord reveals to me. He is All-hearing, Ever-nigh.’

Name: Saba
Verse: Ah, if thou couldst see when they are terrified, and there is no escape, and they are seized from a place near at hand,

Name: Saba
Verse: and they say, ’We believe in it’; but how can they reach from a place far away,

Name: Saba
Verse: seeing they disbelieved in it before, guessing at the Unseen from a place far away?

Name: Saba
Verse: And a barrier is set between them and that they desire, as was done with the likes of them aforetime; they were in doubt disquieting.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Praise belongs to God, Originator of the heavens and earth, who appointed the angels to be messengers having wings two, three and four, increasing creation as He wills. Surely God is powerful over everything.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Whatsoever mercy God opens to men, none can withhold and whatsoever He withholds, none can loose after Him. He is the All-mighty, the All-wise.

Name: The Angels
Verse: O men, remember God’s blessing upon you; is there any creator, apart from God, who provides for you out of heaven and earth? There is no god but He: how then are you perverted?

Name: The Angels
Verse: If they cry lies to thee, Messengers before thee were cried lies to; and unto God all matters are returned.

Name: The Angels
Verse: O men, God’s promise is true; so let not the present life delude you, and let not the Deluder delude you concerning God.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Surely Satan is an enemy to you; so take him for an enemy. He calls his party only that they may be among the inhabitants of the Blaze.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Those who disbelieve -- there awaits them a terrible chastisement; but those who believe, and do deeds of righteousness -- theirs shall be forgiveness and a great wage.

Name: The Angels
Verse: And what of him, the evil of whose deeds has been decked out fair to him, so that he thinks it is good? God leads astray whomsoever He will, and whomsoever He will He guides; so let not thy soul be wasted in regrets for them; God has knowledge of the things they work.

Name: The Angels
Verse: God is He that looses the winds, that stir up cloud, then We drive it to a dead land and therewith revive the earth, after it is dead. Even so is the Uprising.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Whosoever desires glory, the glory altogether belongs to God. To Him good words go up, and the righteous deed -- He uplifts it; but those who devise evil deeds -- theirs shall be a terrible chastisement, and their devising shall come to naught.

Name: The Angels
Verse: God created you of dust then of a sperm-drop, then He made you pairs. No female bears or brings forth, save with His knowledge; and none is given long life who is given long life neither is any diminished in his life, but it is in a Book. Surely that is easy for God.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Not equal are the two seas; this is sweet, grateful to taste, delicious to drink, and that is salt, bitter to the tongue. Yet of both you eat fresh flesh, and bring forth out of it ornaments for you to wear; and thou mayest see the ships cleaving through it, that you may seek of His bounty, and so haply you will be thankful.

Name: The Angels
Verse: He makes the night to enter into the day and makes the day to enter into the night, and He has subjected the sun and the moon, each of them running to a stated term. That is God, your Lord; to Him belongs the Kingdom; and those you call upon, apart from Him, possess not so much as the skin of a date-stone.

Name: The Angels
Verse: If you call upon them, they will not hear your prayer, and if they heard, they would not answer you; and on the Day of Resurrection they will disown your partnership. None can tell thee like One who is aware.

Name: The Angels
Verse: O men, you are the ones that have need of God; He is the All-sufficient, the All-laudable.

Name: The Angels
Verse: If He will, He can put you away and bring a new creation;

Name: The Angels
Verse: that is surely no great matter for God.

Name: The Angels
Verse: No soul laden bears the load of another; and if one heavy-burdened calls for its load to be carried, not a thing of it will be carried, though he be a near kinsman. Thou warnest only those who fear their Lord in the Unseen and perform the prayer; and whosoever purifies himself, purifies himself only for his own soul’s good. To God is the homecoming.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Not equal are the blind and the seeing man,

Name: The Angels
Verse: the shadows and the light,

Name: The Angels
Verse: the shade and the torrid heat;

Name: The Angels
Verse: not equal are the living and the dead. God makes to hear whomsoever He will; thou canst not make those in their tombs to hear -

Name: The Angels
Verse: thou art naught but a warner.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Surely We have sent thee with the truth good tidings to bear, and warning; not a nation there is, but there has passed away in it a warner.

Name: The Angels
Verse: If they cry thee lies, those before them also cried lies; their Messengers came to them with the clear signs, the Psalms, the Illuminating Book;

Name: The Angels
Verse: then I seized the unbelievers, and how was My horror!

Name: The Angels
Verse: Hast thou not seen how that God sends down out of heaven water, and therewith We bring forth fruits of diverse hues? And in the mountains are streaks white and red, of diverse hues, and pitchy black;

Name: The Angels
Verse: men too, and beasts and cattle -- diverse are their hues. Even so only those of His servants fear God who have knowledge; surely God is All-mighty, All-forgiving.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Surely those who recite the Book of God and perform the prayer, and expend of that We have provided them, secretly and in public, look for a commerce that comes not to naught,

Name: The Angels
Verse: that He may pay them in full their wages and enrich them of His bounty; surely He is All-forgiving, All-thankful.

Name: The Angels
Verse: And that We have revealed to thee of the Book is the truth, confirming what is before it; God is aware of and sees His servants.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Then We bequeathed the Book on those of Our servants We chose; but of them some wrong themselves, some of them are lukewarm, and some are outstrippers in good works by the leave of God; that is the great bounty.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Gardens of Eden they shall enter; therein they shall be adorned with bracelets of gold and with pearls, and their apparel there shall be of silk.

Name: The Angels
Verse: And they shall say, ’Praise belongs to God who has put away all sorrow from us. Surely our Lord is All-forgiving, All-thankful,

Name: The Angels
Verse: who of His bounty has made us to dwell in the abode of everlasting life wherein no weariness assails us neither fatigue.’

Name: The Angels
Verse: As for the unbelievers, theirs shall be the fire of Gehenna; they shall neither be done with and die, nor shall its chastisement be lightened for them. Even so We recompense every ungrateful one.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Therein they shall shout, ’Our Lord, bring us forth, and we will do righteousness, other than what we have done.’ ’What, did We not give you long life, enough to remember in for him who would remember? To you the warner came; taste you now! The evildoers shall have no helper.’

Name: The Angels
Verse: God knows the Unseen in the heavens and the earth; He knows the thoughts within the breasts.

Name: The Angels
Verse: It is He who appointed you viceroys in the earth. So whosoever disbelieves, his unbelief shall be charged against him; their unbelief increases the disbelievers only in hate in God’s sight; their unbelief increases the disbelievers only in loss.

Name: The Angels
Verse: Say: ’Have you considered your associates on whom you call, apart from God? Show me what they have created in the earth; or have they a partnership in the heavens?’ Or have We given them a Book, so that they are upon a clear sign from it? Nay, but the evildoers promise one another naught but delusion.

Name: The Angels
Verse: God holds the heavens and the earth, lest they remove; did they remove, none would hold them after Him. Surely He is All-clement, All-forgiving.

Name: The Angels
Verse: They have sworn by God the most earnest oaths that if a warner came to them, they would be more rightly guided than any one of the nations; but when a warner came to them, it increased them only in aversion,

Name: The Angels
Verse: waxing proud in the land, and devising evil; but evil devising encompasses only those who do it; So do they expect anything but the wont of the ancients? And thou shalt never find any changing the Wont of God, and thou shalt never find any altering the wont of God.

Name: The Angels
Verse: What, have they not journeyed in the land and beheld how was the end of those before them? They were stronger than themselves in might; but God -- there is naught in the heavens or the earth that can frustrate Him. Surely He is All-knowing, All-powerful.

Name: The Angels
Verse: If God should take men to task for what they have earned He would not leave upon the face of the earth one creature that crawls; but He is deferring them to a stated term. But when their term is come -- surely God sees His servants.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Ya Sin

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: By the Wise Koran,

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: thou art truly among the Envoys

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: on a straight path;

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: the sending down of the All-mighty, the All-wise,

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: that thou mayest warn a people whose fathers were never warned, so they are heedless.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: The Word has been realised against most of them, yet they do not believe.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Surely We have put on their necks fetters up to the chin, so their heads are raised;

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: and We have put before them a barrier and behind them a barrier; and We have covered them, so they do not see.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Alike it is to them whether thou hast warned them or thou hast not warned them, they do not believe.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Thou only warnest him who follows the Remembrance and who fears the All-merciful in the Unseen; so give him the good tidings of forgiveness and a generous wage.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Surely it is We who bring the dead to life and write down what they have forwarded and what they have left behind; everything We have numbered in a clear register.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Strike for them a similitude -- the inhabitants of the city, when the Envoys came to it;

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: when We sent unto them two men, but they cried them lies, so We sent a third as reinforcement. They said, ’We are assuredly Envoys unto you.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: They said, ’You are naught but mortals like us; the All-merciful has not sent down anything. You are speaking only lies.’

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: They said, ’Our Lord knows we are Envoys unto you;

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: and it is only for us to deliver the Manifest Message.’

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: They said, ’We augur ill of you. If you give not over, we will stone you and there shall visit you from us a painful chastisement.’

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: They said, ’Your augury is with you; if you are reminded? But you are a prodigal people.’

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Then came a man from the furthest part of the city, running; he said, ’My people, follow the Envoys!

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Follow such as ask no wage of you, that are right-guided.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And why should I not serve Him who originated me, and unto whom you shall be returned?

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: What, shall I take, apart from Him, gods whose intercession, if the All-merciful desires affliction for me, shall not avail me anything, and who will never deliver me?

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Surely in that case I should be in manifest error.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Behold, I believe in your Lord; therefore hear me!’

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: It was said, ’Enter Paradise!’ He said, ’Ah, would that my people had knowledge

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: that my Lord has forgiven me and that He has placed me among the honoured.’

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And We sent not down upon his people, after him, any host out of heaven; neither would We send any down.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: It was only one Cry and lo, they were silent and still.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Ah, woe for those servants! Never comes unto them a Messenger, but they mock at him.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: What, have they not seen how many generations We have destroyed before them, and that it is not unto them that they return?

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: They shall every one of them be arraigned before Us.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And a sign for them is the dead land, that We quickened and brought forth from it grain, whereof they eat;

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: and We made therein gardens of palms and vines, and therein We caused fountains to gush forth,

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: that they might eat of its fruits and their hands’ labour. What, will they not be thankful?

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Glory be to Him, who created all the pairs of what the earth produces, and of themselves, and of what they know not.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And a sign for them is the night; We strip it of the day and lo, they are in darkness.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And the sun -- it runs to a fixed resting-place; that is the ordaining of the All-mighty, the All-knowing.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And the moon -- We have determined it by stations, till it returns like an aged palm-bough.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: It behoves not the sun to overtake the moon, neither does the night outstrip the day, each swimming in a sky.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And a sign for them is that We carried their seed in the laden ship,

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: and We have created for them the like of it whereon they ride;

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: and if We will, We drown them, then none have they to cry to, neither are they delivered,

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: save as a mercy from Us, and enjoyment for a while.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And when it is said to them, ’Fear what is before you and what is behind you; haply you will find mercy’ --

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: yet never any sign of the signs of their Lord comes to them, but they are turning away from it.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And when it is said to them, ’Expend of that God has provided you,’ the unbelievers say to the believers, ’What, shall we feed such a one whom, if God willed, He would feed? You are only in manifest error!’

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: They also say, ’When shall this promise come to pass, if you speak truly?’

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: They are awaiting only for one Cry to seize them while they are yet disputing,

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: then they will not be able to make any testament, nor will they return to their people.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And the Trumpet shall be blown; then behold, they are sliding down from their tombs unto their Lord.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: They say, ’Alas for us! Who roused us out of our sleeping place? This is what the All-merciful promised, and the Envoys spoke truly.’

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: ’It was only one Cry; then behold, they are all arraigned before Us.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: So today no soul shall be wronged anything, and you shall not be recompensed, except according to what you have been doing.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: See, the inhabitants of Paradise today are busy in their rejoicing,

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: they and their spouses, reclining upon couches in the shade;

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: therein they have fruits, and they have all that they call for.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: ’Peace!’ -- such is the greeting, from a Lord All-compassionate.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: ’Now keep yourselves apart, you sinners, upon this day!

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Made I not covenant with you, Children of Adam, that you should not serve Satan -- surely he is a manifest foe to you --

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: and that you should serve Me? This is a straight path.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: He led astray many a throng of you; did you not understand?

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: This is Gehenna, then, the same that you were promised;

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: roast well in it today, for that you were unbelievers!’

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Today We set a seal on their mouths, and their hands speak to Us, and their feet bear witness as to what they have been earning.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Did We will, We would have obliterated their eyes, then they would race to the path, but how would they see?

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Did We will, We would have changed them where they were, then they could not go on, nor could they return.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And to whomsoever We give long life, We bend him over in His constitution; what, do they not understand?

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: We have not taught him poetry; it is not seemly for him. It is only a Remembrance and a Clear Koran,

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: that he may warn whosoever is living, and that the Word may be realized against the unbelievers.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Have they not seen how that We have created for them of that Our hands wrought cattle that they own?

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: We have subdued them to them, and some of them they ride, and some they eat;

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: other uses also they have in them, and beverages. What, will they not be thankful?

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Yet they have taken, apart from God, gods; haply they might be helped.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: They cannot help them, though they be hosts made ready for them.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: So do not let their saying grieve thee; assuredly We know what they keep secret and what they publish.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Has not man regarded how that We created him of a sperm-drop? Then lo, he is a manifest adversary.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: And he has struck for Us a similitude and forgotten his creation; he says, ’Who shall quicken the bones when they are decayed?’

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Say: ’He shall quicken them, who originated them the first time; He knows all creation,

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: who has made for you out of the green tree fire and lo, from it you kindle.’

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: Is not He, who created the heavens and earth, able to create the like of them? Yes indeed; He is the All-creator, the All-knowing.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: His command, when He desires a thing, is to say to it ’Be,’ and it is.

Name: Yâ Sîn
Verse: So glory be to Him, in whose hand is the dominion of everything, and unto whom you shall be returned.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: By the rangers ranging

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and the scarers scaring

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and the reciters of a Remembrance,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: surely your God is One,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Lord of the heavens and the earth, and of what between them is Lord of the Easts.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: We have adorned the lower heaven with the adornment of the stars

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and to preserve against every rebel Satan;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: they listen not to the High Council, for they are pelted from every side,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: rejected, and theirs is an everlasting chastisement,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: except such as snatches a fragment, and he is pursued by a piercing flame.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: So ask them for a pronouncement -- Are they stronger in constitution, or those We created? We created them of clinging clay.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Nay, thou marvellest; and they scoff

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and, when reminded, do not remember

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and, when they see a sign, would scoff;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and they say, ’This is nothing but manifest sorcery.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: What, when we are dead and become dust and bones, shall we indeed be raised up?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: What, and our fathers, the ancients?’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Say: ’Yes, and in all lowliness.’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: For it is only a single scaring, then behold, they are watching

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and they say, ’Woe, alas for us! This is the Day of Doom.’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: ’This is the Day of Decision, even that you cried lies to.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Muster those who did evil, their wives, and that they were serving,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: apart from God, and guide them unto the path of Hell!

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And halt them, to be questioned:

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: "Why help you not one another?"

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: No indeed; but today they resign themselves in submission

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and advance one upon another, asking each other questions.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: These say, ’Why, you of old would come to us from the right hand.’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Those say, ’No; on the contrary, you were not believers;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: we had no authority over you; no, you were an insolent people.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: So our Lord’s Word is realised against us; we are tasting it.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Therefore we perverted you, and we ourselves were perverts.’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: So all of them on that day are sharers in the chastisement.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Even so We do with the sinners;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: for when it was said to them, ’There is no god but God,’ they were ever waxing proud,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: saying, ’What, shall we forsake our gods for a poet possessed?’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: ’No indeed; but he brought the truth, and confirmed the Envoys.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Now certainly you shall be tasting the painful chastisement,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and not be recompensed, except according to what you were doing.’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Except for God’s sincere servants;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: for them awaits a known provision,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: fruits -- and they high-honoured

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: in the Gardens of Bliss

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: upon couches, set face to face,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: cup from a spring being passed round to them,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: white, a delight to the drinkers,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: wherein no sickness is, neither intoxication;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and with them wide-eyed maidens restraining their glances

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: as if they were hidden pearls.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: They advance one upon another, asking each other questions.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: One of them says, ’I had a comrade

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: who would say, "Are you a confirmer?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: What, when we are dead and become dust and bones, shall we indeed be requited?"

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: He says, ’Are you looking down?’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Then he looks, and sees him in the midst of Hell.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: He says, ’By God, wellnigh thou didst destroy me;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: But for my Lord’s blessing, I were one of the arraigned.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: What, do we then not die

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: except for our first death, and are we not chastised?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: This is indeed the mighty triumph,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: for the like of this let the workers work.’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Is that better as a hospitality, or the Tree of Ez-Zakkoum?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: We have appointed it as a trial for the evildoers.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: It is a tree that comes forth in the root of Hell;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: its spathes are as the heads of Satans,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and they eat of it, and of it fill their bellies,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: then on top of it they have a brew of boiling water,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: then their return is unto Hell.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: They found their fathers erring,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and they run in their footsteps.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Before them erred most of the ancients,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and We sent among them warners;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and behold, how was the end of them that were warned,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: except for God’s sincere servants.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Noah called to Us; and how excellent were the Answerers!

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And We delivered him and his people from the great distress,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and We made his seed the survivors,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and left for him among the later folk

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: ’Peace be upon Noah among all beings!’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Even so We recompense the good-doers;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: he was among Our believing servants.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Then afterwards We drowned the rest.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Of his party was also Abraham;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: when he came unto his Lord with a pure heart,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: when he said to his father and his folk, ’What do you serve?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Is it a calumny, gods apart from God, that you desire?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: What think you then of the Lord of all Being?’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And he cast a glance at the stars,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and he said, ’Surely I am sick.’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: But they went away from him, turning their backs.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Then he turned to their gods, and said, ’What do you eat?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: What ails you, that you speak not?’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And he turned upon them smiting them with his right hand.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Then came the others to him hastening.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: He said, ’Do you serve what you hew,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and God created you and what you make?’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: They said, ’Build him a building, and cast him into the furnace!’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: They desired to outwit him; so We made them the lower ones.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: He said, ’I am going to my Lord; He will guide me.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: My Lord, give me one of the righteous.’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Then We gave him the good tidings of a prudent boy;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and when he had reached the age of running with him, he said, ’My son, I see in a dream that I shall sacrifice thee; consider, what thinkest thou?’ He said, ’My father, do as thou art bidden; thou shalt find me, God willing, one of the steadfast.’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: When they had surrendered, and he flung him upon his brow,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: We called unto him, ’Abraham,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: thou hast confirmed the vision; even so We recompense the good-doers.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: This is indeed the manifest trial.’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And We ransomed him with a mighty sacrifice,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and left for him among the later folk

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: ’Peace be upon Abraham!’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Even so We recompense the good-doers;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: he was among Our believing servants.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Then We gave him the good tidings of Isaac, a Prophet, one of the righteous.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And We blessed him, and Isaac; and of their seed some are good-doers, and some manifest self-wrongers.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: We also favoured Moses and Aaron,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and We delivered them and their people from the great distress.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And We helped them, so that they were the victors;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and We gave them the Manifesting Book,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and guided them in the straight path,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and left for them among the later folk

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: ’Peace be upon Moses and, Aaron!’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Even so We recompense the good-doers;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: they were among Our believing servants.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Elias too was one of the Envoys;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: when he said to his people, ’Will you not be godfearing?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Do you call on Baal, and abandon the Best of creators?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: God, your Lord, and the Lord of your fathers, the ancients?’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: But they cried him lies; so they will be among the arraigned,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: except for God’s sincere servants;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and We left for him among the later folk

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: ’Peace be upon Elias!’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Even so We recompense the good-doers;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: he was among Our believing servants.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Lot too was one of the Envoys;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: when We delivered him and his people all together,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: save an old woman among those that tarried;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: then We destroyed the others,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and you pass by them in the morning

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and in the night; will you not understand?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Jonah too was one of the Envoys;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: when he ran away to the laden ship

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and cast lots, and was of the rebutted,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: then the whale swallowed him down, and he blameworthy.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Now had he not been of those that glorify God,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: he would have tarried in its belly until the day they shall be raised;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: but We cast him upon the wilderness, and he was sick,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and We caused to grow over him a tree of gourds.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Then We sent him unto a hundred thousand, or more,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and they believed; so We gave them enjoyment for a while.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: So ask them for a pronouncement -- Has thy Lord daughters, and they sons?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Or did We create the angels females, while they were witnesses?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Is it not of their own calumny that they say,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: ’God has begotten?’ They are truly liars.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Has He chosen daughters above sons?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: What ails you then, how you judge?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: What, and will you not remember?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Or have you a clear authority?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Bring your Book, if you speak truly!

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: They have set up a kinship between Him and the jinn; and the jinn know that they shall be arraigned.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Glory be to God above that they describe,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: except for God’s sincere servants.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: But as for you, and that you serve,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: you shall not tempt any against Him

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: except him who shall roast in Hell.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: None of us is there, but has a known station;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: we are the rangers,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: we are they that give glory.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: What though they would say,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: ’If only we had had a Reminder from the ancients,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: then were we God’s sincere servants.’

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: But they disbelieved in it; soon they shall know!

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Already Our Word has preceded to Our servants, the Envoys;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: assuredly they shall be helped,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and Our host -- they are the victors.

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: So turn thou from them for a while,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and see them; soon they shall see!

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: What, do they seek to hasten Our chastisement?

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: When it lights in their courtyard, how evil will be the morning of them that are warned!

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: So turn thou from them for a while,

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and see; soon they shall see!

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: Glory be to thy Lord, the Lord of Glory, above that they describe!

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: And peace be upon the Envoys;

Name: Those Who Set The Ranks
Verse: and praise belongs to God, the Lord of all Being.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Sad. By the Koran, containing the Remembrance --

Name: Sâd
Verse: nay, but the unbelievers glory in their schism.

Name: Sâd
Verse: How many a generation We destroyed before them, and they called, but time was none to escape.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Now they marvel that a warner has come to them from among them; and the unbelievers say, ’This is a lying sorcerer.

Name: Sâd
Verse: What, has he made the gods One God? This is indeed a marvellous thing.’

Name: Sâd
Verse: And the Council of them depart, saying ’Go! Be steadfast to your gods; this is a thing to be desired.

Name: Sâd
Verse: We have not heard of this in the last religion; this is surely an invention.

Name: Sâd
Verse: What, has the Remembrance been sent down on him out of us all?’ Nay, but they are in doubt of My Remembrance; nay, they have not yet tasted My chastisement.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Or have they the treasuries of thy Lord’s mercy, the All-mighty, the All-giving?

Name: Sâd
Verse: Or is theirs the kingdom of the heavens and earth and of what between them is? Why, then let them ascend the cords!

Name: Sâd
Verse: A very host of parties is routed there!

Name: Sâd
Verse: Cried lies before them the people of Noah, and Ad, and Pharaoh, he of the tent-pegs,

Name: Sâd
Verse: and Thamood, and the people of Lot, and the men of the Thicket - those were the parties;

Name: Sâd
Verse: not one, that cried not lies to the Messengers, so My retribution was just.

Name: Sâd
Verse: These are only awaiting for a single Cry, to which there is no delay.

Name: Sâd
Verse: They say, ’Our Lord, hasten to us our share before the Day of Reckoning.’

Name: Sâd
Verse: Bear patiently what they say, and remember Our servant David, the man of might; he was a penitent.

Name: Sâd
Verse: With him We subjected the mountains to give glory at evening and sunrise,

Name: Sâd
Verse: and the birds, duly mustered, every one to him reverting;

Name: Sâd
Verse: We strengthened his kingdom, and gave him wisdom and speech decisive.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Has the tiding of the dispute come to thee? When they scaled the Sanctuary,

Name: Sâd
Verse: when they entered upon David, and he took fright at them; and they said, ’Fear not; two disputants we are -- one of us has injured the other; so judge between us justly, and transgress not, and guide us to the right path.’

Name: Sâd
Verse: ’Behold, this my brother has ninety-nine ewes, and I have one ewe. So he said, "Give her into my charge"; and he overcame me in the argument.’

Name: Sâd
Verse: Said he, ’Assuredly he has wronged thee in asking for thy ewe in addition to his sheep; and indeed many intermixers do injury one against the other, save those who believe, and do deeds of righteousness -- and how few they are!’ And David thought that We had only tried him; therefore he sought forgiveness of his Lord, and he fell down, bowing, and he repented.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Accordingly We forgave him that, and he has a near place in Our presence and a fair resort.

Name: Sâd
Verse: ’David, behold, We have appointed thee a viceroy in the earth; therefore judge between men justly, and follow not caprice, lest it lead thee astray from the way of God. Surely those who go astray from the way of God -- there awaits them a terrible chastisement, for that they have forgotten the Day of Reckoning.’

Name: Sâd
Verse: We have not created the heavens and earth, and what between them is, for vanity; such is the thought of the unbelievers, wherefore woe unto the unbelievers because of the Fire!

Name: Sâd
Verse: Or shall We make those who believe and do righteous deeds as the workers of corruption in the earth, or shall We make the godfearing as the transgressors?

Name: Sâd
Verse: A Book We have sent down to thee, Blessed, that men possessed of minds may ponder its signs and so remember.

Name: Sâd
Verse: And We gave unto David Solomon; how excellent a servant he was! He was a penitent.

Name: Sâd
Verse: When in the evening were presented to him the standing steeds,

Name: Sâd
Verse: he said, ’Lo, I have loved the love of good things better than the remembrance of my Lord, until the sun was bidden behind the veil.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Return them to me!’ And he began to stroke their shanks and necks.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Certainly We tried Solomon, and We cast upon his throne a mere body; then he repented.

Name: Sâd
Verse: He said, ’My Lord, forgive me, and give me a kingdom such as may not befall anyone after me; surely Thou art the All-giver.’

Name: Sâd
Verse: So We subjected to him the wind, that ran at his commandment, softly, wherever he might light on,

Name: Sâd
Verse: and the Satans, every builder and diver

Name: Sâd
Verse: and others also, coupled in fetters:

Name: Sâd
Verse: ’This is Our gift; bestow or withhold without reckoning.’

Name: Sâd
Verse: And he had a near place in Our presence and a fair resort.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Remember also Our servant Job; when he called to his Lord, ’Behold, Satan has visited me with weariness and chastisement.’

Name: Sâd
Verse: ’Stamp thy foot! This is a laving-place cool, and a drink.’

Name: Sâd
Verse: And We gave to him his family, and the like of them with them, as a mercy from us, and a reminder unto men possessed of minds;

Name: Sâd
Verse: and, ’Take in thy hand a bundle of rushes, and strike therewith, and do not fail in thy oath.’ Surely We found him a steadfast man. How excellent a servant he was! He was a penitent.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Remember also Our servants Abraham, Isaac and Jacob -- men of might they and of vision.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Assuredly We purified them with a quality most pure, the remembrance of the Abode,

Name: Sâd
Verse: and in Our sight they are of the chosen, the excellent.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Remember also Our servants Ishmael, Elisha, and Dhul Kifl; each is among the excellent.

Name: Sâd
Verse: This is a Remembrance; and for the godfearing is a fair resort,

Name: Sâd
Verse: Gardens of Eden, whereof the gates are open to them,

Name: Sâd
Verse: wherein they recline, and wherein they call for fruits abundant, and sweet potions,

Name: Sâd
Verse: and with them maidens restraining their glances of equal age.

Name: Sâd
Verse: ’This is what you were promised for the Day of Reckoning;

Name: Sâd
Verse: this is Our provision, unto which there is no end.’

Name: Sâd
Verse: All this; but for the insolent awaits an ill resort,

Name: Sâd
Verse: Gehenna, wherein they are roasted - an evil cradling!

Name: Sâd
Verse: All this; so let them taste it - boiling water and pus,

Name: Sâd
Verse: and other torments of the like kind coupled together.

Name: Sâd
Verse: ’This is a troop rushing in with you; there is no Welcome for them; they shall roast in the Fire.’

Name: Sâd
Verse: They say, ’No, it is you have no Welcome; you forwarded it for us; how evil a stablishment!’

Name: Sâd
Verse: They say, ’Our Lord, whoso forwarded this for us, give him a double chastisement in the Fire!’

Name: Sâd
Verse: They say, ’How is it with us, that we do not see men here that we counted among the wicked?

Name: Sâd
Verse: What, did we take them for a laughing-stock? Or have our eyes swerved away from them?’

Name: Sâd
Verse: Surely that is true -- the disputing of the inhabitants of the Fire.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Say: ’I am only a warner. There is not any god but God, the One, the Omnipotent,

Name: Sâd
Verse: Lord of the heavens and earth, and of what between them is, the All-mighty, the All-forgiving.’

Name: Sâd
Verse: Say: ’It is a mighty tiding

Name: Sâd
Verse: from which you are turning away.

Name: Sâd
Verse: I had no knowledge of the High Council when they disputed.

Name: Sâd
Verse: This alone is revealed to me, that I am only a clear warner.’

Name: Sâd
Verse: When thy Lord said to the angels, ’See, I am creating a mortal of a clay.

Name: Sâd
