Verse: When I have shaped him, and breathed My spirit in him, fall you down, bowing before him!’

Name: Sâd
Verse: Then the angels bowed themselves all together,

Name: Sâd
Verse: save Iblis; he waxed proud, and was one of the unbelievers.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Said He, ’Iblis, what prevented thee to bow thyself before that I created with My own hands? Hast thou waxed proud, or art thou of the lofty ones?’

Name: Sâd
Verse: Said he, ’I am better than he; Thou createdst me of tire, and him Thou createdst of clay.’

Name: Sâd
Verse: Said He, ’Then go thou forth hence; thou art accursed.

Name: Sâd
Verse: Upon thee shall rest My curse, till the Day of Doom.’

Name: Sâd
Verse: Said he, ’My Lord, respite me till the day they shall be raised.’

Name: Sâd
Verse: Said He, ’Thou art among the ones that are respited

Name: Sâd
Verse: until the day of the known time.’

Name: Sâd
Verse: Said he, ’Now, by Thy glory, I shall pervert them all together,

Name: Sâd
Verse: excepting those Thy servants among them that are sincere.’

Name: Sâd
Verse: Said He, ’This is the truth, and the truth I say;

Name: Sâd
Verse: I shall assuredly fill Gehenna with thee, and with whosoever of them follows thee, all together.’

Name: Sâd
Verse: Say: ’I ask of you no wage for it, neither am I of those who take things upon themselves.

Name: Sâd
Verse: It is nothing but a reminder unto all beings,

Name: Sâd
Verse: and you shall surely know its tiding after a while.’

Name: The Troops
Verse: The sending down of the Book is from God the All-mighty, the All-wise.

Name: The Troops
Verse: We have sent down to thee the Book with the truth; so worship God, making thy religion His sincerely.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Belongs not sincere religion to God? And those who take protectors, apart from Him -- ’We only serve them that they may bring us nigh in nearness to God’ -- surely God shall judge between them touching that whereon they are at variance. Surely God guides not him who is a liar, unthankful.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Had God desired to take to Him a son, He would have chosen whatever He willed of that He has created. Glory be to Him! He is God, the One, the Omnipotent.

Name: The Troops
Verse: He created the heavens and the earth in truth, wrapping night about the day, and wrapping the day about the night; and He has subjected the sun and the moon, each of them running to a stated term. Is not He the All-mighty, the All-forgiving?

Name: The Troops
Verse: He created you of a single soul, then from it He appointed its mate; and He sent down to you of the cattle eight couples. He creates you in your mothers’ wombs creation after creation in threefold shadows. That then is God, your Lord; to Him belongs the Kingdom; there is no god but He; so how are you turned about?

Name: The Troops
Verse: If you are unthankful, God is independent of you, yet He approves not unthankfulness in His servants; but if you are thankful, He will approve it in you. And no soul laden bears the load of another. Then to your Lord shall you return, and He will tell you what you have been doing. He knows the thoughts within the breasts.

Name: The Troops
Verse: When some affliction visits a man, he calls upon his Lord, turning to him; then when He confers on him a blessing from Him he forgets that he was calling to before and sets up compeers to God, to lead astray from His way. Say: ’Enjoy thy unbelief a little; thou shalt be among the inhabitants of the Fire.’

Name: The Troops
Verse: Or is he who is obedient in the watches of the night, bowing himself and standing, he being afraid of the world to come and hoping for the mercy of his Lord . . ? Say: ’Are they equal -- those who know and those who know not?’ Only men possessed of minds remember.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Say: ’My servants who believe, fear your Lord. For those who do good in this world good, and God’s earth is wide. Surely the patient will be paid their wages in full without reckoning.’

Name: The Troops
Verse: Say: ’I have been commanded to serve God making my religion His sincerely;

Name: The Troops
Verse: and I have been commanded to be the first of those that surrender.’

Name: The Troops
Verse: Say: ’Truly I fear, if I should rebel against my Lord, the chastisement of a dreadful day.’

Name: The Troops
Verse: Say: ’God I serve, making my religion His sincerely;

Name: The Troops
Verse: so serve what you will apart from Him.’ Say: ’Surely the losers are they who lose themselves and their families on the Day of Resurrection; is not that the manifest loss?

Name: The Troops
Verse: Above them they shall have overshadowings. of the Fire, and underneath them overshadowings; that it is wherewith God frightens His servants: "O My servants, so fear you Me!"’

Name: The Troops
Verse: Those who eschew the serving of idols and turn penitent to God, for them is good tidings! So give thou good tidings to My servants

Name: The Troops
Verse: who give ear to the Word and follow the fairest of it. Those are they whom God has guided; those -- they are men possessed of minds.

Name: The Troops
Verse: He against whom the word of chastisement is realized -- shalt thou deliver him out of the Fire?

Name: The Troops
Verse: But those who fear their Lord -- for them await lofty chambers, above which are built lofty chambers, underneath which rivers flow -- God’s promise; God fails not the tryst.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Hast thou not seen how that God has sent down out of heaven water and threaded it as springs in the earth, then He brings forth therewith crops of diverse hues, then they wither, and thou seest them turning yellow, then He makes them broken orts? Surely in that is a reminder for men possessed of minds.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Is he whose breast God has expanded unto Islam, so he walks in a light from his Lord . . .? But woe to those whose hearts are hardened against the remembrance of God! Those are in manifest error.

Name: The Troops
Verse: God has sent down the fairest discourse as a Book, consimilar in its oft-repeated, whereat shiver the skins of those who fear their Lord; then their skins and their hearts soften to the remembrance of God. That is God’s guidance, whereby. He guides whomsoever He will; and whomsoever God leads astray, no guide has he.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Is he who guards himself with his face against the evil of the chastisement on the Day of Resurrection . . .? And it is said to the evildoers, ’Taste now that you were earning!’

Name: The Troops
Verse: Those that were before them cried lies, then the chastisement came upon them from whence they were not aware;

Name: The Troops
Verse: so God let them taste degradation in this present life; and the chastisement of the world to come is assuredly greater, did they but know.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Indeed We have struck for the people in this Koran every manner of similitude; haply they will remember;

Name: The Troops
Verse: Koran, wherein there is no crookedness; haply they will be godfearing.

Name: The Troops
Verse: God has struck a similitude -- a man in whom partners disagreeing share, and a man the property of one man. Are the two equal in likeness? Praise belongs to God! Nay, but most of them do not know.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Thou art mortal, and they are mortal;

Name: The Troops
Verse: then on the Day of Resurrection before your Lord you shall dispute.

Name: The Troops
Verse: But who does greater evil than he who lies against God and cries lies to the very truth, when it comes to him? Is there not in Gehenna a lodging for the unbelievers?

Name: The Troops
Verse: And he who has come with the very truth and confirms it, those they are the godfearing.

Name: The Troops
Verse: They shall have whatsoever they will with their Lord; that is the recompense of the good-doers,

Name: The Troops
Verse: that God may acquit them of the worst of what they did, and recompense them with the wages of the fairest of what they were doing.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Shall not God suffice His servant, though they frighten thee with those apart from Him? And whomsoever God leads astray, no guide has he.

Name: The Troops
Verse: But whomso God guides, none shall lead him astray; is not God All-mighty, All-vengeful?

Name: The Troops
Verse: If thou askest them, ’Who created the heavens and the earth?’ they will say, ’God.’ Say: ’What think you? That you call upon apart from God -- if God desires affliction for me, shall they remove His affliction? Or if He desires mercy for me, shall they withhold His mercy?’ Say: ’God is enough for me; in Him all those put their trust who put their trust.’

Name: The Troops
Verse: Say: ’My people, act according to your station; I am acting; and soon you will know

Name: The Troops
Verse: to whom will come a chastisement degrading him, and upon whom lights a lasting chastisement.’

Name: The Troops
Verse: Surely We have sent down upon thee the Book for mankind with the truth. Whosoever is guided, is only guided to his own gain, and whosoever goes astray, it is only to his own loss; thou art not a guardian over them.

Name: The Troops
Verse: God takes the souls at the time of their death, and that which has not died, in its sleep; He withholds that against which He has decreed death, but looses the other till a stated term. Surely in that are signs for a people who reflect. Or have they taken intercessors apart from God?

Name: The Troops
Verse: Say: ’What, even though they have no power whatever and no understanding?’

Name: The Troops
Verse: Say: ’To God belongs intercession altogether. His is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth; then unto Him you will be returned.’

Name: The Troops
Verse: When God is mentioned alone, then shudder the hearts of those who believe not in the Hereafter, but when those apart from Him are mentioned behold, they rejoice.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Say: ’O God, Thou originator of the heavens and the earth who knowest the Unseen and the Visible, Thou shalt judge between Thy servants touching that whereon they are at variance.’

Name: The Troops
Verse: If the evildoers possessed all that is in the earth, and the like of it with it, they would offer it to ransom themselves from the evil of the chastisement on the Day of Resurrection; yet there would appear to them from God that they never reckoned with,

Name: The Troops
Verse: and there would appear to them die evils of that they have earned, and they would be encompassed by that they mocked at.

Name: The Troops
Verse: When some affliction visits a man, he calls unto Us; then, when We confer on him a blessing from Us, he says, ’I was given it only because of a knowledge.’ Nay, it is a trial, but most of them do not know it.

Name: The Troops
Verse: So said those that were before them; but that they earned did not avail them,

Name: The Troops
Verse: in that the evils of that they earned smote them. The evildoers of these men, they too shall be smitten by the evils -- of that they earned; they will not be able to frustrate it.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Do they know that God outspreads and straitens His provision to whomsoever He will? Surely in that are signs for a people who believe.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Say: ’O my people who have been prodigal against yourselves, do not despair of God’s mercy; surely God forgives sins altogether; surely He is the All-forgiving, the All-compassionate.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Turn unto your Lord and surrender to Him, ere the chastisement comes upon you, then you will not be helped.

Name: The Troops
Verse: And follow the fairest of what has been sent down to you from your Lord, ere the chastisement comes upon you suddenly while you are unaware.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Lest any soul should say, ’Alas for me, in that I neglected my duty to God, and was a scoffer,’

Name: The Troops
Verse: or lest it should say, ’If only God had guided me, I should have been or lest among the godfearing,’

Name: The Troops
Verse: it should say, when it sees the chastisement, ’O that I might return again, and be among the good-doers.’

Name: The Troops
Verse: ’Yes indeed! My signs did come to thee, but thou hast cried them lies, and thou hast waxed proud, and become one of the unbelievers.’

Name: The Troops
Verse: And upon the Day of Resurrection thou shalt see those who lied against God, their faces blackened; is there not in Gehenna a lodging for those that are proud?

Name: The Troops
Verse: But God shall deliver those that were godfearing in their security; evil shall not visit them, neither shall they sorrow.

Name: The Troops
Verse: God is the Creator of every thing; He is Guardian over every thing;

Name: The Troops
Verse: unto Him belong the keys of the heavens and the earth. And those who disbelieve in the signs of God, those they are the losers.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Say: ’Is it other than God you bid me serve, you ignorant ones?’

Name: The Troops
Verse: It has been revealed to thee, and to those before thee, ’If thou associatest other gods with God, thy work shall surely fail and thou wilt be among the losers.’

Name: The Troops
Verse: Nay, but God do thou serve; and be thou among the thankful.

Name: The Troops
Verse: They measure not God with His true measure. The earth altogether shall be His handful on the Day of Resurrection, and the heavens shall be rolled up in His right hand. Glory be to Him! High be He exalted above that they associate!

Name: The Troops
Verse: For the Trumpet shall be blown, and whosoever is in the heavens and whosoever is in the earth shall swoon, save whom God wills. Then it shall be blown again, and lo, they shall stand, beholding.

Name: The Troops
Verse: And the earth shall shine with the light of its Lord, and the Book shall be set in place, and the Prophets and witnesses shall be brought, and justly the issue be decided between them, and they not wronged.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Every soul shall be paid in full for what it has wrought; and He knows very well what they do.

Name: The Troops
Verse: Then the unbelievers shall be driven in companies into Gehenna till, when they have come thither, then its gates will be opened and its keepers will say to them, ’Did not Messengers come to you from among yourselves, reciting to you the signs of your Lord and warning you against the encounter of this your day?’ They shall say, ’Yes indeed; but the word of the chastisement has been realized against the unbelievers.’

Name: The Troops
Verse: It shall be said, ’Enter the gates of Gehenna, to dwell therein forever.’ How evil is the lodging of those that are proud!

Name: The Troops
Verse: Then those that feared their Lord shall be driven in companies into Paradise, till, when they have come thither, and its gates are opened, and its keepers will say to them, ’Peace be upon you! Well you have fared; enter in, to dwell forever.’

Name: The Troops
Verse: And they shall say, ’Praise belongs to God, who has been true in His promise to us, and has bequeathed upon us the earth, for us to make our dwelling wheresoever we will in Paradise.’ How excellent is the wage of those that labour!

Name: The Troops
Verse: And thou shalt see the angels encircling about the Throne proclaiming the praise of their Lord; and justly the issue shall be decided between them; and it shall be said, ’Praise belongs to God, the Lord of all Being.’

Name: The Believer
Verse: Ha Mim

Name: The Believer
Verse: The sending down of the Book is from God the All-mighty, the All-knowing,

Name: The Believer
Verse: Forgiver of sins, Accepter of penitence, Terrible in retribution, the Bountiful; there is no god but He, and unto Him is the homecoming.

Name: The Believer
Verse: None but the unbelievers dispute concerning the signs of God; so let not their going to and fro in the land delude thee.

Name: The Believer
Verse: The people of Noah before them also cried lies, and the parties after them; every nation purposed against their Messenger to seize him, and disputed with falsehood that they might rebut thereby the truth. Then I seized them; and how was My retribution!

Name: The Believer
Verse: Even so the Word of thy Lord was realised against the unbelievers, that they are the inhabitants of the Fire.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Those who bear the Throne, and those round about it proclaim the praise of their Lord, and believe in Him, and they ask forgiveness for those who believe: ’Our Lord, Thou embracest every thing in mercy and knowledge; therefore forgive those who have repented, and follow Thy way, and guard them against the chastisement of Hell.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Our Lord, and admit them to the Gardens of Eden that Thou hast promised them and those who were righteous of their fathers, and their wives, and their seed; surely Thou art the All-mighty, the All-wise.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And guard them against evil deeds; whomsoever Thou guardest against evil deeds on that day, on him Thou hast had mercy; and that is indeed the mighty triumph.

Name: The Believer
Verse: It shall be proclaimed to the unbelievers, ’Surely God’s hatred is greater than your hatred one of another, when you were called unto belief, and disbelieved.’

Name: The Believer
Verse: They shall say, ’Our Lord, Thou hast caused us to die two deaths and Thou hast given us twice to live; now we confess our sins. Is there any way to go forth?’

Name: The Believer
Verse: That is because, when God was called to alone, you disbelieved; but if others are associated with Him, then you believe. Judgment belongs to God, the All-high, the All-great.

Name: The Believer
Verse: It is He who shows you His signs and sends down to you out of heaven provision; yet none remembers but he who repents.

Name: The Believer
Verse: So call unto God, making your religion His sincerely, though the unbelievers be averse.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Exalter of ranks is He, Possessor of the Throne, casting the Spirit of His bidding upon whomever He will of His servants, that he may warn them of the Day of Encounter,

Name: The Believer
Verse: the day they sally forth, and naught of theirs is hidden from God. ’Whose is’ the Kingdom today?’ ’God’s, the One, the Omnipotent.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Today each soul shall be recompensed for that it has earned; no wrong today. Surely God is swift at the reckoning.’

Name: The Believer
Verse: And warn them against the Day of the Imminent when, choking with anguish, the hearts are in the throats and the evildoers have not one loyal friend, no intercessor to be heeded.

Name: The Believer
Verse: He knows the treachery of the eyes and what the breasts conceal.

Name: The Believer
Verse: God shall decide justly, and those they call on, apart from Him, shall not decide by any means. surely God is the All-hearing, the All-seeing.

Name: The Believer
Verse: What, have they not journeyed in the land and beheld how was the end of those before them? They were stronger than themselves in might and left firmer traces in the earth; yet God seized them in their sins, and they had none to defend them from God.

Name: The Believer
Verse: That was because their Messengers came to them with the clear signs; but they disbelieved, so God seized them. Surely He is All-strong, terrible in retribution.

Name: The Believer
Verse: We also sent Moses with Our signs and a clear authority,

Name: The Believer
Verse: to Pharaoh, Haman and Korah; they said, ’A lying sorcerer!’

Name: The Believer
Verse: And when he brought them the truth from Us, they said, ’Slay the sons of those who believe with him, and spare their women.’ But the guile of the unbelievers is ever in error.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And Pharaoh said, ’Let me slay Moses, and let him call to his Lord. I fear that he may change, your religion, or that he may cause corruption to appear in the land.’

Name: The Believer
Verse: And Moses said, ’I take refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every man who is proud, and believes not in the Day of Reckoning.’

Name: The Believer
Verse: Then said a certain man, a believer ’of Pharaoh’s folk that kept hidden his belief, ’What, will you slay a man because he says, "My Lord is God," yet he has brought you the clear signs from your Lord? If he is a liar, his lying is upon his own head; but if he is truthful, somewhat of that he promises you will smite you. Surely God guides not him who is prodigal and a liar.

Name: The Believer
Verse: O my people! yours is the kingdom this day, being masters in the land, but who will help us against the punishment of Allah if it come to us? Firon said: I do not show you aught but that which I see (myself), and I do not make you follow any but the right way.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Then said he who believed, ’My people, truly I fear for you the like of the day of the parties,

Name: The Believer
Verse: the like of the case of Noah’s people, Ad, Thamood, and those after them; and God desires not wrong for His servants.’

Name: The Believer
Verse: O my people, I fear for you the Day of Invocation,

Name: The Believer
Verse: the day you turn about, retreating, having none to defend you from God; and whomsoever God leads astray, no guide has he.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Joseph brought you the clear signs before, yet you continued in doubt concerning that he brought you until, when he perished, you said, "God will never send forth a Messenger after him." Even, so God leads astray the prodigal and the doubter.’

Name: The Believer
Verse: (Those who dispute concerning the signs of God, without any authority come to them, very hateful is that in the sight of God and the believers; ’so God sets a seal on every heart proud’, arrogant.)

Name: The Believer
Verse: Pharaoh said, ’Haman, build for me a tower, that haply so I may reach the cords,

Name: The Believer
Verse: the cords of the heavens, and look upon Moses’ God; for I think that he is a liar.’ So the evil of his deeds was decked out fair to Pharaoh, and he was barred from the way, and Pharaoh’s guile came only to ruin.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Then said he who believed, ’My people, follow me, and I will guide you in the way of rectitude.

Name: The Believer
Verse: O my people, surely this present life is but a passing enjoyment; surely the world to come is the abode of stability.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Whosoever does an evil deed shall be recompensed only with the like of it, but whosoever does a righteous deed, be it male or female, believing -- those shall enter Paradise, therein provided without reckoning.

Name: The Believer
Verse: O my people, how is it with me, that I call you to salvation, and you call me to the Fire?

Name: The Believer
Verse: You call me to disbelieve in God, and to associate with Him that whereof I have no knowledge, while I call you to the All-mighty, the All-forgiving.

Name: The Believer
Verse: No doubt that what you call me to has no call heard, in this world or in the world to come, that to God we return, and that the prodigal are the inhabitants of the Fire.

Name: The Believer
Verse: You will remember what I say to you. I commit my affair to God; surely God sees His servants.’

Name: The Believer
Verse: So God guarded him against the evil things of their devising, and there encompassed the folk of Pharaoh the evil chastisement,

Name: The Believer
Verse: the Fire, to which they shall be exposed morning and evening; and on the day when the Hour is come: ’Admit the folk of Pharaoh into the most terrible chastisement!’

Name: The Believer
Verse: And when they argue one with the other in the Fire, and the weak say unto those who waxed proud, ’Why, we were your followers; will you avail us now against any part of the Fire?’

Name: The Believer
Verse: Then those who waxed proud shall say, ’Every one of us is in it; indeed, God already has passed judgment between His servants.’

Name: The Believer
Verse: And those who are in the Fire will say to the keepers of Gehenna, ’Call on your Lord, to lighten for us one day of the chastisement!’

Name: The Believer
Verse: They shall say, ’Did not your Messengers bring you the clear signs?’ They shall say, ’Yes indeed.’ They shall say, ’Then do you call!’ But the calling of the unbelievers is only in error.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Surely We shall help Our Messengers and those who have believed, in the present life, and upon the day when the witnesses arise,

Name: The Believer
Verse: upon the day when their excuses shall not profit the evildoers, and theirs shall be the curse, and theirs the evil abode.

Name: The Believer
Verse: We also gave Moses the guidance, and We bequeathed upon the Children of Israel the Book

Name: The Believer
Verse: for a guidance and for a reminder to men possessed of minds.

Name: The Believer
Verse: So be thou patient; surely God’s promise is true. And ask forgiveness for thy sin, and proclaim the praise of thy Lord at evening and dawn.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Those who dispute concerning the signs of God, without any authority come to them, in their breasts is only pride, that they shall never attain. So seek thou refuge in God; surely He is the All-hearing, the All-seeing.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Certainly the creation of the heavens and earth is greater than the creation of men; but most men know it not.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Not equal are the blind and the seeing man, those who believe and do deeds of righteousness, and the wrong-doer. Little do you reflect.

Name: The Believer
Verse: The Hour is coming, no doubt of it, but most men do not believe.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Your Lord has said, ’Call upon Me and I will answer you. Surely those who wax too proud to do Me service shall enter Gehenna utterly abject.’

Name: The Believer
Verse: It is God who made for you the night, to repose in it, and the day, to see. Surely God is bountiful to men, but most men are not thankful.

Name: The Believer
Verse: That then is God, your Lord, the Creator of everything; there is no god but He. How then are you perverted?

Name: The Believer
Verse: Even so perverted are they who deny the signs of God.

Name: The Believer
Verse: It is God who made for you the earth a fixed place and heaven for an edifice; And He shaped you, and shaped you well, and provided you with the good things. That then is God, your Lord, so blessed be God, the Lord of all Being.

Name: The Believer
Verse: He is the Living One; there is no god but He. So call upon Him, making your religion His sincerely. Praise belongs to God, the Lord of all Being.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Say: ’I am forbidden to serve those you call on apart from God once the clear signs came to me from my Lord; and I am commanded to surrender to the Lord of All Being.’

Name: The Believer
Verse: It is He who created you of dust then of a sperm-drop, then of a blood-clot, then He delivers you as infants, then that you may come of age, then that you may be old men -- though some of you there are who die before it -- and that you may reach a stated term; haply you will understand.

Name: The Believer
Verse: It is He who gives life, and makes to die; and when He decrees a thing, He but says to it ’Be,’ and it is.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Hast thou not regarded those who dispute concerning the signs of God, how they are turned about?

Name: The Believer
Verse: Those who cry lies to the Book and that wherewith We sent Our Messengers -- soon they will know!

Name: The Believer
Verse: When the fetters and chains are on their necks, and they dragged

Name: The Believer
Verse: into the boiling water, then into the Fire they are poured;

Name: The Believer
Verse: then it is said to them, ’Where are those you associated, apart from God?’

Name: The Believer
Verse: They shall say, ’They have gone astray from us; nay, but it was nothing at all that we called upon aforetime.’ Even so God leads astray the unbelievers.

Name: The Believer
Verse: ’That is because you rejoiced in the earth without right, and were exultant.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Enter the gates of Gehenna, to dwell therein forever.’ How evil is the lodging of those that are proud!

Name: The Believer
Verse: So be thou patient; surely God’s promise is true. Whether We show thee a part of that We promise them, or We call thee unto Us, to Us they shall be returned.

Name: The Believer
Verse: We sent Messengers before thee; of some We have related to thee, and some We have not related to thee. It was not for any Messenger to bring a sign, save by God’s leave. When God’s command comes, justly the issue shall be decided; then the vain-doers shall be lost.

Name: The Believer
Verse: It is God who appointed for you the cattle, some of them to ride and of some you eat;

Name: The Believer
Verse: other uses also you have in them; and that on them you may attain a need in your breasts, and upon them and on the ships you are carried.

Name: The Believer
Verse: And He shows you His signs; then which of God’s signs do you reject?

Name: The Believer
Verse: What, have they not journeyed in the land and beheld how was the end of those before them? They were stronger than themselves in might and left firmer traces in the earth; yet that they earned did not avail them.

Name: The Believer
Verse: So, when their Messengers brought them the clear signs, they rejoiced in what knowledge they had, and were encompassed by that they mocked at.

Name: The Believer
Verse: Then, when they saw Our might, they said, ’We believe in God alone, and we disbelieve in that we were associating with Him.’

Name: The Believer
Verse: But their belief when they saw Our might did not profit them -- the wont of God, as in the past, touching His servants; then the unbelievers shall be lost.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Ha Mim

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: A sending down from the Merciful, the Compassionate.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: A Book whose signs have been distinguished as an Arabic Koran for a people having knowledge,

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: good tidings to bear, and warning, but most of them have turned away, and do not give ear.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: They say, ’Our hearts are veiled from what thou callest us to, and in our ears is a heaviness, and between us and thee there is a veil; so act; we are acting!’

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Say: ’I am only a mortal, like you are. To me it has been revealed that your God is One God; so go straight with Him, and ask for His forgiveness; and woe to the idolaters

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: who pay not the alms, and disbelieve in the world to come.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Surely those who believe, and do righteous deeds shall have a wage unfailing.’

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Say: ’What, do you disbelieve in Him who created the earth in two days, and do you set up compeers to Him? That is the Lord of all Being.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: ’And He set therein firm mountains over it, and He blessed it, and He ordained therein its diverse sustenance in four days, equal to those who ask.’

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Then He lifted Himself to heaven when it was smoke, and said to it and to the earth, "Come willingly, or unwillingly!" They said, "We come willingly."

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: So He determined them as seven heavens in two days, and revealed its commandment in every heaven.’

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And We adorned the lower heaven with lamps, and to reserve; that is the ordaining of the All-mighty, the All-knowing. But if they turn away, then say, ’I warn you of a thunderbolt like to the thunderbolt of Ad and Thamood.’

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: When the Messengers came unto them from before them and from behind them, saying, ’Serve none but God,’ they said, ’Had our Lord willed, surely He would have sent down angels; so we disbelieve in the Message you were sent with.’

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: As for Ad, they waxed proud in the earth without right, and they said, ’Who is stronger than we in might?’ What, did they not see that God, who created them, was stronger than they in might? And they denied Our signs.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Then We loosed against them a wind clamorous in days of ill fortune, that We might let them taste the chastisement of degradation in the present life; and the chastisement of the world to come is even more degrading, and they shall not be helped.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: As for Thamood, We guided them, but they preferred blindness above guidance, so the thunderbolt of the chastisement of humiliation seized them for that they were earning.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And We delivered those who believed and were godfearing.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Upon the day when God’s enemies are mustered to the Fire, duly disposed,

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: till when they are come to it, their hearing, their eyes and their skins bear witness against them concerning what they have been doing,

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: and they will say to their skins, ’Why bore you witness against us?’ They shall say, ’God gave us speech, as He gave everything speech. He created you the first time, and unto Him you shall be returned.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Not so did you cover yourselves, that your hearing, your eyes and your skins should not bear witness against you; but you thought that God would never know much of the things that you were working.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: That then, the thought you thought about your Lord, has destroyed you, and therefore you find yourselves this morning among the losers.’

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Then if they persist, the Fire shall be a lodging for them; and if they ask amends yet no amends shall be made to them.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: We have allotted them comrades, and they have decked out fair to them that which is before them and behind them. So against them has been realized the Word concerning nations that passed away before them, men and jinn alike; surely they were losers.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: The unbelievers say, ’Do not give ear to this Koran, and talk idly about it; haply you will overcome.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: So We shall let the unbelievers taste a terrible chastisement, and shall recompense them with the worst of what they were working.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: That is the recompense of God’s enemies -- the Fire, wherein they shall have the Abode of Eternity as a recompense, for that they denied Our signs.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And the unbelievers shall say, ’Our Lord, show us those that led us astray, both jinn and men, and we shall set them underneath our feet, that they may be among the lower ones.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Those who have said, ’Our Lord is God.’ then have gone straight, upon them the angels descend, saying, ’Fear not, neither sorrow; rejoice in Paradise that you were promised.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: We are your friends in the present life and in the world to come; therein you shall have all that your souls desire, all that you call for,

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: as hospitality from One All-forgiving, One All-compassionate.’

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And who speaks fairer than he who calls unto God and does righteousness and says, ’Surely I am of them that surrender’?

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Not equal are the good deed and the evil deed. Repel with that which is fairer and behold, he between whom and thee there is enmity shall be as if he were a loyal friend.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Yet none shall receive it, except the steadfast; none shall receive it, except a man of mighty fortune.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: If a provocation from Satan should provoke thee, seek refuge in God; He is the All-hearing, the All-knowing.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And of His signs are the night and the day, the sun and the moon. Bow not yourselves to the sun and moon, but bow yourselves to God who created them, if Him you serve.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And if they wax proud, yet those who are with thy Lord do glorify Him by night and day, and grow not weary.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And of His signs is that thou seest the earth humble; then, when We send down water upon it, it quivers, and swells. Surely He who quickens it is He who quickens the dead; surely He is powerful over everything.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Those who blaspheme Our signs are not hidden from Us. What, is he who shall be cast into the Fire better, or he who comes on the Day of Resurrection in security? Do what you will; surely He sees the things you do.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Those who disbelieve in the Remembrance when it comes to them -- and surely it is a Book Sublime;

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: falsehood comes not to it from before it nor from behind it; a sending down from One All-wise, All-laudable.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Naught is said to thee but what already was said to the Messengers before thee. Surely thy Lord is a Lord of forgiveness and of painful retribution.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: If We had made it a barbarous Koran, they would have said, ’Why are its signs not distinguished? What, barbarous and Arabic?’ Say: ’To the believers it is a guidance, and a healing; but those who believe not, in their ears is a heaviness, and to them it is a blindness; those -- they are called from a far place.’

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And We gave Moses the Book; and there was difference concerning it, and but for a Word that preceded from thy Lord, it had been decided between them; and they are in doubt of it disquieting.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Whoso does righteousness, it is to his own gain, and whoso does evil, it is to his own loss. Thy Lord wrongs not His servants.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: To Him is referred the knowledge of the Hour. Not a fruit comes forth from its sheath, no female bears or brings forth, save with His knowledge. Upon the day when He shall call to them, ’Where now are My associates?’ they shall say, ’We proclaim to Thee, there is not a witness among us.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Then that they called upon before will go astray from them and they will think that they have no asylum.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Man wearies not of praying for good; but when evil visits him, then he is cast down and desperate.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And if We let him taste mercy from Us after hardship that has visited him, he surely says, ’This is mine; I think not the Hour is coming. If I am returned to my Lord, surely the reward most fair with Him will be mine.’ Then We shall tell the unbelievers the things they have done, and assuredly We shall let them taste a harsh chastisement.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: And when We bless man, he turns away and withdraws aside; but when evil visits him, he is full of endless prayers.

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Say: ’What think you? If it is from God, then you disbelieve in it, who is further astray than he who is in wide schism?’

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: We shall show them Our signs in the horizons and in themselves, till it is clear to them that it is the truth. Suffices it not as to thy Lord, that He is witness over everything?

Name: Fussilat ("They are Expounded")
Verse: Are they not in doubt touching the encounter with their Lord? Does He not encompass everything?

Name: Counsel
Verse: Ha Mim

Name: Counsel
Verse: Ain Sin Qaf

Name: Counsel
Verse: So reveals to thee, and to those before thee, God, the All-mighty, the All-wise.

Name: Counsel
Verse: To Him belongs whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is in the earth; and He is the All-high, the All-glorious.

Name: Counsel
Verse: The heavens wellnigh are rent above them, when the angels proclaim the praise of their Lord, and ask forgiveness for those on earth. Surely God -- He is the All-forgiving, the All-compassionate.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And those who have taken to them protectors apart from Him -- God is Warden over them; thou art not a guardian over them.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And so We have revealed to thee an Arabic Koran, that thou mayest warn the Mother of Cities and those who dwell about it, and that thou mayest warn of the Day of Gathering, wherein is no doubt -- a party in Paradise, and a party in the Blaze.

Name: Counsel
Verse: If God had willed, He would have made them one nation; but He admits whomsoever He will into His mercy, and the evildoers shall have neither protector nor helper.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Or have they taken to them protectors apart from Him? But God -- He is the Protector; He quickens the dead, and He is powerful over everything.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And whatever you are at variance on, the judgment thereof belongs to God. That then is God, my Lord; in Him I have put my trust, and to Him I turn, penitent.

Name: Counsel
Verse: The Originator of the heavens and the earth; He has appointed for you, of yourselves, pairs, and pairs also of the cattle, therein multiplying you. Like Him there is naught; He is the All-hearing, the All-seeing.

Name: Counsel
Verse: To Him belong the keys of the heavens and the earth. He outspreads and straitens His provision to whom He will; surely He has knowledge of everything.

Name: Counsel
Verse: He has laid down for you as religion that He charged Noah with, and that We have revealed to thee, and that We charged Abraham with, Moses and Jesus: ’Perform the religion, and scatter not regarding it. Very hateful is that for the idolaters, that thou callest them to. God chooses unto Himself whomsoever He will, and He guides to Himself whosoever turns, penitent.

Name: Counsel
Verse: They scattered not, save after knowledge had come to them, being insolent one to another; and but for a Word that preceded from thy Lord until a stated term, it had been decided between them. But those to whom the Book has been given as an inheritance after them, behold, they are in doubt of it disquieting.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Therefore call thou, and go straight as thou hast been commanded; do not follow their caprices. And say: ’I believe in whatever Book God has sent down; I have been commanded to be just between you. God is our Lord and your Lord. We have our deeds, and you have your deeds; there is no argument between us and you; God shall bring us together, and unto Him is the homecoming.’

Name: Counsel
Verse: And those who argue concerning God after that answer has been made to Him, their argument is null and void in the sight of their Lord; anger shall rest upon them, and there awaits them a terrible chastisement.

Name: Counsel
Verse: God it is who has sent down the Book with the truth, and also the Balance. And what shall make thee know? Haply the Hour is nigh.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Those that believe not therein seek to hasten it; but those who believe in it go in fear of it, knowing that it is the truth. Why, surely those who are in doubt concerning the Hour are indeed in far error.

Name: Counsel
Verse: God is All-gentle to His servants, providing for whomsoever He will. He is the All-strong, the All-mighty.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Whoso desires the tillage of the world to come, We shall give him increase in his tillage; and whoso desires the tillage of this world, We shall give him of it, but in the world to come he will have no share.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Or have they associates who have laid down for them as religion that for which God gave not leave? But for the Word of Decision, it had been decided between them. For the evildoers there awaits a painful chastisement.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Thou seest the evildoers going in fear of that they have earned, that is about to fall on them; but those who believe and do righteous deeds are in Meadows of the Gardens; whatsoever they will they shall have with their Lord; that is the great bounty.

Name: Counsel
Verse: That is the good tidings God gives to His servants who believe and do righteous deeds. Say: ’I do not ask of you a wage for this, except love for the kinsfolk; and whosoever gains a good deed, We shall give him increase of good in respect of it. Surely God is All-forgiving, All-thankful.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Or do they say, ’He has forged against God a lie?’ But if God wills, He will set a seal on thy heart; and God blots out falsehood and verifies the truth by His words; He knows the thoughts within the breasts.

Name: Counsel
Verse: It is He who accepts repentance from His servants, and pardons evil deeds; He knows the things you do.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And He answers those who believe and do righteous deeds, and He gives them increase of His bounty. And the unbelievers -- for them awaits a terrible chastisement.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Had God expanded His provision to His servants, they would have been insolent in the earth; but He sends down in measure whatsoever He will; surely He is aware of and sees His servants.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And it is He who sends down the rain after they have despaired, and He unfolds His mercy; He is the Protector, the All-laudable.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And of His signs is the creation of the heavens and earth and the crawling things He has scattered abroad in them; and He is able to gather them whenever He will.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Whatever affliction may visit you is for what you own hands have earned; and He pardons much.

Name: Counsel
Verse: You are not able to frustrate Him in the earth; and, apart from God, you have neither protector nor helper.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And of His signs are the ships that run on the sea like landmarks;

Name: Counsel
Verse: and if He wills, He stills the wind, and they remain motionless on its back. Surely in that are signs for every man enduring, thankful.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Or He wrecks them for what they have earned; and He pardons much;

Name: Counsel
Verse: and that those who dispute concerning Our signs may know they have no asylum.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Whatever thing you have been given is the enjoyment of the present life; but what is with God is better and more enduring for those who believe and put their trust in their Lord.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And those who avoid the heinous sins and indecencies and when they are angry forgive,

Name: Counsel
Verse: and those who answer their Lord, and perform the prayer, their affair being counsel between them, and they expend of that We have provided them,

Name: Counsel
Verse: and who, when insolence visits them, do help themselves --

Name: Counsel
Verse: and the recompense of evil is evil the like of it; but whoso pardons and puts things right, his wage falls upon God; surely He loves not the evildoers.

Name: Counsel
Verse: And whosoever helps himself after he has been wronged -- against them there is no way.

Name: Counsel
Verse: The way is only open against those who do wrong to the people, and are insolent in the earth wrongfully; there awaits them a painful chastisement.

Name: Counsel
Verse: But surely he who bears patiently and is forgiving -- surely that is true constancy.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Whomsoever God leads astray, he has no protector after him; and thou shalt see the evildoers, when they see the chastisement, saying, ’Is there any way to be sent back?’

Name: Counsel
Verse: And thou shalt see them, as they are exposed to it, abject in humbleness, looking with furtive glance; and the believers shall say, ’Surely the losers are they who lose themselves and their families on the Day of Resurrection; surely the evildoers are in lasting chastisement.

Name: Counsel
Verse: They have no protectors to help them, apart from God, and whomsoever God leads astray, no way has he.’

Name: Counsel
Verse: Answer your Lord, before there comes a day from God that cannot be turned back; upon that day you shall have no shelter, no denial.

Name: Counsel
Verse: But if they turn away, We sent thee not to be a guardian over them. It is for thee only to deliver the Message. And when We let man taste mercy from Us, he rejoices in it; but if some evil befalls him for that his own hands have forwarded, then surely man is unthankful.

Name: Counsel
Verse: To God belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth; He creates what He will; He gives to whom He will females, and He gives to whom He will males

Name: Counsel
Verse: or He couples them, both males and females; and He makes whom He will barren. Surely He is All-knowing, All-powerful.

Name: Counsel
Verse: It belongs not to any mortal that God should speak to him, except by revelation, or from behind a veil, or that He should send a messenger and he reveal whatsoever He will, by His leave; surely He is All-high, All-wise.

Name: Counsel
Verse: Even so We have revealed to thee a Spirit of Our bidding. Thou knewest not what the Book was, nor belief; but We made it a light, whereby We guide whom We will of Our servants. And thou, surely thou shalt guide unto a straight path --

Name: Counsel
Verse: the path of God, to whom belongs whatsoever is in the heavens, and whatsoever is in the earth. Surely unto God all things come home.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Ha Mim

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: By the Clear Book,

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: behold, We have made it an Arabic Koran; haply you will understand;

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: and behold, it is in the Essence of the Book, with Us; sublime indeed, wise.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Shall We turn away the Remembrance from you, for that you are a prodigal people?

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: How many a Prophet We sent among the ancients,

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: but not a Prophet came to them, without they mocked at him;

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: so We destroyed men stronger in valour than they, and the example of the ancients passed away.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: If thou askest them, ’Who created the heavens and earth?’ they will say, ’The All-mighty, the All-knowing created them.’

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: He who appointed the earth to be a cradle for you, and appointed ways for you therein, that haply you may be guided;

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: and who sent down out of heaven water in measure; and We revived thereby a land that was dead; even so you shall be brought forth;

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: and who created the pairs, all of them, and appointed for you ships and cattle such as you ride,

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: that you may be seated on their backs and then remember your Lord’s blessing when you are seated on them, and say, ’Glory be to Him, who has subjected this to us, and we ourselves were not equal to it;

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: surely unto our Lord we are turning.’

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Yet they have assigned to Him a part of His own servants! Man is dearly unthankful.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Or has He taken to Himself, from that He creates, daughters, and favoured you with sons?

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And when any of them is given the good tidings of that he has likened to the All-merciful, his face is darkened, and he chokes inwardly.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: What, one who is reared amid ornaments and, when the time of altercation comes, is not to be seen?

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And they have made the angels, who are themselves servants of the All-merciful, females. What, did they witness their creation? Their witness shall be written down, and they shall be questioned.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: They say, ’Had the All-merciful so willed, we would not have served them.’ They have no knowledge of that; they are only conjecturing.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Or did We bring them a Book aforetime to which they hold?

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Nay, but they say, ’We found our fathers upon a community, and we are guided upon their traces.’

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Even so We sent never before thee any warner into any city, except that its men who lived at ease said, ’We indeed found our fathers upon a community, and we are following upon their traces.’

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Say: ’What, though I should bring you a better guidance than you found your fathers upon?’ They say, ’We disbelieve in that you were sent with.’

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: So We took vengeance upon them; and behold how was the end of them that cried lies.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And when Abraham said to his father and his people, ’Surely I am quit of that you serve,

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: except Him who originated me; and He will guide me.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And he made it a word enduring among his posterity; haply so they would return.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Nay, but I gave these and their fathers enjoyment of days, until the truth came unto them, and a manifest Messenger.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And when the truth came to them, they said, ’This is a sorcery, and in it we are unbelievers.’

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: They say, ’Why was this Koran not sent down upon some man of moment in the two cities?’

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: What, is it they who divide the mercy of the Lord? We have divided between them their livelihood in the present life, and raised some of them above others in rank, that some of them may take others in servitude; and the mercy of thy Lord is better than that they amass.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And were it not that mankind would be one nation, We would have appointed for those who disbelieve in the All-merciful roofs of silver to their houses, and stairs whereon to mount,

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: and doors to their houses, and couches whereon to recline,

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: and ornaments; surely all this is but the enjoyment of the present life, and the world to come with thy Lord is for the godfearing.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Whoso blinds himself to the Remembrance of the All-merciful, to him We assign a Satan for comrade;

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: and they bar them from the way, and they think they are guided,

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: till, when he comes to Us, he says, ’Would there had been between me and thee the distance of the two Easts!’ An evil comrade!

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: It shall not profit you today, since you did evil, that you are partners in the chastisement.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: What, shalt thou make the deaf to hear, or shalt thou guide the blind and him who is in manifest error?

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Whether We take thee away, We shall take vengeance upon them,

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: or We show thee a part of that We promised them, surely We have power over them.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: So hold thou fast unto that which has been revealed unto thee; surely thou art upon a straight path.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Surely it is a Reminder to thee and to thy people; and assuredly you will be questioned.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Ask those of Our Messengers We sent before thee: Have We appointed, apart from the All-merciful, gods to be served?

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: We also sent Moses with Our signs to Pharaoh and his Council, and he said, ’Surely, I am the Messenger of the Lord of all Being.’

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: But when he brought them Our signs, lo, they laughed at them.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And not a sign We showed them, but it was greater than its sister sign; and We seized them with chastisement, that haply they should return.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And they said, ’Sorcerer, pray to thy Lord for us by the covenant He has made with thee, and surely we shall be right-guided.’

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: But when We removed from them the chastisement, behold, they broke their troth.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And Pharaoh proclaimed among his people: ’O my people, do I not possess the kingdom of Egypt, and these rivers flowing beneath me? What, do you not see?

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Or am I better than this man, who is contemptible and scarcely makes things clear?

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Why then have bracelets of gold not been cast on him, or angels not come with him conjoined?’

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: So he made his people unsteady, and they obeyed him; surely they were an ungodly people.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: So, when they had angered Us, We took vengeance on them, and We drowned them all together;

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: and We made them a thing past, and We appointed them for an example to later folk.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And when the son of Mary is cited as an example, behold, thy people turn away from it

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: and say, ’What, are our gods better, or he?’ They cite not him to thee, save to dispute;. nay, but they are a people contentious.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: He is only a servant We blessed, and We made him to be an example to the Children of Israel.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Had We willed, We would have appointed angels among you to be successors in the earth.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: It is knowledge of the Hour; doubt not concerning it, and follow me. This is a straight path.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Let not Satan bar you; he is for you a manifest foe.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And when Jesus came with the clear signs he said, ’I have come to you with wisdom, and that I may make clear to you some of that whereon you are at variance; so fear you God and obey you me.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Assuredly God is my Lord and your Lord; therefore serve Him; this is a straight path.’

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: But the parties among them fell into variance; so woe unto those who did evil, because of the chastisement of a painful day.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Are they looking for aught but the Hour, that it shall come upon them suddenly, when they are not aware?

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Friends on that day shall be foes to one another, but the god-fearing.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: ’O My servants, today no fear is on you, neither do you sorrow’ --

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: even those who believed in Our signs, and had surrendered themselves

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: ’Enter Paradise, you and your wives, walking with joy!’

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: There shall be passed around them platters of gold, and cups, therein being whatever the souls desire, and the eyes delight in. ’And therein, you shall dwell forever.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: This is the Paradise that you have been given for an inheritance for the things that you were doing.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Therein you have abundant fruits, whereof you may eat.’

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: But the evildoers dwell forever in the chastisement of Gehenna

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: that is not abated for them and therein they are sore confounded.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: We never wronged them, but they themselves did the wrong.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And they shall call, ’O Malik, let thy Lord have done with us!’ He will say, ’You will surely tarry.’

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: ’We brought you the truth, but most of you were averse to the truth.’

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Or have they contrived some matter? We too are contriving.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Or do they think We hear not their secret and what they conspire together? Yes indeed, and Our messengers are present with them writing it down.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Say: ’If the All-merciful has a son, then I am the first to serve him.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Glory be to the Lord of the heavens and the earth, the Lord of the Throne, above that they describe.’

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Then leave them alone to plunge and play, until they encounter that day of theirs which they are promised.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And it is He who in heaven is God and in earth is God; He is the All-wise, the All-knowing.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Glory be to Him, to whom belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth and all that between them is; with Him is the knowledge of the Hour, and to Him you shall be returned.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: Those they call upon, apart from Him, have no power of intercession, save such as have testified to the truth, and that knowingly.

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: If thou askest them, ’Who created you?’ they will say, ’God.’ How then are they perverted?

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: And for his saying, ’My Lord, surely these are a people who believe not’ --

Name: Ornaments of Gold
Verse: yet pardon them, and say, ’Peace!’ Soon they will know.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Ha Mim

Name: Smoke
Verse: By the Clear Book.

Name: Smoke
Verse: We have sent it down in a blessed night (We are ever warning)

Name: Smoke
Verse: therein every wise bidding

Name: Smoke
Verse: determined as a bidding from Us, (We are ever sending)

Name: Smoke
Verse: as a mercy from thy Lord (surely He is the All-hearing, the All-knowing)

Name: Smoke
Verse: Lord of the heavens and earth, and all that between them is if you have faith.

Name: Smoke
Verse: There is no god but He; He gives life and makes to die; your Lord and the Lord of your fathers, the ancients.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Nay, but they are in doubt, playing.

Name: Smoke
Verse: So be on the watch for a day when heaven shall bring a manifest smoke

Name: Smoke
Verse: covering the people; this is a painful chastisement.

Name: Smoke
Verse: ’O our Lord, remove Thou from us the chastisement; we are believers.’

Name: Smoke
Verse: How should they have the Reminder, seeing a clear Messenger already came to them,

Name: Smoke
Verse: then they turned away from him and said, ’A man tutored, possessed!’

Name: Smoke
Verse: ’Behold, We are removing the chastisement a little; behold, you revert!’

Name: Smoke
Verse: Upon the day when We shall assault most mightily, then We shall take Our vengeance.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Already before them We tried the people of Pharaoh, and a noble Messenger came unto them,

Name: Smoke
Verse: saying, ’Deliver to me God’s servants; I am for you a faithful Messenger,

Name: Smoke
Verse: and, ’Rise not up against God; behold, I come to you with a clear authority,

Name: Smoke
Verse: and I take refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you should stone me.

Name: Smoke
Verse: ’But if so be that you believe me not, go you apart from me!’

Name: Smoke
Verse: And he called to his Lord, saying, ’These are a sinful people.’

Name: Smoke
Verse: ’Then set thou forth with My servants in a watch of the night; surely you will be followed.

Name: Smoke
Verse: And leave the sea becalmed; they are a drowned host.’

Name: Smoke
Verse: They left how many gardens and fountains,

Name: Smoke
Verse: sown fields, and how noble a station,

Name: Smoke
Verse: and what prosperity they had rejoiced in!

Name: Smoke
Verse: Even so; and We bequeathed them upon another people.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Neither heaven nor earth wept for them, nor were they respited;

Name: Smoke
Verse: and We delivered the Children of Israel from the humbling chastisement,

Name: Smoke
Verse: from Pharaoh; surely he was a high One, of the prodigals;

Name: Smoke
Verse: and We chose them, out of a knowledge, above all beings,

Name: Smoke
Verse: and gave them signs wherein there was a manifest trial.

Name: Smoke
Verse: These men do say,

Name: Smoke
Verse: ’There is nothing but our first death; we shall not be revived.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Bring us our fathers, if you speak truly!’

Name: Smoke
Verse: Are they better, or the people of Tubba’ and those before them whom We destroyed? They were surely sinners.

Name: Smoke
Verse: We created not the heavens and earth, and all that between them is, in play;

Name: Smoke
Verse: We created them not save in truth; but most of them know it not.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Surely the Day of Decision shall be their appointed time, all together,

Name: Smoke
Verse: the day a master shall avail nothing a client, and they shall not be helped,

Name: Smoke
Verse: save him upon whom God has mercy; He is the All-mighty, the All-compassionate.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Lo, the Tree of Ez-Zakkoum

Name: Smoke
Verse: is the food of the guilty,

Name: Smoke
Verse: like molten copper, bubbling in the belly

Name: Smoke
Verse: as boiling water bubbles.

Name: Smoke
Verse: ’Take him, and thrust him into the midst of Hell,

Name: Smoke
Verse: then pour over his head the chastisement of boiling water!’

Name: Smoke
Verse: ’Taste! Surely thou art the mighty, the noble.

Name: Smoke
Verse: This is that concerning which you were doubting.’

Name: Smoke
Verse: Surely the godfearing shall be in a station secure

Name: Smoke
Verse: among gardens and fountains,

Name: Smoke
Verse: robed in silk and brocade, set face to face.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Even so; and We shall espouse them to wide-eyed houris,

Name: Smoke
Verse: therein calling for every fruit, secure.

Name: Smoke
Verse: They shall not taste therein of death, save the first death, And He shall guard them against the chastisement of Hell --

Name: Smoke
Verse: a bounty from thy Lord; that is the mighty triumph.

Name: Smoke
Verse: Now We have made it easy by thy tongue, that haply they may remember.

Name: Smoke
Verse: So be on the watch; they too are on the watch.

Name: Crouching
Verse: Ha Mim

Name: Crouching
Verse: The sending down of the Book is from God, the All-mighty, the All-wise.

Name: Crouching
Verse: Surely in the heavens and earth there are signs for the believers;

Name: Crouching
Verse: and in your creation, and the crawling things He scatters abroad, there are signs for a people having sure faith,

Name: Crouching
Verse: and in the alternation of night and day, and the provision God sends down from heaven, and therewith revives the earth after it is dead, and the turning about of the winds, there are signs for a people who understand.

Name: Crouching
Verse: Those are the signs of God that We recite to thee in truth; in what manner of discourse then, after God and His signs, will they believe?

Name: Crouching
Verse: Woe to every guilty impostor

Name: Crouching
Verse: who hears the signs of God being recited to him, then perseveres in waxing proud, as if he has not heard them; so give him the good tidings of a painful chastisement.

Name: Crouching
Verse: And when he knows anything of Our signs, he takes them in mockery; those for them awaits a humbling chastisement.

Name: Crouching
Verse: Behind them Gehenna; and that they have earned shall not avail them aught, nor those they took as protectors, apart from God; for them awaits a mighty chastisement.

Name: Crouching
Verse: This is guidance; and those who disbelieve in the signs of their Lord, there awaits them a painful chastisement of wrath.

Name: Crouching
Verse: God is He who has subjected to you the sea, that the ships may run on it at His commandment, and that you may seek His bounty; haply so you will be thankful.

Name: Crouching
Verse: And He has subjected to you what is in the heavens and what is in the earth, all together, from Him. Surely in that are signs for a people who reflect.

Name: Crouching
Verse: Say unto those who believe, that they forgive those who do not look for the days of God, that He may recompense a people for that they have been earning.

Name: Crouching
Verse: Whoso does righteousness, it is to his own gain, and whoso does evil, it is to his own loss; then to your Lord you shall be returned.

Name: Crouching
Verse: Indeed, We gave the Children of Israel the Book, the Judgment, and the Prophethood, and We provided them with good things, and We preferred them above all beings.

Name: Crouching
Verse: We gave them clear signs of the Command; so they differed not, except after the knowledge had come to them, being insolent one to another. Surely thy Lord will decide between them on the Day of Resurrection touching their differences.

Name: Crouching
Verse: Then We set thee upon an open way of the Command; therefore follow it, and follow not the caprices of those who do not know.

Name: Crouching
Verse: Surely they will not avail thee aught against God. Surely the evildoers are friends one of the other; God is the friend of the godfearing.

Name: Crouching
Verse: This is clear proofs for men, and a guidance, and a mercy to a people having sure faith.

Name: Crouching
Verse: Or do those who commit evil deeds think that We shall make them as those who believe and do righteous deeds, equal their living and their dying? How ill they judge!

Name: Crouching
Verse: God created the heavens and the earth in truth, and that every soul may be recompensed for what it has earned; they shall not be wronged.

Name: Crouching
Verse: Hast thou seen him who has taken his caprice to be his god, and God has led him astray out of a knowledge, and set a seal upon his hearing and his heart, and laid a covering on his eyes? Who shall guide him after God? What, will you not remember?

Name: Crouching
Verse: They say, ’There is nothing but our present life; we die, and we live, and nothing but Time destroys us.’ Of that they have no knowledge; they merely conjecture.

Name: Crouching
Verse: And when Our signs are recited to them, clear signs, their only argument is that they say, ’Bring us our fathers, if you speak truly.’

Name: Crouching
Verse: Say: ’God gives you life, then makes you die, then He shall gather you to the Day of Resurrection, wherein is no doubt, but most men do not know.’

Name: Crouching
Verse: And unto Allah belongeth the Sovereignty of the heavens and the earth; and on the day when the Hour riseth, on that day those who follow falsehood will be lost.

Name: Crouching
Verse: And thou shalt see every nation hobbling on their knees, every nation being summoned unto its Book: ’Today you shall be recompensed for that you were doing.

Name: Crouching
Verse: This is Our Book, that speaks against you the truth; We have been registering all that you were doing.’

Name: Crouching
Verse: And as for those who have believed and done deeds of righteousness, their Lord shall admit them into His mercy; that is the manifest triumph.

Name: Crouching
Verse: But as for those who have disbelieved: ’Were not My signs recited to you, and you waxed proud, and were a sinful people?

Name: Crouching
Verse: And when it was said, "God’s promise is true, and the Hour, there is no doubt of it," you said; "We know not what the Hour may be; we have only a surmise, and are by no means certain."

Name: Crouching
Verse: And the evil deeds that they have done shall appear to them, and they shall be encompassed by that they mocked at.

Name: Crouching
Verse: And it shall be said, ’Today We do forget you, even as you forgot the encounter of this your day; and your refuge is the Fire, and you shall have no helpers.

Name: Crouching
Verse: That is for that you took God’s signs in mockery, and the present life deluded you.’ So today they shall not be brought forth from it, nor will they be suffered to make amends.

Name: Crouching
Verse: So to God belongs praise, the Lord of the heavens and the Lord of the earth, Lord of all Being.

Name: Crouching
Verse: His is the Domination an the heavens and the earth; He is the All-mighty, the All-wise.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Ha Mim

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: The sending down of the Book is from God, the All-mighty, the All-wise.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: We have not created the heavens and the earth, and what between them is, save with the truth and a stated term; but the unbelievers are turning away from that they were warned of.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Say: ’Have you considered that you call upon apart from God? Show me what they have created of the earth; or have they a partnership in the heavens? Bring me a Book before this, or some remnant of a knowledge, if you speak truly.’

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: And who is further astray than he who calls, apart from God, upon such a one as shall not answer him till the Day of Resurrection? Such as are heedless of their calling,

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: and when mankind are mustered, shall be enemies to them, and shall deny their service.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: And when Our signs are recited to them, clear signs, the unbelievers say to the truth when it has come to them, ’This is manifest sorcery.’

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Or do they say, ’He has forged it’? Say: ’If I have forged it, you have no power to help me against God. He knows very well what you are pressing upon; He suffices as a witness between me and you; He is the All-forgiving, the All-compassionate.’

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Say: ’I am not an innovation among the Messengers, and I know not what shall be done with me or with you. I only follow what is revealed to me; I am only a clear warner.’

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Say: ’Have you considered? If it be from God, and you disbelieve in it, and a witness from among the Children of Israel hears witness to its like, and believes, and you wax proud, God guides not the people of the evildoers.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: The unbelievers say, as regards the believers, ’If it had been aught good, they had not outstripped us to it.’ And since they are not guided by it, certainly they will say, ’This is an old calumny!’

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Yet before it was the Book of Moses for a model and a mercy; and this is a Book confirming, in Arabic tongue, to warn the evildoers, and good tidings to the good-doers.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Surely those who say, ’Our Lord is God’ and then go straight, no fear shall be on them, neither shall they sorrow.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Those are the inhabitants of Paradise, therein dwelling forever, as a recompense for that they have been doing.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: We have charged man, that he be kind to his parents; his mother bore him painfully, and painfully she gave birth to him; his bearing and his weaning are thirty months. Until, when he is fully grown, and reaches forty years, he says, ’O my Lord, dispose me that I may be thankful for Thy blessing wherewith Thou hast blessed me and my father and mother, and that I may do righteousness well-pleasing to Thee; and make me righteous also in my seed. Behold, I repent to Thee, and am among those that surrender.’

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Those are they from whom We shall accept the best of what they have done, and We shall pass over their evil deeds. They are among the inhabitants of Paradise -- the promise of the very truth, which they were promised.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: But he who says to his father and his mother, ’Fie upon you! Do you promise me that I shall be brought forth, when already generations have passed away before me?’ while they call upon God for succour -- ’Woe upon thee! Believe; surely God’s promise is true’; then he says, ’This is naught but the fairy-tales of the ancients’ --

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: such men are they against whom has been realized the Word concerning nations that passed away before them, men and jinn alike; they were losers.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: All shall have their degrees, according to what they have wrought, and that He may pay them in full for their works, and they not being wronged.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Upon the day when the unbelievers are exposed to the Fire: ’You dissipated your good things in your present life, and you took your enjoyment in them; therefore today you shall be recompensed with the chastisement of humiliation for that you waxed proud in the earth without right, and for your ungodliness.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: And remember the brother of Ad, when he warned his people beside the sand-dunes -- and already warners had passed away alike before him and behind him -- saying, ’Serve none but God! Truly I fear for you the chastisement of a dreadful day.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: They said, ’What, hast thou come to pervert us from our gods? Then bring us that thou promisest us, if indeed thou speakest truly.’

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: He said, ’Knowledge is only with God, and I deliver to you the Message with which I was sent; but I see you are an ignorant people.’

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Then, when they saw it as a sudden cloud coming towards their valleys, they said, ’This is a cloud, that shall give us rain!’ ’Not so; rather it is that you sought to hasten -- a wind, wherein is a painful chastisement,

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: destroying everything by the commandment of its Lord.’ So in the morning there was naught to be seen but their dwelling-places. Even so do We recompense the people of the sinners.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: And We had established them in that wherein We have not established you, and We appointed for them hearing, and sight, and hearts; and yet their hearing, their sight and their hearts availed them nothing, since they denied the signs of God, and they were encompassed by that they mocked at.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: And We destroyed the cities about you, and We turned about the signs, that haply they would return.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Then why did those not help them that they had taken to themselves as mediators, gods apart from God? Not so; but they went astray from them, and that was their calumny, and what they had been forging.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: And when We turned to thee a company of jinn giving ear to the Koran; and when they were in its presence they said, ’Be silent!’ Then, when it was finished, they turned back to their people, warning.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: They said, ’Our people, we have heard a Book that was sent down after Moses, confirming what was before it, guiding to the truth and to a straight path.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: O our people, answer God’s summoner, and believe in Him, and He will forgive you some of your sins, and protect you from a painful chastisement.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Whosoever answers not God’s summoner cannot frustrate God in the earth, and he has no protectors apart from Him; those are in manifest error.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: What, have they not seen that God who created the heavens and earth, not being wearied by creating them, is able to give life to the dead? Yes indeed; He is powerful over everything.

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: Upon the day when the unbelievers are exposed to the Fire: ’Is not this the truth?’ They shall say, ’Yes, by our Lord!’ He shall say, ’Then taste the chastisement of your unbelief!’

Name: The Wind-Curved Sandhills
Verse: So be thou patient, as the Messengers possessed of constancy were also patient.
