Seek not to hasten it for them -- it shall be as if on the day they see that they are promised, they had not tarried but for an hour of a single day. A Message to be delivered! And shall any be destroyed but the people of the ungodly?

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Those who disbelieve and bar from God’s way, God will send their works astray.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: But those who believe and do righteous deeds and believe in what is sent down to Muhammad -- and it is the truth from their Lord -- He will acquit them of their evil deeds, and dispose their minds aright.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: That is because those who disbelieve follow falsehood, and those who believe follow the truth from their Lord. Even so God strikes their similitudes for men.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: When you meet the unbelievers, smite their necks, then, when you have made wide slaughter among them, tie fast the bonds; then set them free, either by grace or ransom, till the war lays down its loads. So it shall be; and if God had willed, He would have avenged Himself upon them; but that He may try some of you by means of others. And those who are slain in the way of God, He will not send their works astray.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: He will guide them, and dispose their minds aright,

Name: Muhammad
Verse: and He will admit them to Paradise, that He has made known to them.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: O believers, if you help God, He will help you, and confirm your feet.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: But as for the unbelievers, ill chance shall befall them! He will send their works astray.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: That is because they have been averse to what God has sent down, so He has made their works to fail.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: What, have they not journeyed in the land and beheld how was the end of those before them? God destroyed them; the unbelievers shall have the likes thereof.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: That is because God is the Protector of the believers, and that the unbelievers have no protector.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: God shall surely admit those who believe and do righteous deeds into gardens underneath which rivers flow. As for the unbelievers, they take their enjoyment and eat as cattle eat; and the Fire shall be their lodging.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: How many a city that was stronger in might than thy city which has expelled thee have We destroyed! And there was no helper for them.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: What, is he who is upon a clear sign from his Lord like unto such a one unto whom his evil deeds have been decked out fair, and they have followed their caprices?

Name: Muhammad
Verse: This is the similitude of Paradise which the godfearing have been promised: therein are rivers of water unstaling, rivers of milk unchanging in flavour, and rivers of wine -- a delight to the drinkers, rivers, too, of honey purified; and therein for them is every fruit, and forgiveness from their Lord -- Are they as he who dwells forever in the Fire, such as are given to drink boiling water, that tears their bowels asunder?

Name: Muhammad
Verse: And some of them there are give ear to thee, till, when they go forth from thee, they say to those who have been given knowledge, ’What said he just now?’ Those are they upon whose hearts God has set a seal, and they have followed their caprices.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: But those who are guided aright, them He increases in guidance, and gives them their godfearing.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Are they looking for aught but the Hour, that it shall come upon them suddenly? Already its tokens have come; so, when it has come to them, how shall they have their Reminder?

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Know thou therefore that there is no god but God, and ask forgiveness for thy sin, and for the believers, men and women. God knows your going to and fro, and your lodging.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Those who believe say, ’Why has a sura not been sent down?’ Then, when a clear sura is sent down, and therein fighting is mentioned, thou seest those in whose hearts is sickness looking at thee as one who swoons of death; but better for them would be

Name: Muhammad
Verse: obedience, and words honourable. Then, when the matter is resolved, if they were true to God, it would be better for them.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: If you turned away, would you then haply work corruption in the land, and break your bonds of kin?

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Those are they whom God has cursed, and so made them deaf, and blinded their eyes.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: What, do they not ponder the Koran? Or is it that there are locks upon their hearts?

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Those who have turned back in their traces after the guidance has become clear to them, Satan it was that tempted them, and God respited them.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: That is because they said to those who were averse to what God sent down, ’We will obey you in some of the affair’; and God knows their secrets.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: How shall it be, when the angels take them, beating their faces and their backs?

Name: Muhammad
Verse: That is because they have followed what angers God, and have been averse to His good pleasure, so He has made their works to fail.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Or did those in whose hearts is sickness think that God would not bring to light their rancour?

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Did We will, We would show them to thee, then thou wouldst know them by their mark; and thou shalt certainly know them in the twisting of their speech; and God knows your deeds.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: And We shall assuredly try you until We know those of you who struggle and are steadfast, and try your tidings.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Those who disbelieve and bar from God’s way and make a breach with the Messenger after the guidance has become clear to them, they will nothing hurt God, and He will make their works to fail.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: O believers, obey God, and obey the Messenger, and do not make your own works vain.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Those who disbelieve and bar from God’s way and then die disbelieving, them God will not forgive.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: So do not faint and call for peace; you shall be the upper ones, and God is with you, and will not deprive you of your works.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: The present life is naught but a sport and a diversion; and if you believe and are godfearing, He will give you your wages, and will not ask of you your goods.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: If He asks you for them, and presses you, you are niggardly, and He brings to light your rancour.

Name: Muhammad
Verse: Ha, there you are; you are called upon to expend in God’s way, and some of you are niggardly. Whoso is niggardly is niggardly only to his own soul. God is the All-sufficient; you are the needy ones. If you turn away, He will substitute another people instead of you, then they will not be your likes.

Name: Victory
Verse: Surely We have given thee a manifest victory,

Name: Victory
Verse: that God may forgive thee thy former and thy latter sins, and complete His blessing upon thee, and guide thee on a straight path,

Name: Victory
Verse: and that God may help thee with mighty help.

Name: Victory
Verse: It is He who sent down the Shechina (tranquillity) into the hearts of the believers, that they might add faith to their faith -- to God belong the hosts of the heavens and the earth; God is All-knowing, All-wise --

Name: Victory
Verse: and that He may admit the believers, men and women alike, into gardens underneath which rivers flow, therein to dwell forever, and acquit them of their evil deeds; that is in God’s sight a mighty triumph;

Name: Victory
Verse: and that He may chastise the hypocrites, men and women alike, and the idolaters men and women alike, and those who think evil thoughts of God; against them shall be the evil turn of fortune. God is wroth with them, and has cursed them, and has prepared for them Gehenna -- an evil homecoming!

Name: Victory
Verse: To God belong the hosts of the heavens and the earth; God is All-mighty, All-wise.

Name: Victory
Verse: Surely We have sent thee as a witness, good tidings to bear, and warning,

Name: Victory
Verse: that you may believe in God and His Messenger and succour Him, and reverence Him, and that you may give Him glory at the dawn and in the evening.

Name: Victory
Verse: Those who swear fealty to thee swear fealty in truth to God; God’s hand is over their hands. Then whosoever breaks his oath breaks it but to his own hurt; and whoso fulfils his covenant made with God, God will give him a mighty wage.

Name: Victory
Verse: The Bedouins who were left behind will say to thee, ’We were occupied by our possessions and our families; so ask forgiveness for us!’ They say with their tongues what is not in their hearts. Say: ’Who can avail you aught against God, if He desires hurt for you, or desires profit for you? Nay, but God is ever aware of the things you do.

Name: Victory
Verse: Nay, but you thought that the Messenger and the believers would never return to their families, and that was decked out fair in your hearts, and you thought evil thoughts, and you were a people corrupt.’

Name: Victory
Verse: Whoso believes not in God and His Messenger, We have prepared for the unbelievers a Blaze.

Name: Victory
Verse: To God belongs the kingdom of the heavens and of the earth; whomsoever He will He forgives, and whomsoever He will He chastises; God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

Name: Victory
Verse: The Bedouins who were left behind will say, when you set forth after spoils, to take them, ’Let us follow you,’ desiring to change God’s words. Say: ’You shall not follow us; so God said before.’ Then they will say, ’Nay, but you’ are jealous of us.’ Nay, but they have not understood except a little.

Name: Victory
Verse: Say to the Bedouins who were left behind: ’You shall be called against a people possessed of great might’ to fight them, or they surrender. If you obey, God will give you a goodly wage; but if you turn your backs, as you turned your backs before, He will chastise you with a painful chastisement.’

Name: Victory
Verse: There is no fault in the blind, and there is no fault in the lame, and there is no fault in the sick. And whosoever obeys God and His Messenger, He will admit him into gardens underneath which rivers flow; but whosoever turns his back, him He will chastise with a painful chastisement.

Name: Victory
Verse: God was well pleased with the believers when they were swearing fealty to thee under the tree, and He knew what was in their hearts, so He sent down the Shechina upon them, and rewarded them with a nigh victory

Name: Victory
Verse: and many spoils to take; and God is ever All-mighty, All-wise.

Name: Victory
Verse: God has promised you many spoils to take; these He has hastened to you, and has restrained the hands of men from you, and that it may be a sign to the believers, and to guide you on a straight path,

Name: Victory
Verse: and other spoils you were not able to take; God had encompassed them already. God is powerful over everything.

Name: Victory
Verse: If the unbelievers had fought you, they would have turned their backs, and then found neither protector nor helper;

Name: Victory
Verse: the wont of God, as in the past before, and thou shalt never find any changing the wont of God.

Name: Victory
Verse: It is He who restrained their hands from you, and your hands from them, in the hollow of Mecca, after that He made you victors over them. God sees the things you do.

Name: Victory
Verse: They are the ones who disbelieved, and barred you from the Holy Mosque and the offering, detained so as not to reach its place of sacrifice. If it had not been for certain men believers and certain women believers whom you knew not, lest you should trample them, and there befall you guilt unwittingly on their account (that God may admit into His mercy whom He will), had they been separated clearly, then We would have chastised the unbelievers among them with a painful chastisement.

Name: Victory
Verse: When the unbelievers set in their hearts fierceness, the fierceness of pagandom, then God sent down His Shechina upon His Messenger and the believers, and fastened to them the word of godfearing to which they have better right and are worthy of; and God has’ knowledge of everything.

Name: Victory
Verse: God has indeed fulfilled the vision He vouchsafed to His Messenger truly: ’You shall enter the Holy Mosque, if God wills, in security, your heads shaved, your hair cut short, not fearing.’ He knew what you knew not, and appointed ere that a nigh victory.

Name: Victory
Verse: It is He who has sent His Messenger with the guidance and the religion of truth, that He may uplift it above every religion. God suffices as a witness.

Name: Victory
Verse: Muhammad is the Messenger of God, and those who are with him are hard against the unbelievers, merciful one to another. Thou seest them bowing, prostrating, seeking bounty from God and good pleasure. Their mark is on their faces, the trace of prostration. That is their likeness in the Torah, and their likeness in the Gospel: as a seed that puts forth its shoot, and strengthens it, and it grows stout and rises straight upon its stalk, pleasing the sowers, that through them He may enrage the unbelievers. God has promised those of them who believe and do deeds of righteousness forgiveness and a mighty wage.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: O believers, advance not before God and His Messenger; and fear God. God is All-hearing, All-knowing.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: O believers, raise not your voices above the Prophet’s voice, and be not loud in your speech to him, as you are loud one to another, lest your works fail while you are not aware.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: Surely those who lower their voices in the presence of God’s Messenger, those are they whose hearts God has tested for godfearing; they shall have forgiveness and a mighty wage.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: Surely those who call unto thee from behind the apartments, the most of them do not understand.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: And if they had patience, until thou comest out to them, that would be better for them; and God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: O believers, if an ungodly man comes to you with a tiding, make clear, lest you afflict a people unwittingly, and then repent of what you have done.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: And know that the Messenger of God is among you. If he obeyed you in much of the affair, you would suffer; but God has endeared to you belief, decking it fair in your hearts, and He has made detestable to you unbelief and ungodliness and disobedience. Those -- they are the right-minded,

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: by God’s favour and blessing; God is All-knowing, All-wise.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: If two parties of the believers fight, put things right between them; then, if one of them is insolent against the other, fight the insolent one till it reverts to God’s commandment. If it reverts, set things right between them equitably, and be just. Surely God loves the just.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: The believers indeed are brothers; so set things right between your two brothers, and fear God; haply so you will find mercy.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: O believers, let not any people scoff at another people who may be better than they; neither let women scoff at women who may be better than themselves. And find not fault with one another, neither revile one another by nicknames. An evil name is ungodliness after belief. And whoso repents not, those -- they are the evildoers.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: O believers, eschew much suspicion; some suspicion is a sin. And do not spy, neither backbite one another; would any of you like to eat the flesh of his brother dead? You would abominate it. And fear you God; assuredly God turns, and He is All-compassionate.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: O mankind, We have created you male and female, and appointed you races and tribes, that you may know one another. Surely the noblest among you in the sight of God is the most godfearing of you. God is All-knowing, All-aware.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: The Bedouins say, ’We believe.’ Say: ’You do not believe; rather say, "We surrender"; for belief has not yet entered your hearts. If you obey God and His Messenger, He will not diminish you anything of your works. God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.’

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: The believers are those who believe in God and His Messenger, then have not doubted, and have struggled with their possessions and their selves in the way of God; those -- they are the truthful ones.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: Say: ’What, would you teach God what your religion is, and God knows what is in the heavens and what is in the earth? And God has knowledge of everything.’

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: They count it as a favour to thee that they have surrendered! Say: ’Do not count your surrendering as a favour to me; nay, but rather God confers a favour upon you, in that He has guided you to belief, if it be that you are truthful.

Name: The Private Apartments
Verse: God knows the Unseen of the heavens and of the earth; and God sees the things you do.’

Name: Qâf
Verse: Qaf. By the glorious Koran!

Name: Qâf
Verse: Nay, but they marvel that a warner has come to them from among them; and the unbelievers say, ’This is a marvellous thing!

Name: Qâf
Verse: What, when we are dead and become dust? That is a far returning!’

Name: Qâf
Verse: We know what the earth diminishes of them; with Us is a book recording.

Name: Qâf
Verse: Nay, but they cried lies to the truth when it came to them, and so they are in a case confused.

Name: Qâf
Verse: What, have they not beheld heaven above them, how We have built it, and decked it out fair, and it has no cracks?

Name: Qâf
Verse: And the earth -- We stretched it forth, and cast on it firm mountains, and We caused to grow therein of every joyous kind

Name: Qâf
Verse: for an insight and a reminder to every penitent servant.

Name: Qâf
Verse: And We sent down out of heaven water blessed, and caused to grow thereby gardens and grain of harvest

Name: Qâf
Verse: and tall palm-trees with spathes compact,

Name: Qâf
Verse: a provision for the servants, and thereby We revived a land that was dead. Even so is the coming forth.

Name: Qâf
Verse: Cried lies before them the people of Noah and the men of Er-Rass, and Thamood,

Name: Qâf
Verse: and Ad and Pharaoh, the brothers of Lot,

Name: Qâf
Verse: the men of the Thicket, the people of Tubba’. Every one cried lies to the Messengers, and My threat came true.

Name: Qâf
Verse: What, were We wearied by the first creation? No indeed; but they are in uncertainty as to the new creation.

Name: Qâf
Verse: We indeed created man; and We know what his soul whispers within him, and We are nearer to him than the jugular vein.

Name: Qâf
Verse: When the two angels meet together, sitting one on the right, and one on the left,

Name: Qâf
Verse: not a word he utters, but by him is an observer ready.

Name: Qâf
Verse: And death’s agony comes in truth; that is what thou wast shunning!

Name: Qâf
Verse: And the Trumpet shall be blown; that is the Day of the Threat.

Name: Qâf
Verse: And every soul shall come, and with it a driver and a witness.

Name: Qâf
Verse: ’Thou wast heedless of this; therefore We have now removed from thee thy covering, and so thy sight today is piercing.’

Name: Qâf
Verse: And his comrade shall say, ’This is what I have, made ready.’

Name: Qâf
Verse: ’Cast, you twain, into Gehenna every froward unbeliever,

Name: Qâf
Verse: every hinderer of the good, transgressor, disquieter,

Name: Qâf
Verse: who set up with God another god; therefore, you twain, cast him into the terrible chastisement.’

Name: Qâf
Verse: And his comrade shall say, ’Our Lord, I made him not insolent, but he was in far error.’

Name: Qâf
Verse: He shall say, ’Dispute not before Me! For I sent you beforehand -- the threat.

Name: Qâf
Verse: The Word is not changed with Me; I wrong not My servants.’

Name: Qâf
Verse: Upon the day We shall say unto Gehenna, ’Art thou filled?’ And it shall say, ’Are there any more to come?’

Name: Qâf
Verse: And Paradise shall be brought forward to the godfearing, not afar:

Name: Qâf
Verse: ’This is that you were promised; it is for every mindful penitent.’

Name: Qâf
Verse: Whosoever fears the All-merciful in the Unseen, and comes with a penitent heart:

Name: Qâf
Verse: ’Enter it in peace! This is the Day of Eternity.’

Name: Qâf
Verse: Therein they shall have whatever they will; and with Us there is yet more.

Name: Qâf
Verse: How many a generation We destroyed before them that was stronger in valour than they, then they searched about in the land; was there any asylum?

Name: Qâf
Verse: Surely in that there is a reminder to him who has a heart, or will give ear with a present mind.

Name: Qâf
Verse: We created the heavens and the earth, and what between them is, in six days, and no weariness touched Us.

Name: Qâf
Verse: So be thou patient under what they say, and proclaim thy Lord’s praise before the rising of the sun, and before its setting,

Name: Qâf
Verse: and proclaim thy Lord’s praise in the night, and at the ends of the prostrations.

Name: Qâf
Verse: And listen thou for the day when the caller shall call from a near place.

Name: Qâf
Verse: On the day they hear the Cry in truth, that is the day of coming forth.

Name: Qâf
Verse: It is We who give life, and make to die, and to Us is the homecoming.

Name: Qâf
Verse: Upon the day when the earth is split asunder from about them as they hasten forth; that is a mustering easy for Us.

Name: Qâf
Verse: We know very well what they say; thou art not a tyrant over them. Therefore remind by the Koran him who fears My threat.

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: By the swift scatterers

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: and the burden-bearers

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: and the smooth runners

Name: The Winnowing Winds
Verse: and the partitioners,

Name: The Winnowing Winds

Name: The Beneficent
Verse: Blessed be the Name of thy Lord, majestic, splendid.

Name: The Event

Name: The Event

Name: The Event

Name: The Event
Verse: What, and our fathers, the ancients?’

Name: The Event
Verse: Say: ’The ancients, and the later folk

Name: The Event
Verse: shall be gathered to the appointed time of a known day.

Name: The Event
Verse: Then you erring ones, you that cried lies,

Name: The Event
Verse: you shall eat of a tree called Zakkoum,

Name: The Event
Verse: and you shall fill therewith your bellies

Name: The Event
Verse: and drink on top of that boiling water

Name: The Event
Verse: lapping it down like thirsty camels.’

Name: The Event
Verse: This shall be their hospitality on the Day of Doom.

Name: The Event
Verse: We created you; therefore why will you not believe?

Name: The Event
Verse: Have you considered the seed you spill?

Name: The Event
Verse: Do you yourselves create it, or are We the Creators?

Name: The Event
Verse: We have decreed among you Death; We shall not be outstripped;

Name: The Event
Verse: that We may exchange the likes of you, and make you to grow again in a fashion you know not.

Name: The Event
Verse: You have known the first growth; so why will you not remember?

Name: The Event
Verse: Have you considered the soil you till?

Name: The Event
Verse: Do you yourselves sow it, or are We the Sowers?

Name: The Event
Verse: Did We will, We would make it broken orts, and you would remain bitterly jesting --

Name: The Event
Verse: ’We are debt-loaded;

Name: The Event
Verse: nay, we have been robbed!’

Name: The Event
Verse: Have you considered the water you drink?

Name: The Event
Verse: Did you send it down from the clouds, or did We send it?

Name: The Event
Verse: Did We will, We would make it bitter; so why are you not thankful?

Name: The Event
Verse: Have you considered the fire you kindle?

Name: The Event
Verse: Did you make its timber to grow, or did We make it?

Name: The Event
Verse: We Ourselves made it for a reminder, and a boon to the desert-dwellers.

Name: The Event
Verse: Then magnify the Name of thy Lord, the All-mighty.

Name: The Event
Verse: No! I swear by the fallings of the stars

Name: The Event

Name: The Event

Name: The Event

Name: The Event

Name: The Event
Verse: But if he be of them that cried lies, and went astray,

Name: The Event
Verse: there shall be a hospitality of boiling water

Name: The Event
Verse: and the roasting in Hell.

Name: The Event
Verse: Surely this is the truth of certainty.

Name: The Event
Verse: Then magnify the Name of thy Lord, the All-mighty.

Name: Iron
Verse: All that is in the heavens and the earth magnifies God; He is the All-mighty, the All-wise.

Name: Iron
Verse: To Him belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth; He gives life, and He makes to die, and He is powerful over everything.

Name: Iron
Verse: He is the First and the Last, the Outward and the Inward; He has knowledge of everything.

Name: Iron
Verse: It is He that created the heavens and the earth in six days then seated Himself upon the Throne. He knows what penetrates into the earth, and what comes forth from it, -- what comes down from heaven, and what goes up unto it. He is with you wherever you are; and God sees the things you do.

Name: Iron
Verse: To Him belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth; and unto Him all matters are returned.

Name: Iron
Verse: He makes the night to enter into the day and makes the day to enter into the night. He knows the thoughts within the breasts.

Name: Iron
Verse: Believe in God and His Messenger, and expend of that unto which He has made you successors. And those of you who believe and expend shall have a mighty wage.

Name: Iron
Verse: How is it with you, that you believe not in God seeing that the Messenger is calling you to believe in your Lord, and He has taken compact with you, if you are believers?

Name: Iron
Verse: It is He who sends down upon His servant signs, clear signs, that He may bring you forth from the shadows into the light. Surely God is to you All-gentle, All-compassionate.

Name: Iron
Verse: How is it with you, that you expend not in the way of God, and to God belongs the inheritance of the heavens and the earth? Not equal is he among you who spent, and who fought before the victory; those are mightier in rank than they who spent and fought afterwards; and unto each God has promised the reward most fair; and God is aware of the things you do.

Name: Iron
Verse: Who is he that will lend to God a good loan, and He will multiply it for him, and his shall be a generous wage?

Name: Iron
Verse: Upon the day when thou seest the believers, men and women, their light running before them, and on their right hands. ’Good tidings for you today! Gardens underneath which rivers flow, therein to dwell for ever; that is indeed the mighty triumph.’

Name: Iron
Verse: Upon the day when the hypocrites, men and women, shall say to those who have believed, ’Wait for us, so that we may borrow your light!’ It shall be said, ’Return you back behind, and seek for a light!’ And a wall shall be set up between them, having a door in the inward whereof is mercy, and against the outward thereof is chastisement.

Name: Iron
Verse: They shall be calling unto them, ’Were we not with you?’ They shall say, ’Yes indeed; but you tempted yourselves, and you awaited, and you were in doubt, and fancies deluded you, until God’s commandment came, and the Deluder deluded you concerning God.

Name: Iron
Verse: Therefore today no ransom shall be taken from you, neither from those who disbelieved. Your refuge is the Fire, that is your master -- an evil homecoming!’

Name: Iron
Verse: Is it not time that the hearts of those who believe should be humbled to the Remembrance of God and the Truth which He has sent down, and that they should not be as those to whom the Book was given aforetime, and the term seemed over long to them, so that their hearts have become hard, and many of them are ungodly?

Name: Iron
Verse: Know that God revives the earth after it was dead. We have indeed made clear for you the signs, that haply you will understand.

Name: Iron
Verse: Surely those, the men and the women, who make freewill offerings and have lent to God a good loan, it shall be multiplied for them, and theirs shall be a generous wage.

Name: Iron
Verse: And those who believe in God and His Messengers -- they are the just men and the martyrs in their Lord’s sight; they have their wage, and their light. But the unbelievers, who have cried lies to Our signs, they are the inhabitants of Hell.

Name: Iron
Verse: Know that the present life is but a sport and a diversion, an adornment and a cause for boasting among you, and a rivalry in wealth and children. It is as a rain whose vegetation pleases the unbelievers; then it withers, and thou seest it turning yellow, then it becomes broken orts. And in the world to come there is a terrible chastisement, and forgiveness from God and good pleasure; and the present life is but the joy of delusion.

Name: Iron
Verse: Race to forgiveness from your Lord, and a Garden the breadth whereof is as the breadth of heaven and earth, made ready for those who believe in God and His Messengers. That is the bounty of God; He gives it unto whomsoever He will; and God is of bounty abounding.

Name: Iron
Verse: No affliction befalls in the earth or in yourselves, but it is in a Book, before We create it; that is easy for God;

Name: Iron
Verse: that you may not grieve for what escapes you, nor rejoice in what has come to you; God loves not any man proud and boastful,

Name: Iron
Verse: such as are niggardly, and bid men to be niggardly. And whosoever turns away, God is the All-sufficient, the All-laudable.

Name: Iron
Verse: Indeed, We sent Our Messengers with the clear signs, and We sent down with them the Book and the Balance so that men might uphold justice. And We sent down iron, wherein is great might, and many uses for men, and so that God might know who helps Him, and His Messengers, in the Unseen. Surely God is All-strong, All-mighty.

Name: Iron
Verse: And We sent Noah, and Abraham, and We appointed the Prophecy and the Book to be among their seed; and some of them are guided, and many of them are ungodly.

Name: Iron
Verse: Then We sent, following in their footsteps, Our Messengers; and We sent, following, Jesus son of Mary, and gave unto him the Gospel. And We set in the hearts of those who followed him tenderness and mercy. And monasticism they invented -- We did not prescribe it for them -- only seeking the good pleasure of God; but they observed it not as it should be observed. So We gave those of them who believed their wage; and many of them are ungodly.

Name: Iron
Verse: O believers, fear God, and believe in His Messenger, and He will give you a twofold portion of His mercy; and He will appoint for you a light whereby you shall walk, and forgive you; God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate;

Name: Iron
Verse: that the People of the Book may know that they have no power over anything of God’s bounty, and that bounty is in the hand of God; He gives it unto whomsoever He will; and God is of bounty abounding.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: God has heard the words of her that disputes with thee concerning her husband, and makes complaint unto God. God hears the two of you conversing together; surely God is All-hearing, All-seeing.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Those of you who say, regarding their wives, ’Be as my mother’s back,’ they are not truly their mothers; their mothers are only those who gave them birth, and they are surely saying a dishonourable saying, and a falsehood. Yet surely God is All-pardoning, All-forgiving.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: And those who say, regarding their wives, ’Be as my mother’s back,’ and then retract what they have said, they shall set free a slave, before the two of them touch one another. By that you are admonished; and God is aware of the things you do.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: But whosoever finds not the means, then let him fast two successive months, before the two of them touch one another. And if any man is not able to, then let him feed sixty poor persons -- that, that you may believe in God and His Messenger. Those are God’s bounds; and for the unbelievers there awaits yet a painful chastisement.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Surely those who oppose God and His Messenger shall be frustrated as those before them were frustrated. Now We have sent down signs, clear signs; and for the unbelievers awaits a humbling chastisement,

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Upon the day when God shall raise them up all together, then He shall tell them what they did.God has numbered it, and they have forgotten it. God is witness over everything.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Hast thou not seen that God knows whatsoever is in the heavens, and whatsoever is in the earth? Three men conspire not secretly together, but He is the fourth of them, neither five men, but He is the sixth of them, neither fewer than that, neither more, but He is with them, wherever they may be; then He shall tell them what they have done, on the Day of Resurrection. Surely God has knowledge of everything.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Hast thou not regarded those who were forbidden to converse secretly together, then they return to that they were forbidden, and they converse secretly together in sin and enmity, and in disobedience to the Messenger? Then, when they come to thee, they greet thee with a greeting God never greeted thee withal; and they say within themselves, ’Why does God not chastise us for what we say?’ Sufficient for them shall be Gehenna, at which they, shall be roasted -- an evil homecoming!

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: O believers, when you conspire secretly, then conspire not together in sin and enmity and disobedience to the Messenger, but conspire in piety and godfearing. Fear God, unto whom you shall be mustered.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Conspiring secretly together is of Satan, that the believers may sorrow; but he will not hurt them anything, except by the leave of God. And in God let the believers put all their trust.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: O believers, when it is said to you ’Make room in the assemblies’, then make room, and God will make room for you; and when it is said, ’Move up’, move up, and God will raise up in rank those of you who believe and have been given knowledge. And God is aware of the things you do.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: O believers, when you conspire with the Messenger, before your conspiring advance a freewill offering; that is better for you and purer. Yet if you find not means, God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Are you afraid, before your conspiring, to advance freewill offerings? If you do not so, and God turns again unto you, then perform the prayer, and pay the alms, and obey God and His Messenger. God is aware of the things you do.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Hast thou not regarded those who have taken for friends a people against whom God is wrathful? They belong neither to you nor to them; and they swear upon falsehood, and that wittingly.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: God has made ready for them a chastisement terrible; surely they -- evil are the things they have been doing.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: They have taken their oaths as a covering, and barred from God’s way; so there awaits them a humbling chastisement.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Neither their riches nor their children shall avail them anything against God; those -- they are the inhabitants of the Fire, therein dwelling forever.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Upon the day when God shall raise them up all together, and they will swear to Him, as they swear to you, and think they are on something. Surely, they are the liars!

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Satan has gained the mastery over them, and caused them to forget God’s Remembrance. Those are Satan’s party; why, Satan’s party, surely, they are the losers!

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Surely those who oppose God and His Messenger, those are among the most abject.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: God has written, ’I shall assuredly be the victor, I and My Messengers.’ Surely God is All-strong, All-mighty.

Name: She That Disputeth
Verse: Thou shalt not find any people who believe in God and the Last Day who are loving to anyone who opposes. God and His Messenger, not though they were their fathers, or their sons, or their brothers, or their clan. Those -- He has written faith upon their hearts, and He has confirmed them with a Spirit from Himself; and He shall admit them into gardens underneath which rivers flow, therein to dwell forever, God being well-pleased with them, and they well-pleased with Him. Those are God’s party; why, surely God’s party -- they are the prosperers.

Name: Exile
Verse: All that is in the heavens and the earth magnifies God; He is the All-mighty, the All-wise.

Name: Exile
Verse: It is He who expelled from their habitations the unbelievers among the People of the Book at the first mustering. You did not think that they would go forth, and they thought that their fortresses would defend them against God; then God came upon them from whence they had not reckoned, and He cast terror into their hearts as they destroyed their houses with their own hands, and the hands of the believers; therefore take heed, you who have eyes!

Name: Exile
Verse: Had God not prescribed dispersal for them, He would have chastised them in this world; and there awaits them in the world to come the chastisement of the Fire.

Name: Exile
Verse: That is because they made a breach with God and His Messenger; and whosoever makes a breach with God, God is terrible in retribution.

Name: Exile
Verse: Whatever palm-trees you cut down, or left standing upon their roots, that was by God’s leave, and that He might degrade the ungodly.

Name: Exile
Verse: And whatever spoils of war God has given unto His Messenger from them, against that you pricked neither horse nor camel; but God gives authority to His Messengers over whomsoever He will. God is powerful over everything.

Name: Exile
Verse: Whatsoever spoils of war God has given to His Messenger from the people of the cities belongs to God, and His Messenger, and the near kinsman, orphans, the needy and the traveller, so that it be not a thing taken in turns among the rich of you. Whatever the Messenger gives you, take; whatever he forbids you, give over. And fear God; surely God is terrible in retribution.

Name: Exile
Verse: It is for the poor emigrants, who were expelled from their habitations and their possessions, seeking bounty from God and good pleasure, and helping God and His Messenger; those -- they are the truthful ones.

Name: Exile
Verse: And those who made their dwelling in the abode, and in belief, before them; love whosoever has emigrated to them, not finding in their breasts any need for what they have been given, and preferring others above themselves, even though poverty be their portion. And whoso is guarded against the avarice of his own soul, those -- they are the prosperers.

Name: Exile
Verse: And as for those who came after them, they say, ’Our Lord, forgive us and our brothers, who preceded us in belief, and put Thou not into our hearts any rancour towards those who believe. Our Lord, surely Thou art the All-gentle, the All-compassionate.’

Name: Exile
Verse: Hast thou not regarded the hypocrites, saying to their brothers of the People of the Book who disbelieve, ’If you are expelled, we will go forth with you, and we will never obey anyone in regard to you. If you are fought against, we will help you.’ And God bears witness that they are truly liars.

Name: Exile
Verse: If those are expelled, they will not go forth with them, and if they are fought against, they will not help them. Even if they helped them, they would surely turn their backs, then they would not be helped.

Name: Exile
Verse: Why, you arouse greater fear in their hearts than God; that is because they are a people who understand not.

Name: Exile
Verse: They will not fight against you all together except in fortified cities, or from behind walls. Their valour is great, among themselves; you think of them as a host; but their hearts are scattered; that is because they are a people who have no sense.

Name: Exile
Verse: Like those who a short time before them tasted the mischief of their action; there awaits them a painful chastisement.

Name: Exile
Verse: Like Satan, when he said to man, ’Disbelieve’; then, when he disbelieved, he said, ’Surely I am quit of you. Surely I fear God, the Lord of all Being.’

Name: Exile
Verse: Their end is, both are in the Fire, there dwelling forever; that is the recompense of the evildoers.

Name: Exile
Verse: O believers, fear God. Let every soul consider what it has forwarded for the morrow. And fear God; God is aware of the things you do.

Name: Exile
Verse: Be not as those who forgot God, and so He caused them to forget their souls; those -- they are the ungodly.

Name: Exile
Verse: Not equal are the inhabitants of the Fire and the inhabitants of Paradise. The inhabitants of Paradise -- they are the triumphant.

Name: Exile
Verse: If We had sent down this Koran upon a mountain, thou wouldst have seen it humbled, split asunder out of the fear of God. And those similitudes -- We strike them for men; haply they will reflect.

Name: Exile
Verse: He is God; there is no god but He. He is the knower of the Unseen and the Visible; He is the All-merciful, the All-compassionate.

Name: Exile
Verse: He is God; there is no god but He. He is the King, the All-holy, the All-peaceable, the All-faithful, the All-preserver, the All-mighty, the All-compeller, the All-sublime. Glory be to God, above that they associate!

Name: Exile
Verse: He is God, the Creator, the Maker, the Shaper. To Him belong the Names Most Beautiful. All that is in the heavens and the earth magnifies Him; He is the All-mighty, the All-wise.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: O believers, take not My enemy and your enemy for friends, offering them love, though they have disbelieved in the truth that has come to you, expelling the Messenger and you because you believe in God your Lord. If you go forth to struggle in My way and seek My good pleasure, secretly loving them, yet I know very well what you conceal and what you publish; and whosoever of you does that, has gone astray from the right way.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: If they come on you, they will be enemies to you, and stretch against you their hands and their tongues, to do you evil, and they wish that you may disbelieve.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: Neither your blood-kindred nor your children shall profit you upon the Day of Resurrection; He shall distinguish between you. And God sees the things you do.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: You have had a good example in Abraham, and those with him, when they said to their people, ’We are quit of you and that you serve, apart from God. We disbelieve in you, and between us and you enmity has shown itself, and hatred for ever, until you believe in God alone. (Except that Abraham said unto his father, ’Certainly I shall ask pardon for thee; but I have no power to do aught for thee against God.’) ’Our Lord, in Thee we trust; to Thee we turn; to Thee is the homecoming.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: Our Lord, make us not a temptation to those who disbelieve; and forgive us. Our. Lord, Thou art the All-mighty, the All-wise.’

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: You have had a good example in them for whoever hopes for God and the Last Day. And whosoever turns away, surely God is the All-sufficient, the All-laudable.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: It may be God will yet establish between you and those of them with whom you are at enmity love. God is All-powerful; God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: God forbids you not, as regards those who have not fought you in religion’s cause, nor expelled you from your habitations, that you should be kindly to them, and act justly towards them; surely God loves the just.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: God only forbids you as to those who have fought you in religion’s cause, and expelled you from your habitations, and have supported in your expulsion, that you should take them for friends. And whosoever takes them for friends, those -- they are the evildoers.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: O believers, when believing women come to you as emigrants, test them. God knows very well their belief. Then, if you know them to be believers, return them not to the unbelievers. They are not permitted to the unbelievers, nor are the unbelievers permitted to them. Give the unbelievers what they have expended; and there is no fault in you to marry them when you have given them their wages. Do not hold fast to the ties of unbelieving women, and ask what you have expended, and let them ask what they have expended. That is God’s judgment; He judges between you; and God is All-knowing, All-wise.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: And if any of your wives slips away from you to the unbelievers, and then you retaliate, give those whose wives have gone away the like of what they have expended. And fear God, in whom you believe.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: O Prophet, when believing women come to thee, swearing fealty to thee upon the terms that they will not associate with God anything, and will not steal, neither commit adultery, nor slay their children, nor bring a calumny they forge between their hands and their feet, nor disobey thee in aught honourable, ask God’s forgiveness for them; God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

Name: She That is to be Examined
Verse: O believers, take not for friends a people against whom God is wrathful, and who have despaired of the world to come, even as the unbelievers have despaired of the inhabitants of the tombs.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: All that is in the heavens and the earth magnifies God; He is the All-mighty; the All-wise.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: O you who believe, wherefore do you say what you do not?

Name: The Ranks
Verse: Very hateful is it to God, that you say what you do not.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: God loves those who fight in His way in ranks, as though they were a building well-compacted.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: And when Moses said to his people, ’O my people, why do you hurt me, though you know I am the Messenger of God to you?’ When they swerved, God caused their hearts to swerve; and God. guides never the people of the ungodly.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: And when Jesus son of Mary said, ’Children of Israel, I am indeed the Messenger of God to you, confirming the Torah that is before me, and giving good tidings of a Messenger who shall come after me, whose name shall be Ahmad.’ Then, when he brought them the clear signs, they said, ’This is a manifest sorcery.’

Name: The Ranks
Verse: And who does greater evil than he who forges against God falsehood, when he is being called unto surrender? And God guides never the people of the evildoers.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: They desire to extinguish with their mouths, the light of God; but God will perfect His light, though the unbelievers be averse.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: It is He who has sent His Messenger with the guidance and the religion of truth, that he may uplift it above every religion, though the unbelievers be averse.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: O believers, shall I direct you to a commerce that shall deliver you from a painful chastisement?

Name: The Ranks
Verse: You shall believe in God and His Messenger, and struggle in the way of God with your possessions and your selves. That is better for you, did you but know.

Name: The Ranks
Verse: He will forgive you your sins and admit you into gardens underneath which rivers flow, and to dwelling-places goodly in Gardens of Eden; that is the mighty triumph;

Name: The Ranks
Verse: and other things you love, help from God and a nigh victory. Give thou good tidings to the believers!

Name: The Ranks
Verse: O believers, be you God’s helpers, as Jesus, Mary’s son, said to the Apostles. ’Who will be my helpers unto God?’ The Apostles said, ’We will be helpers of God.’ And a party of the Children of Israel believed, and a party disbelieved. So We confirmed those who believed against their enemy, and they became masters.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: All that is in the heavens and the earth magnifies God, the King, the All-holy, the All-mighty, the All-wise.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: It is He who has raised up from among the common people a Messenger from among them, to recite His signs to them and to purify them, and to teach them the Book and the Wisdom, though before that they were in manifest error,

Name: The Congregation
Verse: and others of them who have not yet joined them. And He is the All-mighty, the All-wise.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: That is the bounty of God; He gives it to whom He will, and God is of bounty abounding.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: The likeness of those who have been loaded with the Torah then they have not carried it, is as the likeness of an ass carrying books. Evil is the likeness of the people who have cried lies to God’s signs. God guides never the people of the evildoers.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: Say: ’You of Jewry, if you assert that you are the friends of God, apart from other men, then do you long for death, if you speak truly.’

Name: The Congregation
Verse: But they will never long for it, because of that their hands have forwarded; God knows the evildoers.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: Say: ’Surely death, from which you flee, shall encounter you; then you shall be returned to the Knower of the Unseen and the Visible, and He will tell you that you have been doing.’

Name: The Congregation
Verse: O believers, when proclamation is made for prayer on the Day of Congregation, hasten to God’s remembrance and leave trafficking aside; that is better for you, did you but know.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: Then, when the prayer is finished, scatter in the land and seek God’s bounty, and remember God frequently; haply you will prosper.

Name: The Congregation
Verse: But when they see merchandise or diversion they scatter off to it, and they leave thee standing. Say: ’What is with God is better than diversion and merchandise. God is the best of providers.’

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: When the hypocrites come to thee they say, ’We bear witness that thou art indeed the Messenger of God.’ And God knows that thou art indeed His Messenger, and God bears witness that the hypocrites are truly liars.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: They have taken their oaths as a covering, then they have barred from the way of God. Surely they -- evil are the things they have been doing.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: That is because they have believed, then they have disbelieved; therefore a seal has been set on their hearts, and they do not understand.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: When thou seest them, their bodies please thee; but when they speak, thou listenest to their speech, and it is as they were propped-up timbers. They think every cry is against them. They are the enemy; so beware of them. God assail them! How they are perverted!

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: And when it is said to them, ’Come now, and God’s Messenger will ask forgiveness for you,’ they twist their heads, and thou seest them turning their faces away, waxing proud.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: Equal it is for them, whether thou askest forgiveness for them or thou askest not forgiveness for them; God will never forgive them. God guides not the people of the ungodly.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: Those are they that say, ’Do not expend on them that are with God’s Messenger until they scatter off’; yet unto God belong the treasuries of the heavens and of the earth, but the hypocrites do not understand.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: They say, ’If we return to the City, the mightier ones of it will expel the more abased’; yet glory belongs unto God, and unto His Messenger and the believers, but the hypocrites do not know it.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: O believers, let not your possessions neither your children divert you from God’s remembrance; whoso does that, they are the losers.

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: Expend of what We have provided you before that death comes upon one of you and he says, ’O my Lord, if only Thou wouldst defer me unto a near term, so that I may make freewill offering, and so I may become one of the righteous.’

Name: The Hypocrites
Verse: But God will never defer any soul when its term comes. And God is aware of the things you do.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: All that is in the heavens and the earth magnifies God. His is the Kingdom, and His is the praise, and He is powerful over everything.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: It is He who created you. One of you is an unbeliever, and one of you a believer; and God sees the things you do.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: He created the heavens and the earth with the truth, and He shaped you, and shaped you well; and unto Him is the homecoming.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: He knows whatever is in the heavens and the earth, and He knows what you conceal and what you publish. God knows the thoughts within the breasts.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: Has there not come to you the tidings of those that disbelieved before, then tasted the mischief of their action, and there yet awaits them a painful chastisement?

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: That is because their Messengers came to them with the clear signs, and then they said, ’What, shall mortals be our guides?’ Therefore they disbelieved, and turned away; and God was in no need of them. And God is All-sufficient, All-laudable.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: The unbelievers assert that they will never be raised up. Say: ’Yes indeed, by my Lord! You shall be raised up, then you shall be told the things you did. That is easy for God.’

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: Therefore believe in God and His Messenger, and in the Light which We have sent down. And God is aware of the things you do.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: Upon the day when He shall gather you for the Day of Gathering; that shall be the Day of Mutual Fraud. And whosoever believes in God, and does righteousness, God will acquit him of his evil deeds, and admit him into gardens underneath which rivers flow, therein to dwell for ever and ever; that is the mighty triumph.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: And those who disbelieved and cried lies to Our signs, those shall be the inhabitants of the Fire. therein to dwell forever -- an evil homecoming!

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: No affliction befalls, except it be by the leave of God. Whosoever believes in God, He will guide his heart. And God has knowledge of everything.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: And obey God, and obey the Messenger; but if you turn your backs, it is only for the Messenger to deliver the Manifest Message.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: God -- there is no god but He. And in God let the believers put their trust.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: O believers, among your wives and children there is an enemy to you; so beware of them. But if you pardon, and overlook, and if you forgive, surely God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: Your wealth and your children are only a trial; and with God is a mighty wage.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: So fear God as far as you are able, and give ear, and obey, and expend well for yourselves. And whosoever is guarded against the avarice of his own soul, those -- they are the prosperers.

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: If you lend to God a good loan, He will multiply it for you, and will forgive you. God is All-thankful, All-clement,

Name: Mutual Disillusion
Verse: Knower He of the Unseen and the Visible, the All-mighty, the All-wise.

Name: Divorce
Verse: O Prophet, when you divorce women, divorce them when they have reached their period. Count the period, and fear God your Lord. Do not expel them from their houses, nor let them go forth, except when they commit a flagrant indecency. Those are God’s bounds; whosoever trespasses the bounds of God has done wrong to himself. Thou knowest not, perchance after that God will bring something new to pass.

Name: Divorce
Verse: Then, when they have reached their term, retain them honourably, or part from them honourably. And call in to witness two men of equity from among yourselves; and perform the witnessing to God Himself. By this then is admonished whosoever believes in God and the Last Day. And whosoever fears God, He will appoint for him a way out,

Name: Divorce
Verse: and He will provide for him from whence he never reckoned. And whosoever puts his trust in God, He shall suffice him. God attains his purpose. God has appointed a measure for everything.

Name: Divorce
Verse: As for your women who have despaired of further menstruating, if you are in doubt, their period shall be three months; and those who have not menstruated as yet. And those who are with child, their term is when they bring forth their burden. Whoso fears God, God will appoint for him, of His command, easiness.

Name: Divorce
Verse: That is God’s command, that He has sent down unto you. And whosoever fears God, He will acquit him of his evil deeds, and He will give him a mighty wage.

Name: Divorce
Verse: Lodge them where you are lodging, according to your means, and do not press them, so as to straiten their circumstances. If they are with child, expend upon them until they bring forth their burden. If they suckle for you, give them their wages, and consult together honourably. If you both make difficulties, another woman shall suckle for him.

Name: Divorce
Verse: Let the man of plenty expend out of his plenty. As for him whose provision is stinted to him, let him expend of what God has given him. God charges no soul save with what He has given him. God will assuredly appoint, after difficulty, easiness.

Name: Divorce
Verse: How many a city turned in disdain from the commandment of its Lord and His Messengers; and then We made with it a terrible reckoning and chastised it with a horrible chastisement.

Name: Divorce
Verse: So it tasted the mischief of its action, and the end of its affair was loss.

Name: Divorce
Verse: God prepared for them a terrible chastisement. So fear God, O men possessed of minds! Believers, God has sent down to you, for a remembrance,

Name: Divorce
Verse: a Messenger reciting to you the signs of God, clear signs, that He may bring forth those who believe and do righteous deeds from the shadows into the light. Whosoever believes in God, and does righteousness, He will admit him to gardens underneath which rivers flow; therein they shall dwell for ever and ever. God has made for him a goodly provision.

Name: Divorce
Verse: It is God who created seven heavens, and of earth their like, between them the Command descending, that you may know that God is powerful over everything and that God encompasses everything in knowledge.

Name: Banning
Verse: It is God who created seven heavens, and of earth their like, between them the Command descending, that you may know that God is powerful over everything and that God encompasses everything in knowledge.

Name: Banning
Verse: God has ordained for you the absolution of your oaths. God is your Protector, and He is the All-knowing, the All-wise.

Name: Banning
Verse: And when the Prophet confided to one of his wives a certain matter; and then, when she told of it, and God disclosed that to him, he made known part of it, and turned aside from part; then, when he told her of it, she said, ’Who told thee this?’ He said, ’I was told of it by the All-knowing, the All-aware.’

Name: Banning
Verse: If you two repent to God, yet your hearts certainly inclined; but if you support one another against him, God is his Protector, and Gabriel, and the righteous among the believers; and, after that, the angels are his supporters.

Name: Banning
Verse: It is possible that, if he divorces you, his Lord will give him in exchange wives better than you, women who have surrendered, believing, obedient, penitent, devout, given to fasting, who have been married and virgins too.

Name: Banning
Verse: Believers, guard yourselves and your families against a Fire whose fuel is men and stones, and over which are harsh, terrible angels who disobey not God in what He commands them and do what they are commanded.

Name: Banning
Verse: ’O you unbelievers, do not excuse yourselves today; you are only being recompensed for what you were doing.’

Name: Banning
Verse: Believers, turn to God in sincere repentance; it may be that your Lord will acquit you of your evil deeds, and will admit you into gardens underneath which rivers flow. Upon the day when God will not degrade the Prophet and those who believe with him, their light running before them, and on their right hands; and they say, ’Our ’Lord, perfect for us our light, and forgive us; surely Thou art powerful over everything.’

Name: Banning
Verse: O Prophet, struggle with the unbelievers and the hypocrites, and be thou harsh with them; their refuge shall be Gehenna -- an evil homecoming!

Name: Banning
Verse: God has struck a similitude for the unbelievers -- the wife of Noah, and the wife of Lot; for they were under two of Our righteous servants, but they betrayed them, so they availed them nothing whatsoever against God; so it was said, ’Enter, you two, the Fire with those who enter.’

Name: Banning
Verse: God has struck a similitude for the believers -- the wife of Pharaoh, when she said, ’My Lord, build for me a house in Paradise, in Thy presence, and deliver me from Pharaoh and his work, and do Thou deliver me from the people of the evildoers.’

Name: Banning
Verse: And Mary, Imran’s daughter, who guarded her virginity, so We breathed into her of Our Spirit, and she confirmed the Words of her Lord and His Books, and became one of the obedient.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Blessed be He in whose hand is the Kingdom -- He is powerful over everything --

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: who created death and life, that He might try you which of you is fairest in works; and He is the All-mighty, the All-forgiving --

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: who created seven heavens one upon another. Thou seest not in the creation of the All-merciful any imperfection. Return thy gaze; seest thou any fissure?

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Then return thy gaze again, and again, and thy gaze comes back to thee dazzled, aweary.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: And We adorned the lower heaven with lamps, and made them things to stone Satans; and We have prepared for them the chastisement of the Blaze.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: And for those who disbelieve in their Lord there awaits the chastisement of Gehenna -- an evil homecoming!

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: When they are cast into it they will hear it sighing, the while it boils

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: and wellnigh bursts asunder with rage. As often as a troop is cast into it, its keepers ask them, ’Came there no warner to you?’;

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: They say, ’Yes indeed, a warner came to us; but we cried lies, saying, "God has not sent down anything; you are only in great error.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: They also say, ’If we had only heard, or had understood, we would not have been of the inhabitants of the Blaze.’

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: So they confess their sins. Curse the inhabitants of the Blaze!

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Surely those who fear their Lord in the Unseen -- there awaits them forgiveness and a great wage.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Be secret in your speech, or proclaim it, He knows the thoughts within the breasts.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Shall He not know, who created? And He is the All-subtle, the All-aware.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: It is He who made the earth submissive to you; therefore walk in its tracts, and eat of His provision; to Him is the Uprising.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Do you feel secure that He who is in heaven will not cause the earth to swallow you, the while it rocks?

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Do you feel secure that He who is in heaven will not loose against you a squall of pebbles, then you shall know how My warning is?

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Those that were before them also cried lies; then how was My horror!

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Have they not regarded the birds above them spreading their wings, and closing them? Naught holds them but the All-merciful. Surely He sees everything.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Or who is this that shall be a host for you to help you, apart from the All-merciful? The unbelievers are only in delusion.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Or who is this that shall provide for you if He withholds His provision? No, but they persist in disdain and aversion.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: What, is he who walks prone upon his face better guided than he who walks upright on a straight path?

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Say: ’It is He who produced you, and appointed for you hearing and sight and hearts; little thanks you show!’

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Say: ’It is He who scattered you in the earth, and unto Him you shall be mustered.’

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: They say, ’When shall this promise come to pass, if you speak truly?’

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Say: ’The knowledge is with God; I am only a clear warner.’

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Then, when they see it nigh at hand, the faces of the unbelievers will be vexed, and it will be said, ’This is what you were promised.’

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Say: ’What think you? If God destroys me and those with me, or has mercy on us, then who will protect the unbelievers from a painful chastisement?’

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Say: ’He is the All-merciful. We believe in Him, and in Him we put all our trust. Assuredly, you will soon, know who is in manifest error.

Name: The Sovereignty
Verse: Say: ’What think you? If in the morning your water should have vanished into the earth, then who would bring you running water?’

Name: The Pen
Verse: Nun. By the Pen, and what they inscribe,

Name: The Pen
Verse: thou art not, by the blessing of thy Lord, a man possessed.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Surely thou shalt have a wage unfailing;

Name: The Pen
Verse: surely thou art upon a mighty morality.

Name: The Pen
Verse: So thou shalt see, and they will see,

Name: The Pen
Verse: which of you is the demented.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Surely thy Lord knows very well those who have gone astray from His way, and He knows very well those who are guided.

Name: The Pen
Verse: So obey thou not those who cry lies.

Name: The Pen
Verse: They wish that thou shouldst compromise, then they would compromise.

Name: The Pen
Verse: And obey thou not every mean swearer,

Name: The Pen
Verse: backbiter, going about with slander,

Name: The Pen
Verse: hinderer of good, guilty aggressor, coarse-grained,

Name: The Pen
Verse: moreover ignoble,

Name: The Pen
Verse: because he has wealth and sons.

Name: The Pen
Verse: When Our signs are recited to him, he says, ’Fairy-tales of the ancients!’

Name: The Pen
Verse: We shall brand him upon the muzzle!

Name: The Pen
Verse: Now We have tried them, even as We tried the owners of the garden when they swore they would pluck in the morning

Name: The Pen
Verse: and they added not the saving words.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Then a visitation from thy Lord visited it, while they were sleeping,

Name: The Pen
Verse: and in the morning it was as if it were a garden plucked.

Name: The Pen
Verse: In the morning they called to one another,

Name: The Pen
Verse: ’Come forth betimes upon your tillage, if you would pluck!’

Name: The Pen
Verse: So they departed, whispering together,

Name: The Pen
Verse: ’No needy man shall enter it today against your will.’

Name: The Pen
Verse: And they went forth early, determined upon their purpose.

Name: The Pen
Verse: But when they saw it, they said, ’Surely we are gone astray;

Name: The Pen
Verse: nay, rather we have been robbed!’

Name: The Pen
Verse: Said the most moderate of them, ’Did I not say to you, "Why do you not give glory?"’

Name: The Pen
Verse: They said, ’Glory be to God, our Lord; truly, we were evildoers.’

Name: The Pen
Verse: And they advanced one upon another, blaming each other.

Name: The Pen
Verse: They said, ’Woe, alas for us! Truly, we were insolent.

Name: The Pen
Verse: It may be that our Lord will give us in exchange a better than it; to our Lord we humbly turn.’

Name: The Pen
Verse: Such is the chastisement; and the chastisement of the world to come, is assuredly greater, did they but know.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Surely for the godfearing shall be Gardens of Bliss with their Lord.

Name: The Pen
Verse: What, shall we make those who have surrendered like to the sinners?

Name: The Pen
Verse: What ails you then, how you judge?

Name: The Pen
Verse: Or have you a Book wherein you study?

Name: The Pen
Verse: Surely therein you shall have whatever you choose!

Name: The Pen
Verse: Or have you oaths from Us, reaching to the Day of Resurrection? Surely you shall have whatever you judge!

Name: The Pen
Verse: Ask them, which of them will guarantee that!

Name: The Pen
Verse: Or do they have associates? Then let them bring their associates, if they speak truly.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Upon the day when the leg shall be bared, and they shall be summoned to bow themselves, but they cannot;

Name: The Pen
Verse: humbled shall be their eyes, and abasement shall overspread them, for they had been summoned to bow themselves while they were whole.

Name: The Pen
Verse: So leave Me with him who cries lies to this discourse! We will draw them on little by little whence they know not;

Name: The Pen
Verse: and I shall respite them -- assuredly My guile is sure.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Or askest thou them for a wage, and so they are weighed down with debt?

Name: The Pen
Verse: Or is the Unseen in their keeping, and so they are writing it down?

Name: The Pen
Verse: So be thou patient under the judgment of thy Lord, and be not as the Man of the Fish, when he called, choking inwardly.

Name: The Pen
Verse: Had there not overtaken him a blessing from his Lord he would have been cast upon the wilderness, being condemned.

Name: The Pen
Verse: But his Lord had chosen him, and He placed him among the righteous.

Name: The Pen
Verse: The unbelievers wellnigh strike thee down with their glances, when they hear the Reminder, and they say, ’Surely he is a man possessed!’

Name: The Pen
Verse: And it is nothing but a Reminder unto all beings.

Name: The Reality
Verse: The Indubitable!

Name: The Reality
Verse: What is the Indubitable?

Name: The Reality
Verse: And what will teach thee what is the Indubitable?

Name: The Reality
Verse: Thamood and Ad cried lies to the Clatterer.

Name: The Reality
Verse: As for Thamood, they were destroyed by the Screamer;

Name: The Reality
Verse: and as for Ad, they were destroyed by a wind clamorous,

Name: The Reality
Verse: violent that He compelled against them seven nights and eight days, uninterruptedly, and thou mightest see the people laid prostrate in it as if they were the stumps of fallen down palm-trees.

Name: The Reality
Verse: Now dost thou see any remnant of them?

Name: The Reality
Verse: Pharaoh likewise, and those before him, and the Subverted Cities -- they committed error,

Name: The Reality
Verse: and they rebelled against the Messenger of their Lord, and He seized them with a surpassing grip.

Name: The Reality
Verse: Lo, when the waters rose, We bore you in the running ship

Name: The Reality
Verse: that We might make it a reminder for you and for heeding ears to hold.

Name: The Reality
Verse: So, when the Trumpet is blown with a single blast

Name: The Reality
Verse: and the earth and the mountains are lifted up and crushed with a single blow,

Name: The Reality
Verse: then, on that day, the Terror shall come to pass,

Name: The Reality
Verse: and heaven shall be split, for upon that day it shall be very frail,

Name: The Reality
Verse: and the angels shall stand upon its borders, and upon that day eight shall carry above them the Throne of thy Lord.

Name: The Reality
Verse: On that day you shall be exposed, not one secret of yours concealed.

Name: The Reality
Verse: Then as for him who is given his book in his right hand, he shall say, ’Here, take and read my book!

Name: The Reality
Verse: Certainly I thought that I should encounter my reckoning.’

Name: The Reality
Verse: So he shall be in a pleasing life

Name: The Reality
Verse: in a lofty Garden,

Name: The Reality
Verse: its clusters nigh to gather.

Name: The Reality
Verse: ’Eat and drink with wholesome appetite for that you did long ago, in the days gone by.’

Name: The Reality
Verse: But as for him who is given his book in his left hand, he shall say, ’Would that I had not been given my book

Name: The Reality
Verse: and not known my reckoning!

Name: The Reality
Verse: Would it had been the end!

Name: The Reality
Verse: My wealth has not availed me,

Name: The Reality
Verse: my authority is gone from me.’

Name: The Reality
Verse: ’Take him, and fetter him,

Name: The Reality
Verse: and then roast him in Hell,

Name: The Reality
Verse: then in a chain of seventy cubits’ length insert him!

Name: The Reality
Verse: Behold, he never believed in God the All-mighty,

Name: The Reality
Verse: and he never urged the feeding of the needy;

Name: The Reality
Verse: therefore he today has not here one loyal friend,

Name: The Reality
Verse: neither any food saving foul pus,

Name: The Reality
Verse: that none excepting the sinners eat.’

Name: The Reality
Verse: No! I swear by that you see

Name: The Reality
Verse: and by that you do not see,

Name: The Reality
Verse: it is the speech of a noble Messenger.

Name: The Reality
Verse: It is not the speech of a poet (little do you believe)

Name: The Reality
Verse: nor the speech of a soothsayer (little do you remember).

Name: The Reality
Verse: A sending down from the Lord of all Being.

Name: The Reality
Verse: Had he invented against Us any sayings,

Name: The Reality
Verse: We would have seized him by the right hand,

Name: The Reality
Verse: then We would surely have cut his life-vein

Name: The Reality
Verse: and not one of you could have defended him.

Name: The Reality
Verse: Surely it is a Reminder to the godfearing;

Name: The Reality
Verse: but We know that some of you will cry lies.

Name: The Reality
Verse: Surely it is a sorrow to the unbelievers;

Name: The Reality
Verse: yet indeed it is the truth of certainty.

Name: The Reality
Verse: Then magnify the Name of thy Lord, the All-mighty.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: A questioner asked of a chastisement about to fall

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: for the unbelievers, which none may avert,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: from God, the Lord of the Stairways.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: To Him the angels and the Spirit mount up, in a day whereof the measure is fifty thousand years.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: So be thou patient with a sweet patience;

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: behold, they see it as if far off;

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: but We see it is nigh.

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: Upon the day when heaven shall be as molten copper

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: and the mountains shall be as plucked wool-tufts,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: no loyal friend shall question loyal friend,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: as they are given sight of them. The sinner will wish that he might ransom himself from the chastisement of that day even by his sons,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: his companion wife, his brother,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: his kin who sheltered him,

Name: The Ascending Stairways
Verse: and whosoever is in the earth, all together, so that then it might deliver him.

Name: The Ascending Stairways

Name: Noah
Verse: We sent Noah to his people, saying, ’Warn thy people, ere there come on them a painful chastisement.’

Name: Noah

Name: Noah

Name: Noah

Name: Noah

Name: Noah

Name: Noah

Name: Noah

Name: The Jinn
Verse: Say: ’It has been revealed to me that a company of the jinn gave ear, then they said, "We have indeed heard a Koran wonderful,

Name: The Jinn

Name: The Jinn

Name: The Jinn

Name: The Jinn

Name: The Jinn

Name: The Jinn
Verse: And some of us are the righteous, and some of us are otherwise; we are sects differing.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: Indeed, we thought that we should never be able to frustrate God in the earth, neither be able to frustrate Him by flight.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: When we heard the guidance, we believed in it; and whosoever believes in his Lord, he shall fear neither paltriness nor vileness.

Name: The Jinn

Name: The Jinn

Name: The Jinn
Verse: Would they but go straight on the way, We would give them to drink of water copious,

Name: The Jinn
Verse: that We might try them therein. And whosoever turns away from the Remembrance of his Lord, He will thrust him into chastisement rigorous.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: The places of worship belong to God; so call not, along with God, upon anyone.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: When the servant of God stood calling on Him, they were wellnigh upon him in swarms.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: Say: ’I call only upon my Lord, and I do not associate with Him anyone.

Name: The Jinn
Verse: Say: ’Surely I possess no power over you, either for hurt or for rectitude.’

Name: The Jinn
Verse: Say: ’From God shall protect me not anyone, and I shall find, apart from Him, no refuge,

Name: The Jinn
Verse: excepting a Deliverance from God and His Messages. And whoso rebels against God and His messenger, for him there awaits the Fire of Gehenna; therein they shall dwell forever.’

Name: The Jinn

Name: The Jinn

Name: The Jinn

Name: The Jinn

He knows that some of you are sick, and others journeying in the land, seeking the bounty of God, and others fighting in the way of God. So recite of it so much as is feasible. And perform the prayer, and pay the alms, and lend to God a good loan. Whatever good you shall forward to your souls’ account, you shall find it with God as better, and mightier a wage. And ask God’s forgiveness; God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.
