Verse: And those who disbelieve in Our signs, they are the Companions of the Left Hand;

Name: The City
Verse: over them is a Fire covered down.

Name: The Sun
Verse: By the sun and his morning brightness

Name: The Sun
Verse: and by the moon when she follows him,

Name: The Sun
Verse: and by the day when it displays him

Name: The Sun
Verse: and by the night when it enshrouds him!

Name: The Sun
Verse: By the heaven and That which built it

Name: The Sun
Verse: and by the earth and That which extended it!

Name: The Sun
Verse: By the soul, and That which shaped it

Name: The Sun
Verse: and inspired it to lewdness and godfearing!

Name: The Sun
Verse: Prosperous is he who purifies it,

Name: The Sun
Verse: and failed has he who seduces it.

Name: The Sun
Verse: Thamood cried lies in their insolence

Name: The Sun
Verse: when the most wretched of them uprose,

Name: The Sun
Verse: then the Messenger of God said to them, ’The She-camel of God; let her drink!’

Name: The Sun
Verse: But they cried him lies, and hamstrung her, so their Lord crushed them for their sin, and leveled them:

Name: The Sun
Verse: and He fears not the issue thereof.

Name: The Night
Verse: By the night enshrouding

Name: The Night
Verse: and the day in splendour

Name: The Night
Verse: and That which created the male and the female,

Name: The Night
Verse: surely your striving is to diverse ends.

Name: The Night
Verse: As for him who gives and is godfearing

Name: The Night
Verse: and confirms the reward most fair,

Name: The Night
Verse: We shall surely ease him to the Easing.

Name: The Night
Verse: But as for him who is a miser, and self-sufficient,

Name: The Night
Verse: and cries lies to the reward most fair,

Name: The Night
Verse: We shall surely ease him to the Hardship;

Name: The Night
Verse: his wealth shall not avail him when he perishes.

Name: The Night
Verse: Surely upon Us rests the guidance,

Name: The Night
Verse: and to Us belong the Last and the First.

Name: The Night
Verse: Now I have warned you of a Fire that flames,

Name: The Night
Verse: whereat none but the most wretched shall be roasted,

Name: The Night
Verse: even he who cried lies, and turned away;

Name: The Night
Verse: and from which the most godfearing shall be removed,

Name: The Night
Verse: even he who gives his wealth. to purify himself

Name: The Night
Verse: and confers no favour on any man for recompense,

Name: The Night
Verse: only seeking the Face of his Lord the Most High;

Name: The Night
Verse: and he shall surely be satisfied.

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: By the white forenoon

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: and the brooding night!

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: Thy Lord has neither forsaken thee nor hates thee

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: and the Last shall be better for thee than the First.

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: Thy Lord shall give thee, and thou shalt be satisfied.

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: Did He not find thee an orphan, and shelter thee?

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: Did He not find thee erring, and guide thee?

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: Did He not find thee needy, and suffice thee?

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: As for the orphan, do not oppress him,

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: and as for the beggar, scold him not;

Name: The Morning Hours
Verse: and as for thy Lord’s blessing, declare it.

Name: Solace
Verse: Did We not expand thy breast for thee

Name: Solace
Verse: and lift from thee thy burden,

Name: Solace
Verse: the burden that weighed down thy back?

Name: Solace
Verse: And exalted for you your esteem?

Name: Solace
Verse: So truly with hardship comes ease,

Name: Solace
Verse: truly with hardship comes ease.’

Name: Solace
Verse: So when thou art empty, labour,

Name: Solace
Verse: and let thy Lord be thy Quest.

Name: The Fig
Verse: By the fig and the olive

Name: The Fig
Verse: and the Mount Sinai

Name: The Fig
Verse: and this land secure!

Name: The Fig
Verse: We indeed created Man in the fairest stature

Name: The Fig
Verse: then We restored him the lowest of the low --

Name: The Fig
Verse: save those who believe, and do righteous deeds; they shall have a wage unfailing.

Name: The Fig
Verse: What then shall cry thee lies as to the Doom?

Name: The Fig
Verse: Is not God the justest of judges?

Name: The Clot
Verse: Recite: In the Name of thy Lord who created,

Name: The Clot
Verse: created Man of a blood-clot.

Name: The Clot
Verse: Recite: And thy Lord is the Most Generous,

Name: The Clot
Verse: who taught by the Pen,

Name: The Clot
Verse: taught Man that he knew not.

Name: The Clot
Verse: No indeed; surely Man waxes insolent,

Name: The Clot
Verse: for he thinks himself self-sufficient.

Name: The Clot
Verse: Surely unto thy Lord is the Returning.

Name: The Clot
Verse: What thinkest thou? He who forbids

Name: The Clot
Verse: a servant when he prays --

Name: The Clot
Verse: What thinkest thou? If he were upon guidance

Name: The Clot
Verse: or bade to godfearing --

Name: The Clot
Verse: What thinkest thou? If he cries lies, and turns away -

Name: The Clot
Verse: Did he not know that God sees?

Name: The Clot
Verse: No indeed; surely, if he gives not over, We shall seize him by the forelock,

Name: The Clot
Verse: a lying, sinful forelock.

Name: The Clot
Verse: So let him call on his concourse!

Name: The Clot
Verse: We shall call on the guards of Hell.

Name: The Clot
Verse: No indeed; do thou not obey him, and bow thyself, and draw nigh.

Name: Power
Verse: Behold, We sent it down on the Night of Power;

Name: Power
Verse: And what shall teach thee what is the Night of Power?

Name: Power
Verse: The Night of Power is better than a thousand months;

Name: Power
Verse: in it the angels and the Spirit descend, by the leave of their Lord, upon every command.

Name: Power
Verse: Peace it is, till the rising of dawn.

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: The unbelievers of the People of the Book and the idolaters would never leave off; till the Clear Sign came to them,

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: a Messenger from God, reciting pages purified,

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: therein true Books.

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: And they scattered not, those that were given the Book, excepting after the Clear Sign came to them.

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: They were commanded only to serve God, making the religion His sincerely, men of pure faith, and to perform the prayer, and pay the alms -- that is the religion of the True.

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: The unbelievers of the People of the Book and the idolaters shall be in the Fire of Gehenna, therein dwelling forever; those are the worst of creatures.

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: But those who believe, and do righteous deeds, those are the best of creatures;

Name: The Clear Proof
Verse: their recompense is with their Lord-Gardens of Eden, underneath which rivers flow, therein dwelling for ever and ever. God is well-pleased with them, and they are well-pleased with Him; that is for him who fears his Lord.

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: When earth is shaken with a mighty shaking

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: and earth brings forth her burdens,

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: and Man says., ’What ails her?’

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: upon that day she shall tell her tidings

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: for that her Lord has inspired her.

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: Upon that day men shall issue in scatterings to see their works,

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: and whoso has done an atom’s weight of good shall see it,

Name: The Earthquake
Verse: and whoso has done an atom’s weight of evil shall see it.

Name: The Coursers
Verse: By the snorting chargers,

Name: The Coursers
Verse: by the strikers of fire,

Name: The Coursers
Verse: by the dawn-raiders

Name: The Coursers
Verse: blazing a trail of dust,

Name: The Coursers
Verse: cleaving there with a host!

Name: The Coursers
Verse: Surely Man is ungrateful to his Lord,

Name: The Coursers
Verse: and surely he is a witness against that!

Name: The Coursers
Verse: Surely he is passionate in his love for good things.

Name: The Coursers
Verse: Knows he not that when that which is in the tombs is over-thrown,

Name: The Coursers
Verse: and that which is in the breasts is brought out --

Name: The Coursers
Verse: surely on that day their Lord shall be aware of them!

Name: The Calamity
Verse: The Clatterer!

Name: The Calamity
Verse: What is the Clatterer?

Name: The Calamity
Verse: And what shall teach thee what is the Clatterer?

Name: The Calamity
Verse: The day that men shall be like scattered moths,

Name: The Calamity
Verse: and the mountains shall be like plucked wool-tufts.

Name: The Calamity
Verse: Then he whose deeds weigh heavy in the Balance

Name: The Calamity
Verse: shall inherit a pleasing life,

Name: The Calamity
Verse: but he whose deeds weigh light in the Balance

Name: The Calamity
Verse: shall plunge in the womb of the Pit.

Name: The Calamity
Verse: And what shall teach thee what is the Pit?

Name: The Calamity
Verse: A blazing Fire!

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: Gross rivalry diverts you,

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: even till you visit the tombs.

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: No indeed; but soon you shall know.

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: Again, no indeed; but soon you shall know.

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: No indeed; did you know with the knowledge of certainty,

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: you shall surely see Hell;

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: Again, you shall surely see it with the eye of certainty

Name: Rivalry in Worldly Increase
Verse: then you shall be questioned that day concerning true bliss.

Name: The Declining Day
Verse: By the afternoon!

Name: The Declining Day
Verse: Surely Man is in the way of loss,

Name: The Declining Day
Verse: save those who believe, and do righteous deeds, and counsel each other unto the truth, and counsel each other to be steadfast.

Name: The Traducer
Verse: Woe unto every backbiter, slanderer,

Name: The Traducer
Verse: who has gathered riches and counted them over

Name: The Traducer
Verse: thinking his riches have made him immortal!

Name: The Traducer
Verse: No indeed; he shall be thrust into the Crusher;

Name: The Traducer
Verse: and what shall teach thee what is the Crusher;

Name: The Traducer
Verse: The Fire of God kindled

Name: The Traducer
Verse: roaring over the hearts

Name: The Traducer
Verse: covered down upon them,

Name: The Traducer
Verse: in columns outstretched.

Name: The Elephant
Verse: Hast thou not seen how thy Lord did with the Men of the Elephant?

Name: The Elephant
Verse: Did He not make their guile to go astray?

Name: The Elephant
Verse: And He loosed upon them birds in flights,

Name: The Elephant
Verse: hurling against them stones of baked clay

Name: The Elephant
Verse: and He made them like green blades devoured.

Name: Winter or Qureysh
Verse: For the composing of Koraish,

Name: Winter or Qureysh
Verse: their composing for the winter and summer caravan!

Name: Winter or Qureysh
Verse: So let them serve the Lord of this House

Name: Winter or Qureysh
Verse: who has fed them against hunger and secured them from fear.

Name: Small Kindnesses
Verse: Hast thou seen him who cries lies to the Doom?

Name: Small Kindnesses
Verse: That is he who repulses the orphan

Name: Small Kindnesses
Verse: and urges not the feeding of the needy.

Name: Small Kindnesses
Verse: So woe to those that pray

Name: Small Kindnesses
Verse: and are heedless of their prayers,

Name: Small Kindnesses
Verse: to those who make display

Name: Small Kindnesses
Verse: and refuse charity.

Name: Abundance
Verse: Surely We have given thee abundance;

Name: Abundance
Verse: so pray unto thy Lord and sacrifice.

Name: Abundance
Verse: Surely he that hates thee, he is the one cut off.

Name: The Disbelievers
Verse: Say: ’O unbelievers,

Name: The Disbelievers
Verse: I serve not what you serve

Name: The Disbelievers
Verse: and you are not serving what I serve,

Name: The Disbelievers
Verse: nor am I serving what you have served,

Name: The Disbelievers
Verse: neither are you serving what I serve

Name: The Disbelievers
Verse: To you your religion, and to me my religion!’

Name: Succour
Verse: When comes the help of God, and victory,

Name: Succour
Verse: and thou seest men entering God’s religion in throngs,

Name: Succour
Verse: then proclaim the praise of thy Lord, and seek His forgiveness; for He turns again unto men.

Name: Palm Fibre
Verse: Perish the hands of Abu Lahab, and perish he!

Name: Palm Fibre
Verse: His wealth avails him not, neither what he has earned;

Name: Palm Fibre
Verse: he shall roast at a flaming fire

Name: Palm Fibre
Verse: and his wife, the carrier of the firewood,

Name: Palm Fibre
Verse: upon her neck a rope of palm-fibre.

Name: The Unity
Verse: Say: ’He is God, One,

Name: The Unity
Verse: God, the Everlasting Refuge,

Name: The Unity
Verse: who has not begotten, and has not been begotten,

Name: The Unity
Verse: and equal to Him is not any one.’

Name: The Daybreak
Verse: Say: ’I take refuge with the Lord of the Daybreak

Name: The Daybreak
Verse: from the evil of what He has created,

Name: The Daybreak
Verse: from the evil of darkness when it gathers,

Name: The Daybreak
Verse: from the evil of the women who blow on knots,

Name: The Daybreak
Verse: from the evil of an envier when he envies.’

Name: Mankind
Verse: Say: ’I take refuge with the Lord of men,

Name: Mankind
Verse: the King of men,

Name: Mankind
Verse: the God of men,

Name: Mankind
Verse: from the evil of the slinking whisperer

Name: Mankind
Verse: who whispers in the breasts of men

Name: Mankind
Verse: of jinn and men.’
